88b1: de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu mchog tu ngo mtshar du gyur cing rmad du byung bar gyur te dga' ba thob nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu lags so//
88b2: legs so// gang gi phyir kho bo cag lta bu nyi tshe ba'i shes pa dang ldan pa gzhan gyis sgra bsgrags pa'i rjes su 'gro ba'i nyan thos rnams la chos zab mo'i tshig don 'di lta bu gsal bar byas pa ni rigs kyi bu khyod
88b3: yang legs so/ / lag na rdo rjes smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin te/ ji skad smras pa de bzhin no// btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu ting nge 'dzin 'di'i ming ci zhes bya zhes de skad zer ba ni ting nge 'dzin 'di'i mang
88b4: rdo rje'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo chen po zhes bya'o/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag g.yas pa gser gyi kha dog brkyang ste/ phyag g.yas pa 'jam zhing mnyen la shin du gzhon sha chags pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag
88b5: po lag na rdo rje'i mgo la bzhag ste/ tshad du bka' stsal pa 'di dag kyang ched du bka' stsal to// gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje khyod kyis gang mdo sde zab mo 'di lta bu 'di dag gsang ba pa'i tshig gi don bzhin
88b6: du sems can thams cad la lung bstan cing bshad de dkrol zhing rnam par phye ba legs so legs so/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
88b7: s hAkya thub pas lag na rdo rje la ji ltar legs so zhes bya ba byin pa de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje
88b8: mgo la phyag bzhag ste/ ched du bka' stsal ba 'di dag kyang ched du bka' stsal cing legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rigs kyi bu chos kyi rnam grangs 'ad 'jig rten gyi khams mang po dag na ming 'dzin pa yang dkon na
89a1: rab tu gsal bar byed pa lta ci smos/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na lha'i bu gang ga'i klung tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa'i bye ma'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul
89a2: las shin du 'das pa rnyed chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba skyes so/ / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang dge bsnyen ma dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lham
89a3: yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa rab tu mang po dgagi zhes skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// de bas kyang ches mang ba'i sems can rnams ni phyir mi
89a4: ldog pa nyid du bya ba'i phyir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu skyes so/ / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dang / de ma yin pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dpag tu med cing grangs
89a5: med la brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag kyang rnam pa drug du g.yos so/ / gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag rdo rje la yang chos kyi dgab pa dang / mchod pa'i phyir nam mkha'i dkyil na rnga rnams ma brdungs par
89a6: kun nas sgra byung ngo / / byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul gyi gzhal med khang gi khang pa brtsegs pa rnams su kun nas sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa dang glu dbyangs thas pa lha'i bu mo rnams gar byed do// spos dang / drug
89a7: ba dang / bdug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / dpag bsam gyi shing ljon pa dang / rin po che dang / mu tig gi rgyan phreng dang / me tog pad ma dang / ku mu ta dang / ud pa la dang /
89a8: dri mchog dang / sna ma'i me tog dang / pa ri sha ka dang / pa ri sha ka chen po dang / btang bzung dang / btang bzung chen po dang / man dA ra ba dang / man dA ra ba chen po dang / many+dzu sha ka dang / many+dzu shaka chen po dang / kun
89b1: nas skyes dang / kun nas skyes chen po'i me tog gi char gyi sprin kun nas mngon par bab po// spos chu'i char gyi sprin yang mngon par bab bo// de nas tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / brgya byin dang / 'jig
89b2: rten skyong ba dang / gnod sbyin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / ma mo'i gdon gyi tshogs dang / 'byung po dang / brjed byed dang / skem byed dang / sgrub pa dang / sprul 'dzin bcas dang / gnon po dang
89b3: ma mo dang / yi dgas dang / sha za dang / bram ze'i srin po dang / mkha' 'gro ma dang / phyogs dang / phyogs mtshams dang / mkhar dang / ri dang / sa'i lha la sogs pa sdang ba gdon bgegs dang / log 'dren thams cad dang /
89b4: de ma yin pa gzhan yang lha dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa dag bla gos rnams phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de
89b5: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das gang gis bdag cag gzir cing nye bar gzir bas rig sngags 'chang thams cad la dngos grub stsol pa dang / dam tshig thams cad 'dzin du 'jug pa la
89b6: yang dag par snang bar bgyid par 'gyur ba rang gi snying po 'di bdag cag la bstan du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs pa la sogs pa lha'i tshogs de dag la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ grogs po dag gang
89b7: gi phyir khyed cag 'di ltar sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir zhugs pa ni lags so legs so/ / de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang / ngas khyed rang gi snying po bstan par bya'o// de dag gis
89b8: kyang bcom ldan 'das la legs so legs so zhes gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i rnga bo che dang / rgya mtsho dang / sprin chen po'i sgra lta bu'i gsung tshangs pa chen po'i ska bas lhag pa sna tshogs pa snyan cing rgya che la zab
90a1: pa/ thog ma dang bar dang / tha mar dge ba/ sems can thams cad kyi snying du 'thad pa/ gsal ba/ 'jebs pa/ dag pa/ mnyen pa/ snyan pa/ brjod pa'i tshig khams gsum pa thams cad la go bar byed pa/ de
90a2: bzhin gshegs pa'i seng ge'i sgra bla na med pa des grub pa'i gsang sngags gzhi 'di dag gsungs so/ / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// r+NathA/
90a3: dza ya dza ya/ dza yA ba ha/ tsi li tsi lo/ mi li mi li/ lu Tu lu Tu/ dza ya bi dza ye/ dza yan ti/ bi dza yan ti/ a dzi te/ a pa rA tsi ti/ ta d+yi te/ sarba duSh+Ta pra duSh+Ta stam b+ha ni/ dzam b+ha ni/ mo ha ni/ shwa te ka rA le/ ke yU re/ sarba bud d+ha ad+hi/
90a4: Sh+NI te ban d+ha rA bA si ni/ bar+Na sha ba ri/ shI ye ma hA shI ye sarba ad b+hu ta ya shrI te/ pad ma mA li ni/ badz+ra ang gu shi/ badz+ra ma te/ badz+ra pA tA li/ shu'u li ni badz+ra d+hA re/ hi hi hi hi/ badz+ra pA Ni/ he he he he/ badz+ra pA Ni/ badz+ra shu'u li ni/ tsasa?
90a5: d+hi de/ hi hi/ badz+ra pA Ni te te badz+ra pA Ni/ hi hi hi hi/ he he he he/ badz+ra pA Ni/ ka la ka la/ ba la ba la/ ra la ra la/ d+ha ma d+ha ma/ sa ra sa ra/ hA hA hA hA hA/ tsi li me le tshi li/ di le/ di di la/ di mi le/ dza le/ ma hA dz+wa le/ dza li ti/ pra dz+wa li ti/
90a6: thar thag ge tha re/ mu gu te/ mu gu te/ k+Sha me/ k+Sha ma me/ grub pa'i tshogs kyis phyag byas ma/ lha thams cad kyi snying kun tu 'jug par byed ma/ sems can thams cad kyi snying 'bigs ma/ sdang ba rab tu sdang ba thams cad kyi/
90a7: snying 'jom ma/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po rjes su skyong ma/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi snying po la 'jug mtshur shog/ dam tshig rjes su skyongs shig/ sems can thams cad kyi snying rnams khug la
90a8: dam tshig la khod cig/ thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo swA hA// 'jig rten mkhyen pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo swA hA/ traT traT/ s+pho Ta ya swA hA/ byin du lha la swA hA/ rnam par lta la swA hA/ chu srin la sAr+tha/
90b1: sel sA / tshangs pa la swA hA/ khyab 'jug la swA hA/ drag pa rnams la swA hA/ brgya byin la swAhA/ 'jig rten sbyang ba rnams la swa hA/ thams cad la swA hA/ lha rnams la swA hA/ maM rnams la swA hA/ ma ma rnams la swAhA/
90b2: mtshan rnams la swA hA/ bgegs dang log 'dren rnams la swA hA/ sa la swA hA/ dbyangs can la swA hA// lha dang / ku dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang /
90b3: ltolho 'phye chen po thams cad dang / srin po la sogs pa 'ams gsum thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad la swA hA// chur sheg tshur shog/ dam tshig rjes su skyongs shig/ ku ru ku ru/ sa ra sa ra/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/
90b4: han han/ da ha da ha/ btsa la tsa/ hUM muM b+h+rUM/ tsaN Ta li/ ma tang gi/ pram+ba ni/ puk+ka si/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag la gsang sngags gzhi rnams grub par gyur cig swA hA// de bzhin gshes
90b5: pas rang gi snying po dang / lha thams cad kyi snying po 'di gsungs pa na thams cad dang ldan pa'i lha'i 'khor de 'jigs sngangs skrag par gyur nas/ chu shing gi tshal rlung drag po chen pos bskyod de rtsa ba bcad pa bzhin du g.yo
90b6: zhing 'gul la snying tshig ste/ rdo rje'i phur bus btab pa bzhin du gzugs shing zhigs la 'gre zhing skyabs btsal ba'i phyir 'du shes tsam gyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la 'bod pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
90b7: gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / rigs kyi bu lha'i 'khor 'di slong shig/ ngas dam tshig 'di yongs su 'dzin du gzhug go/ rig sngags grub pa 'byor par byed pa'i snying po la gzhol ba
90b8: bsgrags so/ / de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes gsang ba pa'i snying po 'dis lha'i 'khor de dag thams cad bslang ngo // dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon
91a1: chan pa lagan rje drug pa can po la phyag 'tshal la/ / sa ka ma kal badz+raka la ka la ya swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das 'din bdag gi snying pa ma chag tugasang pa lags te/ ga sngags thams cad 'grub dang /
91a2: bgyid pa lags so// ngas ni bdag kyang drangs nas gzhan gyis ma btang bar mchi'o// dbang mchi'o// dngos grub stsal bar bgyi'o// lung bzhin bgyi'o// bsrung bar bgyi'o// dpal bskyed par bgyi'o// bgegs dang log
91a3: 'dren thams cad rnam par gshig go/ / sems can thams cad gdul bar bgyi'o// byung po thams cad rnam par gshig par bgyi'o// nang thams cad gsal bar bgyi'o// sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ni ma gtos
91a4: so/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag gi snying po mchog tu gsang ba 'di ni 'di nas bskal pa grangs ma mchis pa gsum du dka' ba spyod pa chen po bgyed pa na gnod pa bgyid pa bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad kyi rnam par
91a5: gtses pa'i tshe/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgya mtsho mchog 'dzin me ltar blos rnam par bsgyings shing rnam par rol pa mngon shes dri zhing snang
91a6: dpal gyis bdag la bsrung ba'i slad du sprul to/ / gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes snying po mchog tu gsang ba 'di smras ma thag tu 'khor de thams cad bsam gtan gyi dga' ba dang bde bas tshim par
91a7: gyur te/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i dam tshig gi bstan pa la gnas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
91a8: zung shig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ 'dzin du chug shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston cig dang / des sems can mang po la yun ring por phan pa
91b1: dang / bde ba dang / tha mar de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes bla na med pa chags pa med pa/ sgrib pa med pa theb cing rtogs par 'gyur ro// su mas kyi rnam grangs 'di bachang ba dang / klog pa dang / 'dzin du bajug pa dang / kun chus
91b2: par byed pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa dang / mchod pa dang / yi ger 'dri ba dang / yi ger 'drir 'jug pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / nyan pa dang / sems pa de ring por mi thogs par bla na med pa
91b3: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ / 'di nas nam byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du ngan 'gro log par ltung bar 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro// rigs dpa' ba rnams su skye bar
91b4: mi 'gyur ro/ / dbul po'i rigs rnams su skye bar mi 'gyur te/ shes rab med par yang ma yin/ ma dul bar ma yin/ tshe thung bar ma yin zhing tshe rabs tshe rabs su tshe rabs dran par 'gyu ro// byang chub kyi sems
91b5: brjod par mi 'gyur ro/ / thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// rab tu dben pa la mngon par dga' bar 'gyur ro// 'khor ngan pa can ma yin par 'gyur ro// tshig bzung bar 'os shing snyan par 'gyur ro// bskal pa bzang zhing gzug
91b6: bzang bar 'gyur ro/ / shes rab chen po dang spobs pa chen po dang dbang dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par bya ba la mkhas par 'gyur ro// dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin par
91b7: 'gyur ro/ / sdig pa'i grogs po yongs su spong bar 'gyur ro// pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la mkhas par 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la mkhas par 'gyur ro// sangs
91b8: rgyas kyi zhing che zhing mtha' yas pal rdzu 'phrul dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ / nam byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du de byang chub kyi sems mi brjed par 'gyur ro// tshe 'di nyid la bgegs dang / log 'dren dang rig sngags
92a1: 'chang grub pa dang / 'byung po dag dang / gdon gyi tshogs dang / ma mo dang / yi dgas dang / sha za dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po
92a2: la sogs pa thams cad kyis mi thul bar 'gyur ro/ / de'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro// nang thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ma gtogs par 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi
92a3: 'gyur ro/ / de la rig sngags thams cad kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// de la lha thams cad kyang bsrung zhing sbed pa dang / yongs su skyob par 'gyur ro// de'i rtsom pa thams cad kyang sla bar 'gyur ro// 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten
92a4: las 'das pa dang dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi dam tshig la zhugs par 'gyur ro/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci
92a5: lags/ 'di ji ltar bzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de'i phyir khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi mchod pa'i sprin du bstan pa zhes bya bar zung shig/
92a6: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo sgrib pa med pa bskor ba zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi dbyings la mkhas pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad
92a7: 'jom par byed pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ bdud kyi phyogs 'dul ba zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la 'jug pa rab tu rtogs pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ dam pa'i chos kyi phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid
92a8: ces bya bar yang zung shig/ rig sngags dang / dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya dang / dam tshig thams cad la rab tu 'jog pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ lag na rdo rje'i rnam par thar pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi cho 'phrul zhes bya bar yang /
92b1: zug ga/ rdzar rab chen pa rtsam 'khang pa rtsegs pa'i gzungs shes bya bar yang zung shig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pakun da
92b2: bos bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la legs so zhes gsol te/ mngon par dga' nas cang mi smra bar gyur to// de nas byams pa la sogs pa bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
92b3: thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po la sogs pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa de dag thams cad dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang /
92b4: nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / ma dang mi ma yin pa de dag thams cad dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de bcom ldan 'das dang / lag na rdo rjes gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//
92b5: 'phags pa rdo rje'i ri rab chen po'i rtse mo'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po shI len dra bo d+ha dang / dz+nyA na sid d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad
92b6: gsar gcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa/ / // @#// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya badz+ra a dzi ti a na la pra mo ha nI nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa rdo rje mi pham pa me ltar rab tu rmongs byed ces
92b7: bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di sa bdag gis thos bdus gcigan/ bcom ldan 'das rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa can gyi ri'i gangs ri sul gyi
92b8: mchog/ ri rab kyi smad dang rked ltar gser gyi rdo sna tshogs kyis gang zhing re'ur bres pa 'bar ba/ rin po che'i rdo du ma'i 'od sna tshogs 'ja' lta bu byung ba'i rdo leb yangs pa/ me tog dri zhim po bkram zhing phye ma dang /
93a1: bdug pa dri zhim pa mang pos phug gi nang dang nags bsgos pa/ gdugs dang / a ga ru dang / bye ma dang / dril bu dang / bla res mdzes par byas pa'i ri bo mchog la bzhugs te/ den bcom ldan 'das lharnam
93a2: dang / lha'i bu rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / lha ma yin gyi bu rnams dang / rlung lha rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / srin po rnams dang / dri za rnam dang /
93a3: rig sngags 'chang grub pa rnams dang / 'byung po rnams dang / log 'dren rnams dang / sha za rnams dang / snang ba dang / mi snang ba'i ma mo'i tshogs khyab par byed pa rgya chen po dag gis dpag tshad lnga brgyar 'khor gyi dkyil
93a4: 'khor du gyur par 'dus te/ de na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bdun khri lnga stong dang / dge slong khri nyi stong lnga brgya dang thabs gcig go/ bcom ldan 'das ni chos ston te/ gnas par bde ba/ mnyan na bde ba/ 'khor
93a5: ba las nges par 'byung ba'i chos ston to/ / de na lha rnams dang / lha'i bu rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / lha ma yin gyi bu rnams dang / rlung lha rnams dang / rlung lha'i bu rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / klu
93a6: rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / srin po rnams dang / srin po'i bu rnam dang / dri za rnams dang / rig sngags 'chang grub pa rnams dang / 'byung po rnams dang / log 'dren rnams dang / sha za rnams
93a7: dang / sdang ba dang / mi snang ba'i ma mo'i tshogs rnams dang / 'byung po'i tshogs rnams dang / 'byung po'i tshogs rnams rnam par rgyu zhing ku co dang / 'jigs pa dang nyam thag pa'i sgra 'byin to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
93a8: gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas sgra de dag gsan nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / kye bzhin bzangs dag ci'i phyir ku co dang / 'jigs pa dang / nyam thag pa dang /
93b1: 'khrug pa'i sgra 'byin/ de dag gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi dbang du bgyis te/ gnod pa dang / drang bas bkug cing drangs te tho tsams na/ bcom ldan 'das bskyab du gsol/ 'di skad ces
93b2: gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad kyi steng gi dkyil 'khor yangs pa ston pa'i mchog gi blo gros dang / blo dang / las dang / las kyi mtha' dang ldan pa/ sa chen po las gzhan thob pa rgyal tshab du nye ste
93b3: chos kyi rgyal srid la dbang bskur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rjes su dgongs par mdzad pa tsam gyis 'ongs te/ rdo rje'i zom ltar dpung mgo yangs pa/ rdo rje ltar mkhregs pa'i cod pan 'od zer
93b4: 'tsher ba can/ rdo rje'i dpung rgyan dang ldan pa/ lus 'khregs shing sra ba dang / lag na rdo rje dang / zhags pa dang / lag na brtan po 'bar ba thogs pa/ rdo rje phur bu sra bas rab tu 'dzem par byed pa/ mthu chen po g.yog/
93b5: bzhi 'bum lnga khri dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'di kun du snang bar byed cing / rdo rje'i rigs kyi gzhon nu dang / rdo rje'i be con dang / rdo rje'i snying po dang / rdo rje'i tog dang / rdo rje'i snang ba dang / rdo rje sngon po dang / rin po
93b6: che'i rdo rje dang / gsang ba'i rdo rje dang / 'khor lo rdo rje la sogs pa dang / rdo rje'i dmag dpon chen po rnams dang / dmag spyod rnams dang / sa skyong rnams dang / rdo rje rig pa'i rgyal po yang dag pa dang / yang dag pa ma yin pa
93b7: yang dag par rtogs pa rnams dang / rdo rje'i yul rnams dang / rdo rje rnam par 'dren rnams dang lhan cig tu rdo rje gzhon nu'i gdon rnams dang / rdo rje gnon po rnams dang / rdo rje rmi la mngan byed rnams yang dag par
93b8: skul/ rnam par skul zhing 'khor gyi khyams chen por 'dus pa thams cad la kun tu snang bar byed/ rnam par snang bar byed/ gsal bar byed/ rnam par gsal bar byed/ rab tu dga' bar byed/ yang dag par skul
94a1: so sor skul zhing bcom ldan 'das ga la ba dar song ste/ bla gos phud nas zhabs la cod pan gyis gtugs te lan gsum du bskor ba byas nas thal mo sbyar te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// de nas
94a2: bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su yi rang ba mdzad de/ rdo rje 'chang khyod song la lha rnams dang / lha'i bu rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / lha ma yin gyi bu rnams dang / rlung lha rnams dang / rlung lha'i bu rnams dang /
94a3: nam mkha' lding rnams dang / nam mkha' lding gi bu rnams dang / 'dus pa chen po'i bar dag sgra 'byin cing nyam thag pa myong ba rnams kyi bsam pa rdzogs par gyis shig/ de nas rdo rje 'chang stan las langs te/
94a4: lha dang / lha ma yin dang / rlung lha dang / nam mkha' lding dang / 'byung po'i tshogs kyi nang du song nas rjes su ston cing rdo rje mtshon cha'i me sgron zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rdzu 'phrul gyis stong
94a5: gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su me lce 'bar ba'i 'od 'phro ba dang / me stag rnam par 'phro ba dang / lte 'bebs pa'i klog rnams kyis 'jig rten gyi khams rnams gzir to// de nas bskal
94a6: pa chen po lngar rmi lam dang / chu dang / gang gA'i klung gi bye ma'i grangs kyi tshad tsam dag gis mdangs dang / gzi brjid dang / tshangs par spyod pa dang / gtsang ma dang / bzod pa dang / tshul khrims dang / brtul zhugs
94a7: dang / dka' thub dang / rang gi longs spyod thams cad las byung ba'i las grub pa'i rdo rje de byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje de'i log tu byin to// de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gsung rab
94a8: kyi chos ston par gyur pa dgra bcom pa rnams kyi chos dang / tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / snying rje byed
94b1: pa/ rang gi rdo rje dang / rigs kyi rig pa dang / dkyil 'khor dang / klags pa'i tshul du gyur pa drag po dang / dbang po dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / lus ngan dang / rlung lha dang / nam mkha' lding gdul dka' rnams 'dul
94b2: bste/ de ltar de las byung ba'i bcom ldan 'das khro bo drag po rnams rmongs par byed pa/ sgra dang ldan pa rnams rmugs par byed pa dang / sdang ba rnams spyod pa/ rmongs pa rnams 'jig pa/ dam po rnams cad nas
94b3: 'don pa/ rgyas pa rnams sbur mar glog pa/ yon po rnams spong ba/ gcod pa rnams snying rjes byed pa/ 'byung po rnams skrag par byed pa/ srin po rnams sngags par byed pa rang gi gsang sngags rnams rdzogs par byed pa
94b4: gzhan gyi gsang sngags rnams phur bus 'debs pa/ nus pa rnams ston par byed pa/ gsod par byed pa gsod pa/ gnod par byed pa phung bar byed pa/ de der song nas lha rnams dang / lha'i bu rnams dbang du byed de/ de
94b5: ltar drag po ba drag po grub pa dang / khyab 'jug pa khyab 'jug grub pa dang / lha ma yin pa lha ma yin grub pa dang / de dag spyir skul zhing dkyil 'khor du 'jug/ skyod par byed/ mthu ston par byed/ brjed par byed/ rnam
94b6: par skrag par byed do/ / stobs bcus dgongs pa bka' stsal pa'i rdo rje 'chang gis rdo rje mi pham pa me ltar rab tu rmongs byed ces bya ba'i gzungs gsung ba dang / gzungs 'di'i stobs dang / bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis
94b7: 'od kyi 'od zer gyi dkyil 'khor chen po las byung ba'i 'od zer rnams kyi rdo rje dang bcas pa'i lag na rdo rje bskul nas/ 'od des de rab tu dga' ste/ rdo rje las snang ba bkye ba rnams kyis gsum gyi ston gyi skar ma dang /
94b8: zla ba'i 'od du brlag par byas nas snang ba gcig pur byed cing rgya mtsho chen po ni skems/ ri'i rgyal po re rab ni g.yo bar byed/ glog gi 'khor lo dang / lce 'bebs pa'i 'brug ni bsgrags/ sgra drag po ni phyung //
95a1: bsgyings pa'i sgra ni bsgrags/ skrag par byas so// de na rdo rje mi pham pa me ltar rab tu rmongs byed ces bya ba'i gzugs me lce 'od 'phro chen po kho na 'dug pa/ sgra tshegs gser dang rin po che 'dra ba/ rdo rje 'chang
95a2: b a rdo rje'i bu mo zhes bya ba'i bcom ldan 'das ma des lan gsum bskor ba byas nas yid las ches mgyogs pa'i shugs 'od 'phro zhing 'bar ba lta bur drag pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdzu 'phrul
95a3: chen po la skyabs su song ngo / / de 'ongs pa dang / 'phags pa rdo rje 'chang gis smras pa/ skal pa chen po dge ma de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis sems dang ldan ma/ 'di dag la lag cha dang 'thun par bya ba'i stobs
95a4: byin cig/ de nas gzungs kyis smras pa/ 'di dag bka' stsal pa de bzhin du bgyi'o// zhes lan gsum tshig tu smras so// thor tshugs gsum ma/ sa gsum dang / dus gsum dang / drag po'i rtse gsum dang / khyab 'jug
95a5: gi 'khor lo dang / gshin rje'i be con dang / lus ngan gyi dbyug tho dang / dbang po'i rdo rje dang / chu lha'i zhags pa dang / log 'dren rnams kyi bgegs dang / lha ma yin rnams kyi sku dang / rlung lha rnams kyi gzi dang / shugs dang /
95a6: grub pa rnam kyis rmongs byedad / ma me'i tshogs rnams kyi gcod pa dang / klu rnams kyi dam tshig dang / dug dang / khro bo dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / mi 'am ci dang / sha za dang / 'byung po dang / tshangs pa'i srin po dang / grul
95a7: bum dang / bden bral dang / gnon po dang / ro langs kyi skabs su rgol ba rnams dang / de bzhin du thams cad kyang sbyongs shig/ mig gi 'dzum pa tsam gyis yud tsam la thams cad mchod nas lag na rdo rje la
95a8: snying po 'di phul te smras pa/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje drag po la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ ta thA ga ta sa mA d+hi d+hA ra Ni/ ma hA a ba ra ta yi sh+ya mi/ a hi/
95b1: 6/ hraTal/ ku Ti bA ba gA ku la shi le/ ka ba lag / 6tsa ma ne/ karbaN mu Ti bad Ti badz+re/ ma hA bi rdul la lo// bu gu bu la?/ pra mu pra ma?/ sa ra sa ra/ phaT phaT/ su r+ya te/ bidag la cata/ btsam rdul ba
95b2: le/ sarba de bag na/ pra ha ra Na mA yA/ sid d+ha dA yi ge/ su ru ka/ ku ru ke/ badz+ra go Ne/ badz+ra DiD+ha/ pA ra pra ha ra Ne radan tra ya/ dkral bud d+ha te/ badz+ra d+ha ra bi shwa sa ni ga/ a pra ti ha ta pra marda ni swA hA// gang gsang
95b3: sngags 'di rjes su dran nas klog gam/ sgom 'am/ 'dzin pa des thos na ngan 'gro leg par ltung bar 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro// 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad la mchod pa
95b4: byas par 'gyur ro/ / dam tshig dang phyag rgya la zhugs par 'gyur ro// bsam pa dang rjes su yi rang bas 'gug par byed do// dug dang / gsang sngags dang / mdud pa dang / rdeg pa dang / 'ching ba'i 'jigs pa la sogs
95b5: rnam par skrag par byed do/ / de nas lha dang / lha'i bu de dag gi de'i mthus bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang de'i rnam par rol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa rnam pa mang po du ma yang myong ba nas steng gi
95b6: gnas gtsang ma dang / 'og min gyi lha dang / 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan na gnas pa dag gis 'od dang ldan pa'i me tog dang / bdug pa'i sprin dang / rin po che mang po'i char rgya chen pos mchod nas ston pa snyan
95b7: pas bstod de/ snyan cing zab la rnga sgra lta bu dang / bsil ba dang / bsod nams kyi tshigs su bcad pa dag kyang smras so// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag dang / byang chub
95b8: sems dpa' de dag dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa rdo rje mi pham pa me ltar rab tu rmongs byed ces bya ba'i
96a1: gzungs rdzogs s+ho/ / // rgya gar gyi mkhan po 'dzin mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la
96a2: pab pa/ / 6// rgya gar skad du/ badz+ra sUk+Sha a pra ta ta ta nA ma d+ha ra NAM/ bod skad du/ rdo rje phra ma thogs pa med pa zhes byi ba'i gzungs// sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad
96a3: la phyag 'tshal lo/ / bde gshegs khro bo thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// sangs rgyas
96a4: kyi mthus gsang ba'i bdag po rdo rje hUM zhes bya bas bzhin rab tu 'bar ba bstan te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'dug go/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyi sprul pa las bram ze'i khye'u gcig
96a5: zung ste/ gsang ba'i bdag po la 'di skad ces smras so// gsang ba'i bdag po rig pa'i bdag po/ gzungs kyi bdag po/ lha gnas gsum po dag na lha nyam chung ba dang / klu nyam chung ba la zil gyis gnon pa drag pos
96a6: rab tu gzhom pa'i gsang sngags dang / rig sngags/ gzungs sngags rnams rab tu brjod du gsol/ lag na rdo rjes smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang / nga yis bde gshegs khro bo thams
96a7: cad kyis rtag tu brjod pa'i yang snying 'di rab tu smras so/ / na mo radan tra yA ya/ na ma tsan Da badza pa Na ye/ ma hA yak+Sha sa nA ba tA ye tad+yaSh+Tha/ oM ha ra ta ra badz+ra/ mtha ma tha badz+ra/ d+han d+hun badz+ra/ dA had ta badz+ra/ bcabatsabAH
96a8: d+har d+ha ra badz+ra/ dA ra ya dA ra ya badz+ra/ dA ru Na dA ru Na badz+ra/ ts+tshin d+hats+tshin d+ha badz+ra/ b+hind b+hi nad badz+ra hU~M phaT thA/ na ma sh+tsaN Da badz+ra kro d+ha yA/ hu lu hu lu/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ban d+ha ban d+ha/ hA na hA na/ a mri ta hUM phaT thA// bram ze'i
96b1: be'u gang la la zhag gis bde gshegs bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i cha bzung ste/ khro bo thams cad kyi rdo rje'i tshig 'di rab tu smra zhing / ba spu'i bug thams cad nas rdo rje phra mo grangs med pa sprul te phyogs bcur spros na/ sems can
96b2: thams cad kyi bag chags ngan pa byang / tshe dang bsod nams rab tu rgyas te/ dgra dang / drug dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba las rnam par thar nas/ gang zhig gis dmigs pa'i rgol ba ngan pa la ci ma gad+ha sprin gyis
96b3: bshig pa 'am/ skyu rur rlon pa gser gyis bzhibs pa bzhin du dmigs te/ rdo rje'i tshig 'di smra zhing / rdo rje phra mo spros pas de dag gi phung po lnga dang po lnga myur du rlag par 'gyur ro// lhas smras na lha'i zla ba gcig gam/ lo
96b4: ldan lha ma yin mgo 'gas par 'gyur ro/ / dge slong gis smras pa/ bdud kyi mtshon cha rnams myur tu btul bar 'gyur ro// mis brjod na gang la dmigs pa de mi'i zla ba gcig gam/ mi'i lo ldan nges par
96b5: brlag par 'gyur ro/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis lag na rdo rje dang / bram ze'i khye'u la legs so zhes bya ba byin nas mi snang bar gyur to// de nas bram ze'i khye'u des tshangs pa'i skad phyung ste/ rdo rje'i tshig 'di lha gnas
96b6: gsum por bsgrags so/ / rdo rje phra mo thogs pa med pa'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho// / @#// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya da sha badz+ra pA NIn hri da ya/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa lag na rdo rje bcu'i snying po// sangs rgyas
96b7: rang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na
96b8: bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje bcu'i ming shes sam//
97a1: rus shes sam/ gsang sngags shes pa de la byad kyis mi tshugs so// gnod sbyin dag/ rnam par 'tsho bar mi 'gyur ro// srin po rnams dang / lhag ma za ba rnams dang / gdugs pa rnams 'tsha bar mi
97a2: 'gyur ro/ / phyis 'jog pa rnams kyang gnod par mi 'gyur ro// tad+yathA/ u ki ri ma ki ri/ mi rI tsa ba sha ba ri/ i li me/ mi li ma/ i la mi/ mi li me/ i li me/ mi li me/ i li mi li me/ heg ke d+hig ke tug /
97a3: d+hud+hu / pra d+ha rer/ a lam pa le/ pA lam pa le/ khu lu me ti/ ku me ku me/ khi ri khi ri/ sA d+ha sA d+ha/ sarba ba ga kA le/ ban d+ha ma bag kA le/ kun dga' bo gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje bcu po
97a4: 'di dag la rtag tu bdag gi phyi bzhin du 'brang bar gyur nas bdag nyid log pa dang / myos pa dang / rab tu myos pa yang bsrung ba dang / yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su bzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi
97a5: ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur bar byed par bcom ldan 'das kyi bkas gsol ba thob shig/ 'di lta ste rgyal ba khyu mchog dang / 'brog gnas dang / gangs gnas dang / lngam rtsen dang / nor bu bzang po dang
97a6: grags pa bzang ba dang / lus ngan gyi bus mdzes byed dang / phreng ba mdzes dang / rgyal po chen po chos skyong rnam thos kyi bu ste/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje bcu po 'di dag la rtag tu bdag gi phyi
97a7: bzhin 'brang bar gyur nas bdag gnyid kyis log pa dang / myos pa dang / rab tu myos pa na yang bsrung ba dang / yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su bzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs
97a8: su 'gyur bar byed par bcom ldan 'das kyi bkas gsol ba thob shig/ gsang sngags gzhi 'di rnams grub par gyur cig swA hA// tad ya thA/ sa ra sa ra ne swA hA/ de la lag na rdo rje bcu po de dag gi
97b1: gsang sngags gzhi rnams ni 'di dag yin te/ tad+ya thA/ u ge ta/ ke te/ sad ka ta/ ud du le/ d+ha d+he/ ta te/ ta bad ta swA hA/ tsitsi tsi tsi/ tsi khe lo tshon ne/ b+he d+ha ni/ sarba bir+ya tshed ni/ sarba kri ta/ ka kho rdo/ bar
97b2: kri ta nA sha ni/ de la rig sngags kyi rgyal po lag na rdo rje bcu po de dag gi gsang sngags gzhi dam pa ni 'di rnams yin no// tad+ya thA/ a le la k+She/ ba ke le lak+Sha/ a ka/ bak+Sha/ lak+te s+phAt+ma/ tad+ya thA/ hud+ha huH/
97b3: hutu tra/ bi tu bi tu/ bi tu tu/ gats+tsha ga ts+tsha/ sab te/ ba ta ha ta ye swA hA/ na mo b+ha ga bA te bud d+ha s+ya sid d+han tu man tra ba rA swA hA// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga'
97b4: khe dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa lag na rdo rje bcu'i snying po rdzogs s+ho//
97b5: rgya gar gyi mkhan po dza na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// @6// rgya gar skad du/ badz+ra dur+N+Na nA ma nA ga sa ma ye
97b6: bod skad du/ rdo rje mchu zhes bya ba dam tshig go// thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das grong khyer chen po g.yeg 'dor na bzhugs te/ 'khor 'dus pa chen po 'jog po la sogs
97b7: pa klu'i 'khor dang / lha dang mi'i tshogs kyi 'khor chen po la sems can rnams kyi don chen po'i phyir te/ bsam pa dang re ba thams cad yongs su skong pa bde bar byed pa'i chos ston to// til dang 'bras
97b8: skrod pa dge bar byed pa'i chos ston to/ / de nas grong khyer de nas bram ze'i khye'u khyab ma spyan zhes bya ba phyug pa nor che ba/ longs spyod che ba/ rdzas dang yo byad dmang po phun sum tshogs pa/ rig byed dang
98a1: reg byed kyi yan lag gi pha rol tu phyin pa/ sngags la 'jug pa/ sngags grub pa zhig 'dug ste/ de yang yang dang yang du klu 'gugs zhing ma'i spyan bsreg byed do// bram ze da'al tag smin kar
98a2: char chad par gyur nas/ des nga rgyal gyi sgras sngags brjod pa dang mthun pas 'di skad ces bdag gis char rab rgyun dbab cing klu dgug par bya'o// zhes smras te/ des me'i sbyin bsreg bya bar bshams nas tal
98a3: dang / 'bras dang / yungs kar rnams 'bru mar tsha ba dang bsregs te sbyin pasreg byed do// de nas klu mi bsrun pa zhig gi gzugs byas te/ des ljags kyi phur bul bsngags nas klu'i spyi bor btab pa dang / klur
98a4: spyiskye bogs nas sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba chen por gyur to/ / klu de yang cher 'khrugs te khros nas skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la klus khyab par byed pa'i shugs kyis cher gnod cing rdul 'byung ba'i 'od zer
98a5: ba rang gi lus las bkye ste gnod pa chen pos khebs par byas nas bram ze de'i zhing tshig par byas so/ / de yang lce 'bab pa'i char gyi rgyun chen po bram ze'i lus la phab nas bram ze de mgon med/ skyabs
98a6: med/ dpung gnyen med de/ me'i sbyin bsreg byed pa btang nas/ de bcom ldan 'das la mgon dang skabs dang dpung gnyen btsal te 'bros par bsams nas bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du brgyugs te//
98a7: bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs te 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das klu khro bdag gi srog ma rungs par bgyid par 'tshal te skyabs su
98a8: yang ma mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das bskyab du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa bskyab du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze chen po de dbugs phyung nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bram ze
98b1: chen po ma 'jigs shig/ ngas khyod kyi mgon dang / skabs dang / dpung gnyen bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas cang mi gsung bar bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag nardo
98b2: rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das gzigs su gsol/ mngon sum du gyur bzhin du yang klu mi bgrangs pas lo tenam rungs par bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das khyod yongs su mya ngan las 'das
98b3: kyi slad na srad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus na sems can thams cad kyi rten ni su lags/ ji ltar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das lo tog thams cad kyi don du lo tog rnams tshim par 'gyur ba dang / kun du/ bsrung ba dang / rab
98b4: tu 'phel bar bgyid par gyur pa lo tog yongs su skyong zhing klu bzlog pa de bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba'i bdag pa lagan rdo rje la bka' stsal to// lag na rdo rjes klu rab tu 'gro bar
98b5: b yed pa'i snying po sbas pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i gzungs de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po dang phyag rgya sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs pa yod
98b6: dengs bshad par bya'o/ / des myur du gnod pa bkag pa'i phyir lo tog thams cad myur du bskyed par 'gyur ro// legs par bsrungs par 'gyur/ me'i ri sul chen po so so phyogs bcu kun nas klu thams
98b7: cad kyi mtshams bcad par 'gyur ro ma kyil 'i ma pa blon chen pa rnam mkha' lding 'dab mi gdangs pa'i shugs zhes bya ba'i sprin gyi rim pas nam mkha' khebs par byed do/ / ya tog dang / me tog dang
98b8: 'bras bu thams cad kun tu bsrung ste gnas par 'gyur ro/ / ngas kA la sags pa thams cad kun du rab tu 'bar bar 'gyur ro// klum bgrangs pa rnams zung bar 'gyur ro// 'dum par 'gyur ro//
99a1: de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis sems can thams cad la sman pa'i slad du gzungs chen po 'di'i sngags
99a2: kyi tshig bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snying po 'di bka' stsal to// na mo b+ha ga ba te/ sarba bud d+ha nAn/ na mo b+ha ga ba te shAkya rA dza ya/ oM dz+wa la dz+wa la/ ga rI ba r+d+ha ni/ ta ba tha be ga ma hA pa
99a3: re b+ha ga ba te sa hA tsaN Da hri ya sa la ni/ hu ru hra rA/ ha ra ha ra/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ sarba s+ya na sha ya/ nA ga ku la pad shan d+ha ra d+ha ra pra sa ra tsaN Da be ka ma hA ba la ba rakra ma su ri ta ro dra bag pra/ ma tha ma u0f7f/ pra
99a4: dz+wa la mA la d+hA ra NI/ tsaN Da be ga ba te/ tha ba ra bi san d+hA ra Ni/ hUM hAM/ ba la ba ti/ be ga ba ti/ sa ra sa ra/ bi sa ra bi sa ra/ sa ran ti/ sarba sa dri s+ya na nA ma dri ba na ya dri/ bu ya pha la phaT/ dra san d+hA ra NI/ a ba
99a5: marban du sarba nA ga to sha sarba ba b+ha ba b+ha ni/ ba ga ta be ge ba ti swA hA/ hUM hU~M phaT/ nA ga bi sa ra ni phaT/ dz+wa la mA li ni phaT/ dz+wa la ma li ni phaT/ phaT phaT phaT swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis klu thams cad dang /
99a6: klu mi bgrangs pa thams cad ma rungs par byed pa'i rig pa 'di bshad ma thag tu klu dang klu chen po thams cad glad pa na bar gyur/ lus rul te lus rnags shing dri mi zhim par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
99a7: gnyis la gtugs te 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'ad lngas kyi tshig shin tu mi bzang ba dag bka' stsal to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis nongs pa bgyis mi dran dul gagyis kyang / bcom ldan 'das rig
99a8: 'dzin gnod pa bgyid pas bdag cag la brnyas pa dang / rdeg pa dang / 'ching pa dang / skrod pa dang / gnad pa de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das klu mi bkrungs pa rnams 'khrugs te/ de'i tshe lo tog dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu ma
99b1: rungs par bgyid/ ser pa 'bab par bgyid/ sad dang klung gi 'khrug pa bgyid/ ha cang char che ba dang / char mi 'bab pa dang / dus ma lags par char bab par bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das rig pa 'dzin pa
99b2: sngags sbas pas byams pa la gnas par bgyi/ byams pa'i go bgo bar bgyi/ byams pa'i ral gri lag na thogs par bgyi ste/ byams pas gnod pa bgyid pa thams cad zhi bar bgyid do// bcom
99b3: ldan 'das deng slan chad de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar bdag cag dam bca' bar 'tshal te/ gang na rig pa'i rgyal mo 'di rab tu spyod pa der bcom ldan 'das klu gtse bar mi bgyid do// gang na snying po'i
99b4: gzungs 'dis bsrung bar bgyis pa dang / yongs su sgrub pa dang / yongs su bzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang bar bgyis pa dang / srad bu bro ba dang / mtshams dgum pa dang / dkyil 'khor gyis ris gcad par
99b5: bgyis pa der bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis rtag par rgyun du gnod pa thams cad bzlog par bgyi 'tshal lo/ / le tog dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu thams cad kun du bsrung bar 'tshal lo// yongs su
99b6: bskyang bar 'tshal lo/ / tha na rkun po dang / g.yo can dang / ri dgas dang / bya rnams kyang kun du bsrung bar 'tshal te/ slad kyis kyang ma rungs par mi bgyid do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i bdag po de
99b7: dag la legs so zhes bya ba gnang ste/ klu'i bdag po dag legs so legs so// khyed kyis de ltar gyis shig/ khyed kyis 'dzam bu'i gling legs par bsrungs pas bsrung bar gyis shig/ de nas de'i 'og tu
99b8: cho gar bya ba las thams cad byed pa dge bar bya ba brjod par bya'o/ / lo tog la gnod par byed na de'i tshe rig pa 'dzin pas shing gi dbus sam/ khang stong ngam/ gnas mthon por dkyil 'khor gru bzhi
100a1: u0f7f/ / pa byas la phyogs bzhir bum pa ga bani bzhag go// me tog sil mas gcal bkram ste bzhag go/ gzugs 'khyil pa bdun bya'o// 'bras las byas pa'i 'khyil pa bdun byas te/ gzus
100a2: re re zhing yang gzungs nyi shu rtsa re bya'o/ / 'bras dang 'o thug bsres pa dang / zho dang / 'o ma bzhag par bgyi'o// phyogs bzhir dril bu gzhag par bya'o// pad ma lta bur zan gya gtor ma snga ma bzhin bzhag
100a3: par bya'o/ / dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bum pa chen po bzhag ste ba las byung ba lnga dang / 'o ma dang chus dgang ngo // yungs kar dang / 'bras yos blugs par bya'o// sngags lan drug cur yongs su
100a4: bzlas par bya'o/ / seng ldeng gi phur bu bzhi dang / lcags kyi phur bu gcig bya ste/ thams cad sor brgyad kyi tshad du bya'o// ba ser skya'i lci ba 'am/ bag phye las byas pa'i klu'i gzugs bzhi bya ste/ dkyil
100a5: 'khor gyi grwa bzhir bzhag par bya'o/ / seng ldeng gi phur bu de dag kyang snying gar nub par gzugs so// sngags brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas par bya'o// shar phyogs su klu mgo bdun pa bzhag par bya'o//
100a6: nub phyogs su mgo brgyad pa'o// lho phyogs su mgo lnga pa'o// byang phyogs su mgo gsum pa'o// dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su mgo dgu pa bzhag par bya'o// pog por re re ste lnga bzhag par bya'o// yungs kar
100a7: dang / za'o yongs su bsres pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pa byas te/ phyogs bzhir gtor ro// gzungs 'di bris la rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te dkyil 'khor gyi grwa bzhir gzugs so// zhing
100a8: gi dbus yang gzugs so/ / bskyed mos tshal gyi dbus su yang gzugs so// de gtsugs ma thag tu phyogs bzhi kun nas ri sul chen pos mtshams bcad par 'gyur ro// ji srid du phur bu ma byang ba
100b1: de srid du mtshams bcad pa chen por 'gyur ro/ / le tog thams cad dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu thams cad legs par bsrungs par 'gyur ro// tha na 'dab ma cig kyang skams par mi 'gyur na/
100b2: yal ga dang / sdong bu skams par 'gyur ba lta ci smos/ srog chags kyi rigs ri dgas dang / bya thams cad kyang kha bcings par 'gyur ro// ma rungs par byed kyang mi nus so// gnas der rlung
100b3: dang / sprin dang / ser ba dang / sad dang dus ma yin pa'i rlung gis kyang ma rungs par byed mi nus so// klu'i gnod pa byas kyang ma rungs par byed mi nus so// ma rung ba zhig tu gyur na de yang slar rtas par
100b4: 'gyur ro/ / yang stobs dang / rtas pa dang / 'ongs yod par 'gyur ro// bum pa chen po nang na yod pa de yang / zhing dang kun dga' ra ba dang / bskyed mos tshal gyi phyogs bzhi kun du gtor bar byas
100b5: na srog chags thams cad med par 'gyur ro/ / sbrul dang / byi ba dang / ne'u le dang / byi dur dang / dom dang / sbal pa dang / sha sbrang dang / sbrang bu dang / byi ba dang / 'dab chags rnams med par 'gyur ro//
100b6: grog srur thams cad med par 'gyur ro// tha na phye ma leb la sogs pa yang nam yang mi 'byung ngo // drod gsher las skyes pa dang / rdzus te skyes pa dang / sgo nga las skyes pa'i bar gyis kyang ma
100b7: rungs par byed mi nus so/ / rlan dang me tog las skyes pa'i srog chags kyi rnam pa dag kyang phur bu ma byung gi bar du nam yang mi 'byung ngo // phur bu ma byung gi bar du klu'i nyes pa rnam pa sna tshogs mi
100b8: 'byung zhing rab tu 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ / bde ba dang lo legs pa dang / lo tog dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu thams cad yongs su 'grub par 'gyur ro// ro zhom pa dang 'jam par 'gyur ro// klu
101a1: thams cad kyang rtag par rgyun du bsrung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sred par byed par 'gyur ro// phye ma la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas par byas/ kha tog dang / me tog dang / 'dab ma dang / shing dz+nyA/
101a2: pa rnams la gtor na srog chags thams cad lhung zhing med par 'gyur ro// srin bu traM ma bu ka dang / trai la ta dang / sbrul gdug pa dang / kang brgyad pa dang / srog chags kyi rigs gzhan dag kyang phur bu
101a3: ma byung gi bar du med par 'gyur ro/ / mi 'byung bar 'gyur ro// zhing gi phyogs bzhi shi ba'i las bya ste/ nas dang / gro dang / til dang / nyungs dkar dang / 'bras dang mar bsres te sbyin bsreg byas na zhi ba
101a4: chen por 'gyur ro/ / tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song bdag gis kyang ma rungs par byed mi nus so// gzungs 'di dang / cho gar bya ba 'byung ba mtha' dag bri bar bya ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / dra
101a5: srong chen po nyes 'dor dang / rdo rje 'dzin bris la rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te gnas mthon por gzugs so// gtor ma dang / me tog dang / bdug pa yang dbul lo// seng ldeng gi phur bu sor brgyad
101a6: pa la lan stong yongs su bzlas par byas te/ khang steng du btsugs na rlung dang / sad dang / sprin dang / ser pa thams cad thub par 'gyur ro// lo tog dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / 'dab ma ma rungs par/
101a7: byed pa'i srog chags rnams med par 'gyur te/ sha sbrang dang / sbrad bu dang / pi tsi li ka dang / byi ba dang / sbrang ma dang / traM ma bu ka dang / trai la ta dang / bi sha ki ta ka dang / nya phyis can dang nya dang la mi ka dang / sbal
101a8: ba dang / ne'u la dang / phag dang / kan ti ka dang / seng ge dang / rkang mangs dang / rkang gcig pa dang / ru sbal dang / grog mo dang / sbrang rtsi'i sbrang ma dang / thang gi sbrang ma dang / bung ba dang / nag po dang / shang ga ni ka
101b1: dang / sa'i 'og nas byung ba dang / ma lu shi ka dang / 'ug pa dang / byi ba dang / mchu rings la sogs pa'i srog chags kyi rigs thams cad med par 'gyur ro// mi 'byung bar 'gyur ro// thams cad phud par 'gyur/
101b2: ro// bya rog dang / bye'u dang / khrag rta dang / phug ron dang / mu du ri ka dang / 'ug pa dang / kha na dza na dang / ne'u tsho dang / ri skegs la sogs pa thams cad med par 'gyur ro// sngags 'dis phur bu la yongs su bzlag
101b3: par bya ste phyogs bcing ngo / / na mo bud d+hA ya/ oM ki li mo li tsan De/ me re li/ tsaN Da tsaN De ban d+ha ya swA hA/ de nas drang srong chen po nyes 'dor bcom ldan 'das dang ha cang mi ring bzhig na 'dug pas gzungs
101b4: 'di thos nas de bstan las langs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag gi srog chags kyi rigs gnod par
101b5: sems pa/ rab tu gnod par sems pa/ dug 'chang ba lo tog dang me tog dang 'bras bu dang / 'dab ma dang / sdong bu dang / rtsa ba ma rungs par bgyid pa thams cad kyi kha bcing bar bgyi'o// bzlog par bgyi'o// bsdigs
101b6: par bgyi'o/ / phyogs bzhi kun nas dpag tshad du mtshams bcad pa chen po bgyi'o// kun tu bsrung bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus na gnod par sems pa/ rab tu gnod par
101b7: sems pa thams cad bzlog par bgyi'o/ / sngags kyi tshig rjes su stsal bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad kyi don dang / bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du de byin gyis brlab du gsol/
101b8: bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// drang srong chen po des byin gyis brlabs kyis sems can thams cad kyi don dang / lo tog dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / ldum ra yongs su bsrung
102a1: shatha gsas kya ga a d+ha gag/ dadas drang mang can po nams kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi smra par 'dug nas 'di skad ces smras so// namaHga/ u0f7f dzA ga tAthAg
102a2: na a katA ya/ ma hA na la/ tsaT+Ta/ DA ma num/ la tsar tsar/ tsam li/ ban d+ha / rA sha ni/ data Sh+Tha/ pu p+'u ri tsa re/ sarba Sh+TAn pan d+hani dran da can d+ha ni sar par ni/ k+Shuk+Shany+dza/ ma ni tha bas
102a3: ta la dz+wa la/ te d+ha ti/ sa ra ma ni/ sa ran du/ barba pA pA bA na ka kA d+ha li swA hA/ drang srong chen po nyis 'dor gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar rig pa 'di smras ma thag tu klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / sbyin
102a4: dod par thams dpa' de dag tham pacad khas bub du 'brel nas bcom ldan 'das la ka kyis gas mthon pos smre sngags 'don te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag sa rung lags so// nga tho
102a5: dmod pa zab par gyur to/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag cag drang srong gi dmod pa'i mas tshig go// kun du tshig go// bcom ldan 'das shAkya bdag cag slan chad 'dzam bu'i gling du mams can rnams la rnam par
102a6: bar mi bgyid do/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag cag blan cad po tog dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / 'dab sa ma rungs par mi bgyid do// thog gas kyi rigs thams cad bzlog par bgyid do// bcom ldan
102a7: kyide ga ga ma 'i bdag po dag kyis rnyen gas sheg/ das pa byung pa'i sems can thams cad la tog dang / me tog dang / 'azas zu dang / 'dags dang las kA pa
102a8: sel par gyur brjes sasmras pa/ de na pa drang thong can po des cho gar bya ba smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'a shar phyogs su bltas te mchis la/ rig pa drang tha~Mng can pon snying po 'di ril bzing ga
102b1: bcus la lan brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas pa bgyi ste/ drang srong gi mi smra bas phyogs bzhir gtor bar bgyi'o// a ba sa ra sa ra sha ba ta ba dA ma/ hri da ya grod/ a ba mu ka ban d+ha ya/ pra na tsa ra/ su mu ru
102b2: tsa la swA hA/ / sngags 'di lan bdun stong bzlas pa bgyi ste/ bzlas pa tsam gyis klu gnod par sems pa thams cad tsha bas gdungs par 'gyur ro// rkang gnyis pa dang / rkang bzhi pa'i bar gyi srog chags
102b3: kyi rigs thams cad dmod pas gdungs par gyur te thams cad 'byer ro/ / slar yang phyogs der khe tog la gnod pa mi bgyid do// srog chags kyi rigs thams cad ma mchis par 'gyur ro// srog chags
102b4: kyi rigs thams cad phyis kyang ma mchis par 'gyur ro/ / yang lo tog dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang 'dab ma ma rungs par mi bgyid do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis drang srong chen po la legs so zhes bya
102b5: ba gnang ste/ drang srong chen po legs so legs so khyod kyis ci nas kyang sems can thams cad la legs par srung bar 'gyur ba dang / lo tog dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu thams cad legs par bsrung
102b6: bar 'gyur ba de ltar gyis shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// slad ma'i tshe skad ma'i dus na rjes su srung bar bgyid/ yongs su bzung
102b7: par bgyid na bcom ldan 'das kyis byin gyis brlab du gsol/ lag na rdo rje legs so legs so// sems can thams cad yongs su srungs shig/ lo tog la gnod par byed pa klu'i cho ga rdzogs s+ho//
102b8: de nas de'i 'og tu bcom ldan 'das zham ring chen po dang / 'khor 'dus pa chen po dang / bkod pa chen po dang / yon yod pa'i mthu chen po dang / cho 'phrul chen pos kun tu ston pas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu'i
103a1: gnas su gshegs so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam thos kyi bu'i gnas dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig du byon pa dang / sa phyogs de na 'brog gi nags nyi shu pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ nags de'i
103a2: mthongs na rdzing bu zhig yod la/ rdzing bu de'i mthus lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor gyi zhing dang / kun dga' dang / nags dang / 'dab ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu rnams kun tu tshim par gyur to// skyes pa dang bud med
103a3: dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / ba lang dang / rta dang / rta rgod ma dang / ma he dang / glang po che dang / bong bu dang / skye bo'i tshogs thams cad bde bas tshim par gyur to// rdzing bu de yang phyogs bzhi kun tu rgyar dpag tshad gnyis
103a4: kyi tshad do/ / rdzing bu de yang me tog ud pa la dang / pad ma dang / ku mu ta dang / bun da ri ka sna tshogs kyis kun tu khebs te/ nya sna tshogs dang / chu bran dang / nya ming dang / chu srin byis pa gsod pa dang / bud pa gzug
103a5: sna tshogs can no/ / de nas de'i 'og tu than pa byung ba de'i tshe nags tshal dang / me tog dang 'bras bu dang / 'dab ma dang / yal ga thams cad skams te me tog de dag rnyings so// nya dang / chu srin dang / nya ma
103a6: dang / chu srin byis pa gsod dang / bud pa gzugs sna tshogs pa de dag kyang chu bri ste cung zad cig lus pas phyogs bcur rgyug kun tu rgyug rab tu rgyug ste/ srog 'gags la thug/ srog chad la thug pas snying 'phar
103a7: zhing rgyug go/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das zham ring ba chen po dang / rdzing bu der byon pa dang / den nya dang chu srin dang / chu srin byis pa gsod pa dang / bung ba brgya stong du ma srog 'gags la thug/ srog chad la thug ste
103a8: phyogs bcur rgyug cing snying rje ji ltar gzigs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byams pa'i dmigs pa snying rjes dbugs phyung ste se gol gyi sgras/ klu rnams 'bod cing lan gnyis lan gsum du se gol rdob
103b1: cing stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su sgra grag par mdzad de/ / sngon gyi las kyi rkyen 'ga' zhig gis srog chags de dag kyang srog ma chad do// klu chen po de dag gis sgra de yang mthos/
103b2: bcom ldan 'das kyang rjes sum dran no// de nas bdud kyi ris kyi gnod sbyin rnam par 'thor rlung zhes bya ba des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su sgra bsgrags pa zhag bdun gyi nyin par
103b3: sreg pa'i bskal pa 'byung ste/ 'di ni srid pa'i rtse mo nas mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba mnar med pa la thug pa'i bar dag las tshig par ma gyur pa cung zad kyang mi srid do// 'jig rten du 'jigs pa chen
103b4: po byung zhes sgra grag go/ / de nas lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa de dag thams cad kyis sgra de thos nas kyi hud
103b5: kyi hud 'jig rten ma rung bar gyur to zhes du'o/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis las kyi rkyen gyis 'di myong bar mkhyen mod kyi/ 'on kyang dgongs pa mdzad de/ bcom ldan 'das kyi smin mtshams kyi mdzod bu nas
103b6: 'od zer byung nas 'od zer des klu'i khyim thams cad snang bar byas nas kyang slar log te spyi'i gtsug tu nub par gyur to/ / de nas klu'i rgyal po kun nas gdugs kyi rnam pas bskor ba zhes bya bas klu thams cad
103b7: bsdus nas 'di skad ces smras so/ / kye klu dang klu chen po dag ci'i phyir 'od zer byung zhing rkyen gang gis 'jig rten du byung / de nas klu'i rgyal po chen po rgya mtshos bsams na bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus 'od zer
103b8: byung bar mthong ngo / / de nas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang / gzhan yang klu'i rgyal po mthu che ba bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la btugs te 'di skad ces gsol to//
104a1: bcom ldan 'das 'od zer rab tu bkye ba'i rgyu gang lags rkyen gang lags 'od zer rab tu bkye ste khang pa thams cad snang bar bgyi ste/ slar ldog par byed pa'i rgyu gang lags rkyen gang lags/
104a2: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kye klu'i bdag po dag srog chags brgya stong phrag sang po 'i dgags pas 'gag par 'gyur ba'o// de nas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la rdzing du
104a3: char gyi rgyun gyi chus bkang nas bde bas tshim par byas so/ / de nas phyogs der go skabs chen po byung bar gyur nas sa phyogs der bcom ldan 'das 'khor chen pos kun nas bskor te mdun du bdar ba'i
104a4: dbus na bzhugs so/ / klu'i 'khor chen po 'dus pa ni 'di lta ste/ klu'i rgyal po stong phrag brgyad bcu ste/ klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho la sogs pa klu'i rgyal po kun nas gdugs kyi rnam pas bskor ba de stan las
104a5: l angs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste byin nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song te phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos gtugs te phyag 'tshal nas lan gsum bskor ba byas
104a6: nas me tog dang / bdug pa dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang byug pa dang / rgyan dang lhab lhub dang / na bza' sna tshogs kyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod de bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ de nas rgyal po
104a7: chen po bzhis bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das 'jigs pa chen po mi bzad pa 'jig rten du byung ste/
104a8: 'di ltar than pa byung zhing mu ge'i dgon par gyur pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das sdug bsngal 'dis sems can thams cad mgon ma mchis skyabs ma mchis dpung gnyen ma mchis par gyur na/ bcom
104b1: ldan 'das kyis de lta bu dang mthun pa'i sngags kyi cho ga bshad du gsol/ gang gis slad ma'i tshe skad ma'i dus na sdug bsngal sna tshogs su ltung ba'i 'jig rten kun du sgrol ba dang / ha cang char che ba dang / chang ma
104b2: mchis pa dang / dus ma lags pa'i char dang / ser ba dang / sad dang tsha ba ma mchis par bgyid pa dang / mu ge'i dgon pa rab tu ma mchis par bgyid pa dang / bzlog pa dang / yongs su bsgyur ba'i slad du gzungs kyi
104b3: sngags kyi tshig bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang / rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung dang / rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po dang / rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang la
104b4: 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / rgyal po chen po dag klu'i snying po'i gzungs kyi sngags kyi tshig skul ma 'debs pa kun nas 'bar ba'i klog ces bya ba yod de/ de dran pa tsam gyis klu thams cad kyi khyim dang / klu thams
104b5: cad kyi lus 'phar bar 'gyur ro/ / klu mi bgrungs pa thams cad kyi snying 'bar bar 'gyur ro// klu thams cad kyi mgo tshal ba bdun du 'gas par 'gyur ro// mig dang mgo rnams gas nas dum bu dum bur chad cing
104b6: 'brul bar 'gyur ro/ / rgyal po chen po dag klu gnod par sems pa dang / rab tu gnod par sems pa rnams kyi don dang / sems can thams cad kyi phyir zung shig/ de nas rgyal po chen po bzhis bcom ldan
104b7: 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das klu'i snying po'i sngags kyi tshig skul ma 'debs pa kun nas 'bar ba'i klog ces bgyi ba bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom
104b8: ldan 'das kyis klu'i lta stangs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzigs stangs kyis rnam par gzigs nas klu'i 'khor 'dus pa thams cad la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// klu'i bdag po dgang las gzungs
105a1: kyi tshig gi sngags kyi tshig nyon cig/ tad+ya thA/ oM bi pu le/ pra ba re/ nA ge ma hA nA ga hri da ya/ a bar te/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ sarba nA ga hri da ya ni/ ki mi ka mi/ nA ga ku la bi dran sa ni ha na ha na/ sarba nA gA rASh+Tan
105a2: hrid ya ni/ ha na ha na/ sarba duSh+TA na nA ga ba ba na ni/ pa tsa pa tsa pa tsa ya sarba duSh+TAn nA ga nan/ a kr-i ma/ a kri ma/ sa mu trA sa ga ra/ bi ma le/ bi kra me/ ma hA nA ga ga te/ dza ba re swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das kyi snying po'i
105a3: gzungs kyi sngags kyi tshig 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis klu de dag thams cad 'dar zhing lus rul te dri mi zhim par gyur to/ / me 'bar ba bzhin du lus la du ba 'thul zhing 'dre ldog go/ thams cad skad cher bcom
105a4: ldan 'das la ngu zhing thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das sngags kyi tshig shin tu mi bzad pa dag bka' stsal to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag thams cad kyi snying la
105a5: g.yo ma mchis par 'gyur ro/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag cag thams cad tshig ste ma rung bar gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyi slan chad 'thun par bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar yi dam bgyid do// bcom
105a6: ldan 'das bdag cag klu'i skye gnas na gnas kyi bar du bcom ldan 'das yang bdag cag 'dzam bu'i gling du 'tshe bar mi bgyid do/ / ma rungs par mi bgyid do// me tog dang / yal ga dang / 'bras bu dang / lo tog
105a7: thams cad yongs su rgyas par bgyid do/ / dus dus su char gyi rgyun 'bab par bgyid do// bde ba dang yid bde bar bgyid do// lo tog dang me tog dang / 'bras bu thams cad 'grub par bgyid do// de bzhin gshegs/
105a8: pa'i bka' rjes su skyong bar bgyid do// bden pa'i dam tshig la gnas par bgyid do// bu gcig pa la bgyi ba bzhin du sems can thams cad rjes su skyong bar bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das phyogs gang dang
105b1: gang na rig pa'i rgyal mo 'di spyod pa der bcom ldan 'das bdag cag 'thun par bgyid do/ / bcom ldan 'das rig pa'i rgyal mo 'di dran pa tsam gyis kyang bdag cag thams cad kyis char gyi rgyun 'bab par bgyid
105b2: do/ / dran pa tsam gyis kyang ha cang char che ba zlog par bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa las log par mi bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das yang mnas bsgag pa'i sngags kyi tshig stsal to// de nas
105b3: klu'i rgyal po de dag thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas 'di skad ces smras so/ / tad+ya thA/ oM tsa tAtsata bi tsi ta/ sha ta shAta/ btsar ti swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das gal te rig pa/
105b4: 'dzin pas gdugs zhag gcig cho ga bgyis la bdag cag gis sems can thams cad yongs su bskyang ba'i don du 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad du char gyi rgyun ma phab ni/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag yang
105b5: dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la 'khus par 'gyur ro/ / bdag cag klu'i skye gnas nas 'chi 'pho bar gyur du yang mchis te bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe rig pa 'dzin pas mnas bsgag pa'i gzungs kyi sngags
105b6: kyi tshig 'di thog ma nyid du lan bdun du brjod par bgyi'o/ / de'i 'og tu me tshe'i sa bon brgya rtsa brgyad klu'i sa bon du mtshe 'ur dor ro// bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe bdag cag thams cad kyi khang khyim mtha' dag
105b7: zhugs 'bar bar gyur pa dag shi keng rus kyi lhag ma tsam zhig lus nas yongs su thar par ma gyur gyi bar du dum bu dum bur 'chad par 'gyur ro/ / de'i tshe bdag cag thams cad kyis myur bar char gyi rgyun
105b8: 'thebs par bgyid / / gal te myung du char gyi rgun ma phab na/ bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe bdag cag thams cad 'gum pa'i dus kyi dbang du 'chi'o// bu dang cha bor bcas te 'gum par 'tsho'o// de nas rnam thas
106a1: kye bu la sogs pa rgyal po chen po bzhis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das klu mnas bsgag pa'i sngags kyi tshig shin du mi bzang ba dag bshad do/
106a2: snying rje ma mchis pa'i mnas bsgag pa dag bshad do// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po dag phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na klu mi bgrangs pa ma rungs pa gdum pa gnod par byed
106a3: bdag 'byung ste de'i tshe mna' 'das 'jigs par 'gyur skrag par 'gyur dus dus su char gyi rgyun ni legs par 'bebs so/ / dus dus su lo tog dang / me tog dang 'bras bu rnams bsgrub bo// de nas
106a4: bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das cho ga rgya cher bka' stsal du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis cho ga bka' stsal pa cher mi 'bab/
106a5: pa'i dus na des ri 'am/ dgon pa'i gnas sam/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ chu mig gam mtsha'u 'am/ mtsho'am/ lteng ka 'am/ khron pa 'am/ klu'i gnas kyi mtshabu 'am/ 'jam pa dang / lci bar bsres
106a6: pa'i dkyil 'khor gru gsum du bya ste/ dkyil 'khor dbus zabs khru gang brkos la kha khyer yang khru gang bar bya'o// shin tu 'jam pa dang shin tu phye bar bya'o// spos chus khor yug tu gtor ro// de'i dbus su rgyal po chen
106a7: po bzhi bya ste/ bser skya'i lci ba dang 'jim par bsres pas klu'i rgyal po mgo dgu gdangs ka can lus dbyibs dgu bar byas te thams cad kyi mgo la yang yid bzhin nor bu bya'o// shar phyogs su
106a8: klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho bya'o/ / lho phyogs su klu'i rgyal po gdugs bya'o// nub phyogs su klu'i rgyal po chu lta bya'o// byang phyogs su klu'i rgyal po lam bu kar bya'o// de'i g.yog 'khor bdun bdun mgo gsum//
106b1: pa mgo gnyis pa mgo lnga par bya'o// lus ngag la spos sna tshogs kyis byug par bya'o// tsan dan dkar dmar dang / su ra bin tsan dang / shug pa dang / gur gum rnams phye mar byas te gtor bar bya'o// me
106b2: tog dang me tog phreng ba gdags so/ / gnas de'i dbus su 'bras yos dang yungs dkar gyis gtor bar bya'o// grwa bzhir rgyal po chen po bzhi bzhag par bya'o// phyogs chen po bzhir sangs rgyas shAkya
106b3: thub pa'i sku gzugs ring bsrel dang bcas pa dang / mchod rten ring bsrel dang bcas pa dag bzhag go// dar dang ba dan gyis brgyan par bya'o// mchod pa lngas mchod do// a ga ru dang tsan dan dang / du ru skas
106b4: bdug go/ / rgya spos dang / nal dang / kun du ru dang / yungs dkar dang / gan d+ha ra sa dang / sra rtsi'i bog dang pog dkar po rnams dang sbrang rtsi dang bsres te sngags lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te klu rnams la bdug
106b5: par bya'o/ / dkyil 'khor gyi mtha' kun du nas byas pad ma bri bar bya'o// sgo bzhi btong la ngos bzhi re rer yang gtor mas gzhod pa bkang ba bdun bdun bzhag par bya'o// gtor ma dkar po dang / ci 'byor
106b6: pa'i rnam pa mang po bzhag go/ me tog sil mas gtor bar bya'o// bum pa bkang ba bzhi bzhag go// bum pa gtor mas bkang ba bzhi bzhag go// pog por bzhi nas gu gul gyi bdug pas bdug go//
106b7: ma ma ra kha brgyad du bung ngo // rig pa 'dzin pas shar gyi sgo ru sbyin bsreg bya ste/ shing ka ra bi ra dang / yungs dkar dang tse tsa dmar po bsres te lan brgya rtsa brgyad dor ta/ dor ba brgya rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang klu thams
106b8: cad char gyi rgyun 'bebs te 'jam bu'i gling thams cad du phyogs bzhi kun nas char gyi rgyun 'babs so/ / kla de dag thams cad 'dir char 'bebs so// 'din tshig dang po'o// yungs dkar gyi mar dang / sbrad rtsi dang
107a1: shing kar bi ri'i me tog dang / nA ga ge sar dang btags pa'i ri lu byas la/ de nas ri lu la sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa byas te klu'i mtshor bor ma thag tu klu thams cad dga' bar gyur te/ cha
107a2: rgyan chen po 'bebs so/ / gal te de ma thag ma phab na klu de dag thams cad lus zhig par 'gyur ro// glad pa na par 'gyur sdug bsngal chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'di ni cho ga gnyis pa'o// sbyin bsreg byas/
107a3: po'i thal pa dang / rtsab mo dkrugs la bsngags lan drug bcu bzlas pa bya ste khyim gyi nang du pon po ma thag tu klu thams cad 'khrugs par gyur te/ de'i phyir char gyi rgyun 'bebs so// gal te de ma thag tu ma pab na
107a4: klu thams cad kyi lus la sha bkra 'byung zhing mdzes btab par 'gyur long bar 'gyur ro/ / 'di ni cho ga gsum pa'o// // shug pa dang ud pa la sngon po dang / bab la dang / zangs phye dang / yungs dkar dang / i nanga?
107a5: hasta dang / ba la sha bsras te bu ram khu bas thus pa shes rab can gyis sngags lan brgyad bcu bzlas te/ ri lu rgya shug gi 'bru tsam du byas la char mi 'bab pa'i dus ri lu bdun klu'i khyim du bor na nyin mtshan
107a6: bdun char 'bebs so/ / gal te 'phral du ma phab na de'i phyir klu'i khyim chu thams cad gcer bur 'gyur ro// klu'i khyim na gnas pa thams cad gcer bur 'gyur ro// ri lu gcig rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags
107a7: te klu'i mtshor gzugs so/ / ba dan sngon po gdags so// sngags 'di bris te der gdags pa byas na ji srid du rgyal mtshan ma bsdus pa de srid klu thams cad char 'bebs so// yang rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la
107a8: btags te khang thog mthon por gzugs so/ / ser ba 'bab pa'i dus na yang klu rnams ser ba 'bebs kyang me nus so// klu rnams kyis gser gyi kha dog 'dra ba de 'dra bar mthong ste/ klu thams cad dang ngas
107b1: skrag cing gnas der 'dod pa bzhin char 'bebs so/ / oM su pra te badz+ra dun de mi mi li mA hA/ 'di ni sngags mo// bag phye las klu mgo dgu pa'i gzugs byas la lus mtshal gyis bslu bar bya'o// mgul du
107b2: dan gdags so/ / dkyil 'khor grwa bzhi byas te dbus su klu'i gzugs bzhag la me tig sel mas gtor ro// gtor ma dkar po ci 'byor tshad sbyin no// me tog dang bdug spos kyang sbyin no// bal po se'u shing gi
107b3: lcug ma la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig yongs su bzlas pa byas te/ sngags dang bal po se'u shing gi lcug ma la klu'i gzugs la lan brgya rtsa brgyad du byab pa byas na klu gang gi ming bris pa'i klu de bkug par 'gyur te/
107b4: klu de yang rang gi khyim la dga' bar mi 'gyur ro// gal te char gyi rgyun legs par ma phab na 'phral du srog ma rung bar 'gyur ro// yungs dkar la lan stong rtsa brgyad re re la yongs su bzlas pa bya ste/ stong
107b5: brgyad du tshang na klu'i gzugs thams cad 'gro zhing mgo gdengs ka byed do/ / de'i 'og tu bal po se'u yi lcug mas bsdigs na ldang zhing lce ston par 'gyur/ lus kyi bar du ston par 'gyur klu thams cad dbang du
107b6: 'gyur te/ gang bsgo ba de bzhin byed do// 'o ma dang / yungs dkar la sngags brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas pa byas te/ gnas thams cad du gtor na thams cad la phyir legs pa byas par 'gyur ro// 'di na
107b7: cho ga bzhi pa'o/ / // de nas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang / gzhan yang klu'i rgyal po mthu che ba klu'i rgyal po brgya stong stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas 'di skad ces gsol
107b8: to/ / bcom ldan 'das sngags kyi tshig shin tu mi bzad pa dag bka' stsal to// las bsgrub pa shin tu mi bzad pa dag bka' stsal to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang de dang 'dra bar bshad par
108a1: bgyi'o/ / dus dus su char gyi rgyun 'babs so// sman pa na sems can dag la rnam par 'tshe bar mi bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis klu mi bsnyungs pa rnam par 'tshe bar bgyid pa
108a2: rnams kyi don tu dam tshig ma 'tshal ba rnams bzlog pa'i sngags kyi tshig bshad par 'tshal na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ kwa'i bdag po dgongs dam tshig gi sngags byin gyis badz+ra/
108a3: kyis de shod cig/ na mo b+ha ga ba ta shAkya mu na ye/ ta thA ga tA ya/ tad+ya thA/ b+hu dze b+hu dza sa ma ya b+he dze tad twa b+hu dz+ra pra b+ha ra b+hu dze sa man ta a ka ra b+hu dza/ du ru dra dra swA hA/ sa ma ya ba la ne swA hA/ nA ga ma ras btso
108a4: swA hA/ / bcom ldan 'das slad ma tshe slad ma 'dus na kA ma bgrangs pa thams cad slar bzlog pa'i slad du bdag cag gis dam chog gi sngags 'di bshad do// hacang char che ba'i tshe dang / rar dkon
108a5: ba'i tshe dang / sad dang ser ba dang / ser ba 'bab pa'i tshe sngags 'di dran par bya'o// brjod par bgyi'o// de nas klu thams cad bskal bar bgyi'o// reg pa 'dzin pa des shin du khrus bgyis te gtsang mar
108a6: bgyis la/ gos sa rab bgos te kwa'i gnas su mchi bar bgyi'o// klu'i gnas su ci 'byor pa'i spos kyi dkyil 'khor bgyis te bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i sku gzugs sam/ sku gdung dang bcas pa'i
108a7: mchod rten dkyil 'khor de'i steng du bzhag ste sum chab kyis bkra bar bgyi/ me tog dang / bdug pas mchod par bkye/ kla kun yang bkra bar bgyi'o// sku bsil ba'i chab de la lan brgyad yongs su bzlas
108a8: pa bgyis te/ de'i nang du yangs dkar stsal nas mtsha' de'i nang du dbo zhing phyogs bzhi nas bdug pas bdugs na/ de tha ma thag tu skad cig del klu'i gnas 'gul zhing du blta bu byung nas sprin gyi dkyil
108b1: 'khor chen por gyur te/ nam mkha'i dkyil de khebs par char gyi rgyun 'bebs so// ser ba 'bab pa'i dus su yungs dkar dang / til bsres pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pa bgyis te phyogs bzhir bcing
108b2: bar brdzi'o/ / kwa'i phyogs su gtor bar bgyi'o// ser rab mi 'bab pa dang / klu thams cad kyang gcod par 'gyur ro// sad dang ser ba dang / dus ma yin pa'i rlung rab tuzhi bar 'gyur ro// kwa'i mtsho 'gram 'amathon pa
108b3: 'am/ lteng ka'am rdzing bu'i 'gram 'am/ ri'i chu song shing arga dang / zhun mar dang / yungs dkar dang / shing ka/ ra bi ra'i me tog gis steng rna brgyad sbyin ba sreg byas na thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro//
108b4: sbyin bsreg byas ma thag tu char gyi rgyun chen po 'bab par 'gyur ro// ha cang char che ba'i dus na 'bras yos dang / yangs dkar la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa byas te nam mkha' la gtor na char chen po
108b5: klog par 'gyur ro/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag cag gos dgung gsum gyis char kyai dz+nyAn ma phab na/ bcom ldan 'das de'i cha sha bkra 'byung bar 'gyur lags so// long ba dang las dri mi zhim pa
108b6: 'gyur lags so/ / sangs rgyas dang / chos dang dge 'dun sla bar bgyid pa lags so// 'jig rten gas ma sla bar bgyid pe lags so// bdag nag gA'i sgra gnas 'pho bar gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das gzhan
108b7: thams cad la yang sbyor bar bgyid na thams cad rung bar 'gyur ro/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis klo'i rgyal po dag dbugs thang / dam tshig le bka nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi phul yongs
108b8: karata/ rdzas su gtang rnam sa grags de nas gshegs so// rnam thos kyi bu gzhal bzhugs so// kwa dam tshig ces bya ba chang 'bebs pa'i skabs rdzogs s+ho// // de nas bcom ldan 'das
109a1: tshangs pa'i 'ang pa brtsegs par bzhugs pa dang / lha'i tshogs dum lpags byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor chen po yang lhags/ sgra rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab
109a2: 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / klu'i dbang po mthu che ba thams cad kyang lhags/ nam mkha' lding gi dbang po dang / rgyal po chen po gser mig gi 'dab ma can/ rdo rje'i mchu can bdag nyid chen po lus
109a3: babar zhing khro ba 'jigs su rung ba'i rtsal can rin po che tha dad pa sna tshogs dang / mu tig dang / gser gyis spras pa'i gcod pan mgo la thogs pa/ gser gyis klubs pa drag po'i gzugs can 'gying
109a4: bar blta ba/ klu'i dbang po gdan du bting ba/ g.yog 'khor mang po thams cad dang lhags so// gnod sbyin gyi dbang po lag na rdo rje gnod sbyin bye ba dang / rdo rje 'dzin g.yog 'khor rig 'dzin stong lhags
109a5: te/ bcom ldan 'das ni nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa/ mu tig dmar po tha dad pa mang pos brgyan pa'i seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa/ khang pa brtsegs pa na zham ring chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs
109a6: pa'i byin gyi rlabs chen pos byin gyis brlabs pa dang ldan pas bzhugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ni 'od zer sna tshogs bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis sku ni shin du brgyan/ gser gyi mchod sdong ltar ni 'bar//
109a7: nyi ma ltar ni snang / mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcu mnga' ba 'od 'dom gang bas ni sku legs par rgyan/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni shin du rnam par dag cing shin du dri ma dang skyon
109a8: med pa'i 'od ni gsal/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor chen po 'dus par mkhyen nas sku las 'od zer sna tshogs phyung ste 'od zer gyi snang ba des phyogs bcu kun du khyab par mdzad do// de nas tshangs pa
109b1: dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer la bltas nas 'jam bu'i gling na klum bgrangs pas sad dang / ser ba dang / rlung dang / ser smin pab ste/ me tog dang / 'bras bu thams
109b2: cad dang / lo tog thams cad dang / shing dang / rtswa dang / shing gel ba dang / sman dang / nags tshal dang / sman gyi bar bsregs te/ ma rung bar byas nas/ yal ga yang 'dzam bu'i gling na med par byas te ma rung bar byas
109b3: na/ de na sems can de dag sdug bsngal chen pos gzir cing nyam thag pa'i skad byung ba thos so// de nas tshangs pa dang / khyab 'dzag dang / dbang phyug chen pos bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas
109b4: 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das klu gnod par sems pa gdum po rnams kyis 'dzam bu'i gling rnam par bshig ste/ thams cad ma rungs par bgyis nas sems can rnams sdug bsngal mi bzad
109b5: pa chen po myong ngo / / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kye lha'i dbang po dag 'di ni mngon sum du gyur pa yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis rlabs dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes zab mo dang / de bzhin gshegs
109b6: pa'i yon tan gyi khyad par gyi byin gyis brlabs la ltos shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das nam mkha' lding bgyings pas rnam par ltas pa zhes bya ba kun nas me lce 'bar ba'i phreng ba can rnam par 'phrul pa'i
109b7: ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ / snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu sku phrag pa gnyis rab tu 'bar te/ 'bar ma thag tu klu thams cad kyi lus rab tu 'bar bar 'gyu ro// de nas klu'i rgyal po chen po kun nas
109b8: gdugs kyis rnam par bskor bas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs te 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das tshig lags so// bde bar gshegs pa tshig lags so// de nas bcom ldan
110a1: 'das kyis cang mi gsung bar gnang nas steng du rnam par gzigs te/ phyogs bcu kun nas yang gzugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag bzhes te nam mkha' lding gshugs
110a2: chen pos kun tu 'bar ba nam mkha' lding gi gzi brjid kyi snying po'i dkyil 'khor 'di rjes su dgongs so/ / oM badz+ra ba ti ga ru Da be ke hUM hUM/ ra tsi sridza hU phaT/ de nas klu mi srun pa de dag yung yur bor gyur nas
110a3: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug ste 'dar yang yeng ngo / / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i nam mkha' lding mo lce 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i snying po chen po bka' stsal pa/ na mo b+ha ga ba te
110a4: shAkya mu na ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ oM badz+ra dz+wa la dz+wa la/ pra dz+wa la/ ha na ha na/ sarba nA ga hr-i da ya d+hA ra NI/ ha ra ha ra/ sarba kan nan ba la bIr+ya/ pra ra kra man/ da ha da ha/ sarba na ga ha shI ra ni/ pa tsa ba tsa/ sarba nA garma ni/ ga ru Da b+he ga
110a5: bag shi ni pa te/ nad ba ta ya ba ta ya/ sarba nA ga ba ba ni ni/ oM ma ta ma ta/ ma hA bi tsi dra ma ni mo hu li da ra ha ma hA ru ta b+he ga de ra bi tsi dra/ a ba ra Na bi bu hu sha ti kA ya/ sarba nA ga na na/ ka ra ka ra/ s+pha ra sma
110a6: ra b+ho ga ru De na ba ra thag na ban tran shAkya mu ne pra tsa na ma nu ba la ya/ tardza yA/ nA ga nan/ ba ga shA ya/ duSh+TA na pra ma ta ya/ ba yu be dza ga ba na/ s+pho ta ya/ murta nan sho shA ya/ bi du dz+wa la na/ hU hA/ phaT phaT/ pra ma ta
110a7: sarba ba ta a shin ne me ka na/ na sha ya na sha ya/ sarba nA ga ba lan ba ha ra/ pa tsa dun te ra/ a ga ra bA ya/ su sha nA ga na/ gardza gardza ma hA ga ru Da b+he ga na/ hU hUM/ phaT phaT/ stam b+ha ya ni shi ta ba la ha kan/ sa
110a8: bak+Sha ya/ hUM hA/ phaT phaT/ stam b+ha ya/ shi ta ba yu/ mu g+ha na/ sarba nA ga b+hi ha ri ni/ trA hA/ phaT phaT/ b+ho nA ga pi ti pi ti/ mun tsa tri bak+Sha bu yu na ga ru Da gro ta ma hA b+he ga ban d+ha ya/ bu yu ba la ha kan
110b1: rma kun du nag na nan ga / / yanasu dag na du na /
110b2: titi ti ti/ dUng+ku/ phaT phaT swA hA/ dza lam pa duH/ sarba a shan ta thA ka ta a d+hiSh+Tha nen hUM phaT/ a mri te ma b+ha ba tu/ sarba shi ta bA yu ne ga a sha ni/ hA/ phaT phaT/ ma tri kra ma tha ta ya~M/ nA ga ma tri kram
110b3: ya te mu ga da/ ye ti ga ta~M/ tu ra d+ha ru/ hAr+m+ma Ta phaT swA hA/ bar tA ya swA hA/ nAg swAHsa swAt+ma/ nA ga ba ta ra ma swAt+ma/ oM swA hA/ sarbaswA hU~M/ pra ba~M sAd+hA/ ta thA ga tas ma ya swA hA/ trai la kya c-ing
110b4: ta ya swA hA oM dA hA/ hA da hA/ phaT phaT phaT/ kr-i'i bdag pa dag de bzhin gsheg pa'i nam mkha' lding gi 'ber ba'i snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs chen po 'di klu mo bsrun pa thams cad zlog par byed pa'o// sprin
110b5: dang / lhags pa dang / rlung dang / ser ba thams cad 'jig pa'o// zlog pa'o// lo tog yongs su skyong ba'o// me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / nags tshal yongs su skyong ba'o// bdud rtsi'i 'bras bu yongs su 'grub par
110b6: byed pa'o/ / de bas bstabs pa 'phel bar byed pa'o// kye klu'i bdag po dag 'di dra nas zag pa tsam gyis klu'i dkyil 'khor byed pa/ bu dang chung par bcas pa dang / blon por bcas pa dang / mngag gzhug
110b7: par bcas pa dang / 'khong dang bcas pa lhags pa'i stobs byed pa/ rlung gi stobs byed pa/ sdang pa dang / stobs byed pa/ kun thams cad 'thun pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' gnang ba dang / de bzhin
110b8: gshegs pa'i dam tshig gi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyi mi'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir lo tog thams cad dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu thams cad dang / rdzas dang / shing dang / sman thams cad kun
111a1: du bsrung bgyis shig/ dus dus su char gyi rgyun po ba shig/ bdag gi srog ji lta ba de bzhin du 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad rtas par byed pa/ me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / lo tog
111a2: rnams yongs su sbyongs shig/ gal te gzhan du 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' lung dge ba ltar ma byas na de'i tshe glu thams cad kyi khyim kun tu 'bar/ rab tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu 'bar te/ me
111a3: lce gcig tu 'bar bar gyur cig/ klu la mu ge chen po 'byung bar gyur cig/ stobs bri zhing brtson 'grus ma rung bar gyur cig/ chu skams par gyur cig/ khyim skams par gyur cig/ lus rtsub par gyur
111a4: cig/ 'dab bzangs kyis 'jigs pa dang / me dang bye ma yis 'jigs pa dang / rtag tu bkres pa dang skom pa yis 'jigs pa can du gyur cig/ phar rgyug tshur rgyug cing lus kun du tshig pa dang / nyi ma'i
111a5: dugs kyis yongs su gdungs pas lus tshig par gyur cig/ nad dang / na ba dang / gnod pa dang / nad mgo ba sna tshogs pa 'dus par gyur cig/ de ltar phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na klu mi srun pa/ klu gtum
111a6: pa/ / rab tu gtum pa rnams gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i nam mkha' lding 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i snying po'i gzungs 'di las 'gal bar byed na sdug bsngal 'di lta bu myong bar 'gyur te/ klu'i bdag po dag
111a7: de'i phyir bden pa'i yi dam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig gi rjes su bsrung bar bya'o/ / 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad yongs su bskyang bar bya'o// bsrung bar bya'o// bsgrub par bya'o// de nas
111a8: klu'i rgyal po kun nas gdugs kyi rnam pas bskor ba dang / klu'i rgyal po chen po rgya mtsho dang / klu'i rgyal po chen po dga' ba dang / bsnyen dga' bo dang / klu'i rgyal po chen po gzi can dang / klu'i rgyal po chen po hrul ba
111b1: dang / klu'i rgyal po chen po chu lha dang / klu'i rgyal po chen po 'bar ba kun tu 'dzin pa kha bye rab tu dga' ba'i gtsug ces bya ba dang / klu'i rgyal po chen po tshangs pa'i mgo dang / klu'i rgyal ba chen po 'jig rten gsum
111b2: du grags pa'i rgyal mtshan dang / klu'i rgyal po chen po dbang phyug 'od dang / klu'i rgyal po chen po 'od rnam par grags pa zhes bya ba dang / klu'i rgyal po chen po kun nas rgyal mtshan gyi rnam pa zhes bya ba dang /
