173b2: dza.A ya/ na mo la ti b+ha dra ma/ ma hA yak+Sha sa na ba ta ye/ ma na ni swA hA// rtsa ba'i dkar po'i phyogs kyi brgyad dam/ yang na dkar po'i bcu bzhi la nyin zhag gcig spyang bar gnas pas/ ro hi ta'i nyal ba'i gci ba dang / mar gyis byugs nas stong phrag
173b3: brgyad du sbyin sreg byas na dod rtse brgya rnyed par 'gyur ro/ / gzhan yang nye bar mchod pa dang / sngon du 'bum tsho gsum bzlas nas/ nyam gong ba la zho dang mar dang sbrang rtsis mngon par byugs nas stong phrag bcu sbyin sreg byas na dong rtse stong phrag rnyed
173b4: par 'gyur ro/ / ma grub na yang kar sha pa Ni stong phrag gcig rnyed par 'gyur ro// oM dzam b+ha la dza len dra ye swA hA// rtsa ba'i sngags so// de nas yang nor bu bzang po bsgrub par 'dod na mchod sbyin gyi shing dkar po la nor bu bzang po'i gzugs brnyan
173b5: byas la/ mchod pa chen po rab tu gnas pa byas la/ de'i mdun du yang a ba marga'i ye shing la mar dang sbrang rtsis byugs la 'bum phrag tu sbyin bsreg byas na 'dod pa'i 'bras bu rnyed par 'gyur ro// be ha la'i me tog rnams kyis 'bum phrag
173b6: du sbyin bsreg byas na gser srang stong rnyed par 'gyur ro/ / til dang 'bras thug po che'i sbyin sreg 'bum byas na gser srang stong rnyed par 'gyur ro// de ltar sha ta bus pa dang gu gul dang kun d+ha dang / tsan dan dkar po dang / du ru ka la sogs pa/
173b7: de rnams re re 'bum du sbyin bsreg byas na dong rtse stong phrag rnyed par 'gyur ro// tal dang 'bros kyi sbyin sreg byas na rgyal po dbang du 'gyur ro// nye'u ci ltar 'tshong pa nyos la/ chu bo'i rgyun la lte ba nub tsam du chu'i nang du zhugs nas kha shar du
173b8: bltas te sbyin bsreg brgya byas na sum 'gyur gyi dong rtse rnyed par 'gyur ro/ / ras bal gyi sa bon la mar dang sbrang rtsis byugs nas stong phrag gcig sbyin pa sreg byas na nyi ma bdun gyi bar la ras gcig rnyed par 'gyur ro// rtag tu bzlas na gos
174a1: dang bza' ba rnyed par 'gyur ro/ / 'bum du bzlas na dong tse lnga stong rnyed par 'gyur ro// 'bumatsho gnyis bzlas na grong rnyed par 'gyur ro// 'bumatsho ga sum bzlas na longs spyod chen po rnyed par 'gyur zhing grong brgyad kyi bdag por
174a2: 'gyur ro/ / ba'i gci ba la srin bsreg stong byas nab glang stong rnyed par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang dud 'gro rnams kyis lug la'o dang sbrang rtsi sngags la nyin re bzhin sbyin sreg byas nar lug la sogs pa rnyed par 'gyur ro// ba lang gi lhas kyi nang
174a3: du ku sha'i me tog mar dang sbrad kyis byugs nas 'bum tsho gcig sbyin bsreg byas na 'byung po dang / sha za dbang du 'gyur ro// rig sngags thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// ji ltar 'dod pa rnyed par 'gyur ro// yang ba lang gi lhas kyi nang du'o mdang
174a4: 'o thug za zhing / shri ra pi la'i yaM shing la sbyin sreg 'bum byas na gang 'dod pa'i don gsol ba btab pa de rnyed par 'gyur ro// mtshan mo gsum du sbyang bar gnas la zla ba'am/ nyi ma gzas gzung ba la ldong ros dang 'gi hang srang lngas a shwaH
174a5: ta'i 'dab pa bzhi la g.yas bskor g.yon bskor du gzhag nas/ yang 'dab ma bzhis g.yogs la ji srid ngo bar gyur ba de srid du bzlas pa bya'o// du ba dang 'bar bas 'di ltar sa tha 'ogs stengs gsum 'grub par 'gyur ro// ba glang gi
174a6: lhas kyi nang 'am chu bo 'dus par bsod snyoms za ba'ama'o thug za bas/ arga'i 'o thug mar dang sbrang rtsis byugs nas stong tsho lnga sbyin sreg byas na rang nyid kyis nor gyi bdag po nor bu bzang po nor gyi bdag po nor dang cas pa mthong ba 'gyur
174a7: ro/ / nga mgu'o zhes de smra na/ mchog brgyad gang 'dod pa ster bar 'gyur ro// rgyal po dang gter dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis 'chag pa dang / rig pa 'dzin pa dang / thams cad dbang du byed pa dang / klu dang / nod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang /
174a8: za dang grul bum dang / lus srul po rnams thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// dran pa tsam gyis mdun du 'dug par 'gyur ro// rkang bzhi pa la sogs pa'i sems can shis rab tuzhi bar byed pa dang / sa 'og tu 'jug pa dang / nam mkha' la
174b1: 'gro ba dang / sa 'og gi 'khrul 'khor rab tu 'jig pa dang / chu rengs pa dang bcud len dang / tshar cad pa dang / rjes su gzung ba brgyang po 'di rnams las de'i bdur drugang na gang gcig bla bar bya'o// des gang ci 'dod pa de ster ba 'dru
174b2: ro/ pad ma ma dang snang kyis byugs nas 'bum du sbyin pasreg byas na/ bdam dag 'do bu rnye par 'gyur ro// lta ba u t+pal sngon pa dang / ku bu ta rnams bron pa pa dang ldan pas la dag sna tshogs pa'i ri po che rnyed par 'gyur ro//
174b3: dkar dkar po mar dang sbrang rtsis byugs la gang gi ming nas gzung nas sbyin sreg byas na mtshan mo bdun gyis dbang du 'gyur ro// til nag po la mar dang skad rtsis sngags la 'bum du sbyin sreg byas na nor nye bar 'phel bar 'gyur ro//
174b4: a pA'i shing la me btang la stong phrag brgyad du sbyin sreg byas na/ nyi ma bdun gyis nad ni bar 'gyur ro// dkar po'i tshes gcig nas brtsams nas sha ta bus pa dang / kun d+ha dang / ta ka ra dang / ba sha ka dang / du ru ska dang / gu gul rnams ji ltar
174b5: 'tshong ba nyos la/ mchod pa byas nas mar dang skad cis spags la/ stong phrag brgyad du sbyin sreg byas na nyi ma bdun du bdun 'gyur gyi nor rnyed par 'gyur ro// 'bum phrag bzhi bzlas na bdag dang gzhan nye bar 'gyur bar byed do// yul
174b6: bsrung bar 'gyur ro/ / na mo rad na tra yA ya/ na mo ma Ni b+ha dra ya/ ma hA yak+Sha se na pa ta ye/ ki Ni ki Ni g+hi Di ka rna swa ba ni me d+ha ra ra sa me ye swA hA/ arga'i mar khus ku mu ta'i me tog sbyin pa sreg byas na/ rmi lam yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin
174b7: mthong bar 'gyur ro/ / ki Ni ki Ni g+ha Na Da ka na tsir tri me d+ha ra sa ya swA hA/ don nges pa ster na cho ga ji ltar brjod pa bzhin no// 'phags pa gnod gnas kyi dbang po ji ltar 'byung ba'i rtog pa zhes bya ba rdzogs s+ho// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po sga
174b8: pa'i rdo rje dang / bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba dge slong rdo rje 'din pa rdo rje grags kyis bsgyur ba'o// @6// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya mkhal nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa me khal zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'/
175a1: thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya'i yul ser skya'i gnas na/ shing n+ya gro d+hi'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te de'i tshe gzhon nu sgrag can zin ma lan nyal ba las
175a2: srin po zhig gis spangs par byas par gyur to/ / de nas gzhon nu skrag can zin nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das nas gzhon nu mang po rnams kyi mdun du 'dar cing yongasu bskor te/ sar skya'i gnas nas byung nas bcom ldan 'das gas
175a3: bder song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ spyan sngar 'dug nas dus so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo gzhon nu sgra gcan zin sbyang /
175a4: ba'i phyir mkhal zhes bya ba'i rig sngags bshad kyis khyod kyis zung shig/ lha'i tshogs dang / klu'i tshogs dang / gnod sbyin gyi tshogs dang srin po'i tshogs dang lha ma yin gyi tshogs dang nam mkha' lding gi tshogs dang / mi 'am ci'i
175a5: tshogs dang lto 'phye chen po'i tshogs dang / sha za'i tshogs dang yi dgas kyi tshogs dang / grul bum gyi tshogs dang srul po'i tshogs dang / gza'i tshogs dang rgyu skar gyi tshogs dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon nyi shu rtsa brgyad dag rgyal po chen
175a6: po bzhi dang drang srong 'dod chags dang bral ba rnams dang / gangs la gnas pa dang phyogs bcu na 'byung po gang dag 'khod pa dang / srin mo'i tshogs dang bA li dang kA Ta li di dang / bo da ri dang grong rna dang yid bzang dang 'phrog ma chen mo dang / ma mo'i
175a7: tshogs rnams la nyon cig/ rgya mtsho'i 'khor gyi srungs ma shar phyogs kyi phyogs chan sran mo phrog ma zhes bya ba dang / lho phyogs kyi phyogs chan srin mo glang snam zhes bya ba dang / nub phyogs kyi phyogs chan srin mo ral pa can zhes
175a8: bya ba dang / byang phyogs kyi phyogs chan srin mo sa'i gtsug ces byaste/ srin mo drag mo de dgar ra yang 'khor bye ba drug bcus bskor ba me kha la'i rig sngags las brjod pa thams cad kyis bsrung bar gyis shig/ tad+ya thA/ g+ha neH
175b1: ni g+han gan kun g+han kun ldan pa ti/ b+ha ma k+Sha ma klu ma g+hum bu ma gru ma kyum pa ti/ kA k+sha g+ha b+ha reka ga de di ni/ g+ha ra ba ti swA ba ti/ d+han pati/ sur ba ti/ sur bti/ a ti ma btim ta/ a ba ti su ba ti/ tsu ba ti/ la ta la tal ta
175b2: ha la ha la ha la/ hi la hi le hi la he le ti li ti la ta lo/ hu lu hu lu ru lu hu lu hu lu hu lu hu la/ ti la ti lo ti mi ti li ti li ti li ti mi/ hi li hi li/ mi li rmi la/ bta ma ga a man/ ma bi sa re ha hi hi hi/ sa man ta sa re a sa man ta sa re/ ba ri kha sa ma/ a
175b3: brte/ g+han/ ma kha le// kun dga' bo mkhal zhes bya ba stobs mo che rdzu 'phrul dang ldan ma brtson 'grus chem 'di ni/ rig sngags 'chang rnams dang / 'thung po rnams dang ro langs rnams las/ gang du yang bkag pa med de kun du thogs pa
175b4: med par 'gro'o/ / kun dga' bo ma khal zhes bya ba'i rig sngags 'di ni sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir dang / bde ba'i phyir dang / bsrung zhing sba ba'i bar du bya ba'i phyir 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungs so//
175b5: drang srong chen po gzhan dag gis kyang smras te/ kun dga' bo me kha la'i rig sngags ni sems can rnams la phan par byed pa'o// gang su dag sdig pa'i las dang ldan pa gzi byin 'phrog pas la gnas pa de dag thams cad mkhala'i rig
175b6: sngags thos nas shin tu skrag ste phyogs dang phyogs mtshams su 'gro'i/ kun dga' bo me kha la'i rig sngags legs par gzung ba byas pa la kun nas dpag tshad bcu gnyis su bsrung ba gyis shig/ yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su
175b7: gzung ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde lags su 'gyur bar gyis shig/ sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// chad pa spang bar gyis shig/ mtshon cha spang ba dang / dug gzhil bar gyis shig/ mi mdza' ba bzlog par gyis shig/ mtshams gcad bar
175b8: gyis shig/ skud pas bcing bar gyis shig/ sdang ba thams cad bzlog par gyis shig/ mi 'am mi ma yin pa sdig pa byed pa rnams 'tsher ma gzhug cig/ sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams grub par gyur
176a1: cig swA hA/ de la chog ni de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal te me tog dang / bdug pa dag gsol nas spyad pa bcing bar bya'o// byab pa dang mnye ba dang legs par khrus bya'o// cog 'dis gdon thams cad bzlog pa
176a2: dang / nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya'o// tad+ya thA/ ti le ba le/ bi ma le/ ta ma le/ hi li ni ri si ram sa ra// rig sngags 'di ni thos gyur nas// sa rnams thams cad g.yos par 'gyur// 'byung po'i tshogs rnams rab tu g.yos//
176a3: tshogs rnams kyang lhags par 'gyur// klu yi rgyal po rnams kyang lhags// 'byung po'i rgyal po rnams kyang lhags// bcom ldan byams pa'ang der phyin to// tshangs pa dang ni dbang po'ang lhags// dbang phyug ched dang gzhon nu yang//
176a4: gnyi ga der ni lhags par 'gyur// me khal las gang su dag/ brjod pa'i 'byung po rnams kyang lhags// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
176a5: 'das bdag gis kyang 'di la bsrung ba dang / yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur ba dang / chad pa spang pa dang mtshon cha sprang pa dang drug gzhil ba dang / mi mjal bzlog pa dang mtshams dgus pa
176a6: da / me kha las yongs su bzlog pa stsal bar bgyi'o// d+ya thA/ a bad ta ni/ bdan ni a bi ba ni/ tsu lu tsu la/ unA dan te/ sa man ldad na te/ ni mun Ne/ ni mi mu ni/ zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o// swAt+ma/ sang sa rgyas
176a7: la phyag 'tshal lo/ / bde legs su gyur cig/ swA hA/ de nas de'i tshe mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas me kha la'i rig sngags kun nas 'dzin pa 'di 'khor gyi tshig 'di 'phrul lo// s+yAd ya shrI dan/ ang gu re/ a du/ du re/ shi Sha
176a8: shi khi shi khi shi khi shi khi/ ba re/ dar da ra ba ti/ mu tsa mu tsa/ bi mu tsa/ zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o// swA hA/ de nas de'i tshe lha'i bu rab 'thab bral gyis me kha la'i rig sngags kyi 'khor phul ba/ s+ya da ya thA dan/ ba duSh+Te/ ru d+hi ra ka/
176b1: gam d+hi/ du da ge/ na muH/ muH/ shAkyar to// de legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o swA hA/ de nas de'i tsho lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis se kha la'i rig sngags kyi 'khor phul ga s+yAd la bI dan/ so Te bai de// rnyedag/ dan ti ga/ mi
176b2: mi mi/ bsrung bar gyis shig/ bde legs su 'byur bar bgyi'o// mtshams dgum pa'i bar du bgyi'o// A hA/ de nas de tshe rgyal po chen po lus ngan gyis mkha la'i rig sngags kyi 'khor zhal ba/ s+yAng ma b+h+r-i / thAm hA maT+Ta
176b3: meg+hu me g+hus/ u ke/ mu ka/ dz+wa le/ da le/ ma ti pha le/ sA re sar a d+hi pa ti/ zhib dang bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o// mtshams 'gus pa'i bdu sa kyi tsAhA// de nas de'i tshe rgyal po chen po yul 'khor bsrung gas ma
176b4: lang rig sngags kyi 'khor phul ba/ s+yAd yA thA da na/ d+had+hu re/ d+had+ha re/ d+hA ra nI d+ha ra nId+ha re/ a rbu ti su tse/ mu su ru/ zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o// swA hA/ mtshams dgum pa'i bar du bgyi'o// swA hA/ de nas de'i tsha rgyal
176b5: po chen po 'phags skyes pos me kha la'i rig sngags kyi 'khor phul ba/ s+yAd ya shrI dan/ an ta re/ ban dar/ ka ra Te/ ba ra barbe/ ka ri ru ti/ ka ri d+hi ra/ ka na ka barbe/ ru re ma/ k+Sha ku a k+Shi me pak+Shi/ zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o//
176b6: mams dbus pa'i b.radu gyims la rna chen po pa nga gis pa lapa'i rig zugs kyi dza bral ga/ nga la 'idas/ rnam la dzum pa/ ga/ d+hi/ saman ta ny-i / TI bdang bde legs su gyu
176b7: bar bgyi'o/ / mtshams dgus pa'i bar du bgyi'o// swA hA// de nas de'i tshe lha'i bu zla bas me la la'i rig sngags kyi 'khor phul ga s+yAd ya d+hi dan/ a la te/ te la b+he/ ma De/ bi sa Te/ d+ha ket+ta da ke/ sa ki ni/ ba kini/ ni ba dang bde leg+sa/
176b8: su 'gyur bar bgyi'o// mtshams dgum pa'i bar du bgyi 'o swA tA/ de nas de'i tshe lha'i bu nyi mas me kha la'i rig sngags kyi 'khor phul ba/ s+yad ya thI dan/ oM bA de/ bi ma le/ pra b+ha sar/ sha ta rasmai/ sata pra rasmai/ a ti pra mi/
177a1: zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o// mtshams dgum pa'i bar du bgyi'o swA hA/ de nas de'i tshe lha'i tshogs rnams kyis me kha la'i rig sngags kyi 'khor bul ba/ s+yad ya thI na/ ku ru ku ru/ su ru su ru/ mu ru ba ru/
177a2: zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o// mtshams dgum pa'i bar du bgyi'o// swA hA/ de nas de'i tshe rgyu skar gyi tshogs rnams kyis me kha la'i rig sngags kyi 'khor phul ba/ s+yAd ya thI dan/ ta ma la/ ta la/ a he/ da he/ A kA shAH
177a3: ma le/ zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o// mtshams dgum pa'i bar du bgyi'o// swA hA/ de nas de'i tshe klu'i tshogs rnams kyi mkha la'i rig sngags kyi 'khor phul ba/ s+yAd ya shrI dan/ e le me le/ a tsa le/ ba d+he/ A shub d+ha/
177a4: mo k+She/ zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o// mtshams dgum pa'i bar du bgyi'o// swAhA/ de nas de'i tshe lha ma yin gyi tshogs rnams kyis me kha la'i rig sngags kyi 'khor phul ba/ s+yAd ya shrI dan/ ti/ a d+ha d+ha re/ bi bu de/ sam pu te/ na//
177a5: ti/ zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o// mtshams dgum pa'i bar du bgyi'o swA hA/ de nas de'i tshe gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyis me kha la'i rig sngags kyi 'khor phul ba/ s+yAd ya thId na/ tsha tsha ba ti/ tsha tsha ba ti/ ru ru d+ha/
177a6: rA// u b+hir/ pa ra/ zhi ba dang bde lags su 'gyur bar bgyi'o// mtshams dgum pa'i bar du bgyi'o swA hA/ de nas de'i tshe yi dgas dang / sha za dang / grul bum gyi tshogs kyis me kha la'i rig sngags kyi 'khor phul ba/ s+yAd ya thI dan/ b+hu ti bab+hU
177a7: ti/ a ti b+hU ti/ sa brtan b+hU ti/ zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o// mtshams dgum pa'i bar du bgyi'o swA hA/ de nas de'i tshe srul po dang / lus srul po'i tshogs kyis me kha la'i rig sngags kyi 'khor phul ba/ s+yAd ya thI da na/ 5
177a8: dum/ kA rA Ti/ a d+hita/ tsu te/ sa mir ni/ chu chu ba ti/ zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur bar 'gyi'o// mtshams dgum pa'i bar du bgyi'o swAhA/ de nas de'i tshe ma mo'i tshogs thams cad kyis mkha la'i rig sngags kyi 'khor phul gaspang /
177b1: ya dan/ ka le ma ka le/ ma ga leg Tar// ma ra/ zhab dang de legs su 'byung bar babya'o// mtshams dbus rdzing du / den de ma phyogs can gran pa can mo pani podag gas mkhal 'ag sngags kyil nga/
177b2: bral ba/ sung ma ljid na/ in bA ne/ dze/ khabadz+re/ lu khu ri ma ri hi ri/ zhi dang bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o// mtshams dbum pa'i bar dub kyi 'os / de nas de'i tshe srin mo chen po 'gro lding mas mel la'i rig sngags kyi
177b3: Ag / ma/ / mas shI na du/ ma
177b4: gaM ri ti sho ti/ me to'i/ ba te/ me ti/ theng ni/ dra ti ni/ yang ne/ haSha bte/ 'arnga thab/ btsun pa 'dzin gro 'a ba'i dgi sngags nyim kha la'i gzung ba sngags kyi 'khong dubral ba lags so// srung ba dang yongs su brgyab ba dang /
177b5: yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang mtshon spang ba dang / drug gzhil ba dang mi mdza' ba bzlog pa dang / dbag tshad bcu gnyis su mtshams dgum pa dang / yongs su bsgyu
177b6: bar bgyi'o/ / lha makru 'am gnod sbyin na ma grin po mthul bus ma ma dri za'am yi dgas sam srul po'am lus srul po'am/ lha ma yin namanam mkha' lding dam mi'am ci'am lho 'phye chen po'am ska ma byed dam brjed byed dam/
177b7: byed pa gshed byed dam byang snyemasas mar langs sam/ nyin gcig pa'am nyin gnyis pa'am nyin gsum pa mnyen pazhipa'am mi ma yin pa gang gis kyang gnod par bgyid par mgyur cig/ so 'dri ba 'am rnam par 'chab 'am
177b8: klags lngaba'am klags tshol ba las klags rnyed par 'gyur ba de ni gnas ma mchis te sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ma gtogs so/ / 'jigs pa thams cad dang mi thams cad dang mi ma yin pa thams cad las rtag tu bde legs
178a1: su gyur cig swA hA/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis me kha la'i rig sngags 'khor dang bcas bzung shig/ kun dga' bo ma kha la'i rig sngags 'di ni
178a2: sprin 'ching ba rlung gnon pa tshar gcod pa bdag bsrung ba gzhan bsrung bgrong dang grong khyer bsrung ba mtshams gcod pa ste/ lha'am klu'am gnod sbyin nam srin po'am yi dgas sa ma grul bum 'am/ shaza' ma lus srul po'am/
178a3: dge slong ngam bram ze'am spyod pa'amathun du rtswa'am gcer bupa'am 'tshe ba'am mi thod pa can nam/ lus skya'am mi'am mi ma yin pas 'da' bar bya ba ma yin pa'o// kun dga' bom 'a la'i rig sngags 'di ni gagod byed dang
178a4: byed ste ma dang ro yangs thams cad 'jig par byed pa'o/ / gdon thams cad bzlog pa'o// bkra mi shis pa thams cad 'jig par byed pa'o// kun dga' bo mkha la rig sngags 'di ni dge sbyong gis byas pa gcod par byed pa'o// bram thos
178a5: byas par spyod pa dang kun du chu dang 'tsho ba bas byas pa'i rig nga da 'o/ / bang phyug chen pos byas pa'i rig sngags ga byud 'o// ngas pas byas pa dang / rgyubyin gyis byas pa dang / kwa'i rgyal pos byas pa dang /
178a6: rgyal po chen pos byas pa dang / khyab 'jug gis byas pa dang 'dod pa'i dbang phyug gis byas pa'i rig sngags gcod par byed pa'o// rgyal po chen pos byas pa dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon gyis byas pa dang zla ba dang nyi ma dang / rgyu sa dang /
178a7: gnas byas pa'i rig sngags gcod par byed pa'o// lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang srin po dang / dri za dang lha ma yin dang / namamatha' ldi dang mi 'am ci dang / lho' phye chen pos byas pa'i rig sngags gcod par byed pa'o// rdzu 'phrul dang ldan
178a8: pas byas pa'i rig sngags gad par byed pa'o/ / 'a pas byas pa'i ga sngags gcod par byed pa'o// nga khrod pas byas pa'i ga sngags gcod par byed pa'o// ging du bas byas pa dang / dru sas byas pa dang// rtsolas rgyas
178b1: pa dang / sa pas byas pa dang nam mkha' bas byas pa dang / gnas thams cad pas byas pa dang mes byas pa dang / mi ma yin pas byas pa'i rig sngags gcod par byed pa'o// mkha la'i rig sngags 'di ni gcod pa'o// phyir gcod pa'o//
178b2: byis gcod pa'o// kun dga' bo gang gis me khala'i rig sngags 'dis bsrung ba dang / yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang yongs su bskyang ba dang ni bdang bde legs su 'gyur ba dang / chang brdung bdang mtshan ma spang ba dang / duH
178b3: gzhil ba dang mi mdza' bzlog pa dang / dpag tshad dam dpag tshad gnyis sam dpag tshad bcu gnyis kyi bar du mtshams gcad par byas na/ gang ma kha la'i rig sngags las 'da' bar byed pa ni/ lha dang bcas pa dang bdu dang bcas pa
178b4: dang tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang dge sbyong dang bcas pa'i skye dgu'i 'jig rten dang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten nas ma mthong te de ni gnas med do/ / kun dga' bo sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bden pa dang / chos kyi
178b5: bden pa dang dge 'dun gyi bden pa dang bden par smra ba thams cad kyi bden pa dang / drang srong thams cad kyi bden pa 'di las sems can gyi tshogs 'gal bar ma byed cig/ kun dga' bo dus las 'das par mi bya ba lnga ni 'di yin te/
178b6: sangs rgyas kyi bangan pa las 'da' bar mi bya ba dang / chos kyi bden pa las bda' bar mi bya ba dang / dge 'dun gyi bden pa las 'da' bar mi bya ba dang / bden par smra rnams kyi bden pa las 'da' bar mi bya ba dang / drang srong gi bden pa las 'da' bar mi bya ba ste 'byung
178b7: po thams cad dang rang thams cad dang mi thams cad dang mi ma yin pa thams cad kyis 'da' bar bya ba mi yin pa'o/ / nad thams cad dang 'byung po thams cad dang sdang ba thams cad dang / mi mdza' ba thams cad las bde legs su gyur ci/
178b8: gang yang rnam par mtho 'tsham par ma byed cig/ 'tshe bar ma byed cig/ gang yang rdeg par ma byed cig swA hA/ mekha la'i rig sngags kyi cho ga bshad par bya'o// sangs rgyas la me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / lha bshos ngag phul//
179a1: nas phyes bsrung bar bya'o// gtsang mas gos gtsang mgos te ba lang gi lci bas dkyil 'khor byugs nas me tog dag bkram ste ci 'byor pa'i gtor ma'am phye ma'am pad ma dang bza' ba dang tung ba dang me tog kres pas bum pa cag
179a2: pa'am snod bkang ba'i dbus su 'dug nas spos kyi rgyun mi 'chad par 'dug par bya'o/ / rtswa ku shas thams cad la byab par bya'o// bdag bsrung ba dang / gzhan bsrung bar bya ba'i ni skud pas so// sprin bcing ba ni me tog snga ma'i shing dang snga
179a3: ma'i mar gyis sbyin bsreg bya'o/ / rlung dang char bzlog pa ni rtswa muny+dza'i lhas ma la lan gsum bzlas brjod byas te rtsa ba'i rig sngags kyis lan bdun btab nas mdud pa bdun dor bar bya'o// lam grub pa dang / bde bar bya na chos gos
179a4: kyi grwar lan bdun gsum bzlas brjod byas te mdud pa gsum bor bar bya'o/ / zas dkar gsum zos la nyin zhag gsum bsrung bar byas nas par ma dang yungs dkar dkar po la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas te grong ngam grong
179a5: khyer mtshams gcad par bya'o/ / rig sngags thams cad gcod par 'dod pas sna tshogs pa'i mtshon cha la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas te tshul gcad par bya'o// snod sar bar chu blugs nas lan bdun bzlas brjod byas te khrus byas na
179a6: log 'dren thams cad bcing ba byas par 'gyur ro/ / me tog dkar po dag la bzlas brjod byas te bsnun na dug med par 'gyur ro// nad thams cad la shing ka ra pi ra'i lcug mas byab par bya ste/ bdag bsrung ba byas na gang du gdon gyi phyir
179a7: yang las thams cad bya'o/ / 'thab mo dang rtsod pa dang 'gyed pa'am rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor du snga ma'i me tog gi 'bru mar gyi nang du a ti mug ta ka smyig ma'i yam sreg shing la 'gro lding pa'i rig sngags kyis btab ste la na bcu bzhir
179a8: sbyin bsreg bya'o/ / 'byung po dbang du bya bar 'dod pas ra'i 'o ma dang / ra'i mar dang / shing a ba marga'i yi sreg shing dag la 'gro lding pa'i rig sngags kyis btab ste lan lngar sbyin bsreg bya'o// 'gro ba thams cad kyi ched du sbyin sreg bya
179b1: par 'dod pas 'bras brag po che dang ba'i 'o ma dang / ru d+ha dang / rgya mcha dang / shing ka bar dkar ba' ya bsreg shing la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas te sbyin sreg byas na sems can thams cad kyi ched du sbyin sa ga byas par 'gyur ro// da
179b2: par bya ba'i don du ru ta dang / 'bru mar las 'gro lding ba'i rig sngags kyis lan bdun bzlas brjod byas te gdong bskus nas smras na gang bslangs pa de thob par 'gyur ro// thams cad du yang de bzhin gshegs pa'am de bzhin gshegs pa'i
179b3: mchod rten la sras dang phreng ba dang byug pa dang me tog dang bdug pa dang phye ma dang / thug pa rnams kyis mchod cing ci rus kyis lha ba shos dag kyang 'bul bar byas te/ bsrung ba dang bcas chog dang bcas pas ma mjed kyi sems can thams cad
179b4: bsrungs par gyur cig swA hA/ 'di ni dngos grub po// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / gzhon nu sgra ga can zin dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang / dri zar
179b5: bcas pa'i 'jig rten yod rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ / 'phags pa mkhal zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradz+nyA bar mi dang / 'u chen gyi la nub pa na ya shas
179b6: sA la segs pas sbyar cing zhus ta gtan la phab pa'o/ / #// rgya gar skadadu/ Ar+ya su bAhu ba ri pr-id ts+tsha nA ma tan tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa dpung bzang gis zhus pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud/ thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal
179b7: le/ / gnod spyir bdag po nyam stong gi gzi// thugs rjes rtse cig yid kyur bzhugs pa la// dpung bzang tshul bzhin gus par phyag 'tshal nas// rig dang gsang sngags tshogs kun grub pa zhus// bdag gis sa stangs ma rnams bzlam
179b8: brjod dang / smr-id dang yang dag sdom pa mi bzang bas// rab tu bsgrims kyang grub pa ma mthong na// yab gcig ci slad dka' thub don ma mchis// gtso bo gzi brjid nyi 'od me lta bu// khyod kyis sdig 'joms dag byed rnams kyi mchog// bden
180a1: ba'i gsung gis rab tu bka' stsal na/ / ci ltar sngags rnams 'bras bu ma mchis 'gyur// rab dang 'bring dang de bzhin tha ma rnams// bsgrubs kyang gsang sngags 'bras bu mi stsol la// bsnyen pas ci ste cung zad 'grub med na//
180a2: sgrub pa nyon mongs kho na ci rung lags// rgyal bas ye shes zhi ba gang yin pa// de yis 'di dag gso bar sngon gsungs na// gang la sngags dang rig pa grub med pa// de dag rnams kyang ci ltar gso bar bgyi// thugs rjer ldan pas 'gro la sman
180a3: slad du/ khyod kyis gsang sngags sna tshogs bshad pa'i rnams// de dag bzlas brjod sbyin bsreg brdul zhugs dang // bsnyen la sogs pas ma grub ci las gyur// cho ga nyams sa ma 'on te mthu ma mchis// dus kyi rang bzhin lags sa pa
180a4: sdig pas bsgribs/ / gsang sngags gzhan du gyur tam 'tshel las gyur// thams cad ma lus bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs// sras kyi tshig de nges par gsan gyur nas// yud tsam dgongs nas dkyus ring spyan phye ste// phyag gis rdo rje mestag
180a5: zer 'phro ba/ / gsor nas rdo rje can gyis 'di skad gsungs// e ma'o zla ba'i 'od ltar lha ma me ba'i// snying rjes sems can phan phyir khyod 'dri ba// shin tu dri ma med pa'i sems 'di yis// bde gshegs sras nang pha rol phyin par gyur// byang
180a6: chub sems dpa' rang gi bde ma chags/ / rang gi sdug bsngal rnams kyis mi brjed kyang // gzhan gyi sdug bsngal rnams kyis sdug bsngal te// de dag bde bas dga' dang ldan par gyur// bu khyod rang bzhin bzang po 'di lta bus// gang phyi sa
180a7: can phan phyir khyod 'dri ba/ / de phyir myur du rtse gcig yid byos dang / gsang sngags mdo sde'i tshul bzhin ngas bshad do// gsang sngags bzlas brjod gang dag ngas gsungs pa// de yi brtul zhugs dang por ngas bshad do// de yis bde bar gshegs
180a8: la rang bskyed nas/ / de bzhin du ni byang chub sems kyang skyed// ser sna dregs dang rgyags pa rnams spangs te// dkon mchog gsum la dad pas bsnyen bkur bya// rdo rje rigs shes brjod pa rgya chen dang // nga la yang ni dad cing dga' bar bya// tshig
180b1: rtsub phra ma 'phyal pa smra ba dang / / gzhan gyi bud med bgrod dang brdzun smra dang // ru dang gzhan gyi srog gcod gdod byed dang // chang dang byed pa rtag du spang bar bya// rmongs pa dag gis lus dang ngag dang ni// de bzhin yid kyis bsod nams bsags/
180b2: byas kyang / thams cad log par lta bas btsem pas na// de yi rnam smin me 'dod 'bras bur gyur// dper nas dang chu dang dus ldan yang // sa bon tshig pa myu gu mi bskyed ltar// de bzhin mi shes log ltas bcom pa yi// sems la dge
180b3: ba'i chos rnams mi skye'o/ / de phyir log par lta ba rnam spangs la// yang dag lta ba la ni sten par gyis// rtag tu sems ni dge ba bcu dag gi/ chos kyi lam la gnas par byas na legs// lha dang lha min sha za khrag mthung ba// mtshan mo rgyub mi
180b4: bzang 'jig rten na/ / sems can rnams la gnod pa byed cing rgyu// bzlas brjod brtson pa'i sems ni g.yengs par byed// de dag rnams kyi gnyen por gyur pa'i phyir// da yis gsang sngags rig pa'i tshogs mthong na// skrag par byed do snyam
180b5: du dogs bskyed pa/ / de phyir zlos pa'i sems ni g.yeng bar byed// de ltar gnod byed de dag gzhom pa dang // bdag nyid 'byor par bya phyir ngas gsungs pa'i// dkyil 'khor lha dang lha min gnas gyur pa// dam tshig ci bzhin bsod nams don du lta/
180b6: sna tshogs po yi gdon rnams gnas pa la// gang zhig rnam pa sna tshogs las byed cing // dkyil 'khor de ni gnod byed gzhom pa'i phyir// me yis rab tu bsgribs nas 'jug par bya// gang yang rig pa mchog tu gsungs pa dang // khro bo'i
180b7: dkyil 'khor du yang gzhug par bya/ / der ni dam tshig sna tshogs das bshad pa// sdig pa bsal phyir rgyun du blta bar bya// rdo rje rig gtso bo nya mo yi tshogs// rig pa mang pos bsten pa'i lha mod// zlos pa mthong na bgegs rnams bu pa dang /
180b8: rnam pa zon zhing shin tu skrag par 'gyur// ci ltar ci ltar dkyil 'khor mthong ba dang // de lta de ltar rdo rje rigs bsten dang // rig pa'i tshogs la bsten pa'i bsod nams kyis// de yi lus la ma lus byin brlabs 'jug/ mi tshugs/
181a1: rdo rje'i bdag nyid de mthong dang // sa phyogs rdo rje'i ma'abar de shes nas// lbaklu lha min gnod sbyin grub pa'i rnams// bzlas brjod byed pas skrag nas 'khyer par 'gyur/ de yi dam tshig mthong ba'i bu dag gis// 'jig tan 'jig nan
181a2: 'das pas bshad pa yis/ / gsang sngags des ni ma bstims bzhin du 'grub// bgags rnams thams cad brlag par byed par 'gyur// deg dang dem tshig mthob snying rje med// de bzhin byang chub sems ni ma bskyed ceng// sangs rgyas ma dang
181a3: gzhan la bte las/ / nga yigasang sngags bzlas na brang bar 'gyur// bas ma bzhan cing nyams kyis mi lcogs pas// dkyil 'khor de kun blta bar mi nus na'ang // de las gang yang rung ba'i dkyil 'khor ni// gtsog tsam zhig kyang dpas mthong /
181a4: bya na/ gdo kun chags dang mtshan mo ba dang / sa tha'i gdod rnams can dang / dab dang // sgral tshogs dang shegs dang log len nams/ brdul brags gnas pa de la grags mil// pe na lo to ga thams cad pa dag la na
181a5: ras skyon med par ni sa bltar/ / de bzhin tshul khrims brten nas chos dkar mchog/ snying rje'i chus brlan pas ni rnam pa skye// rgyal ba des gsungs so so thar pa yi// tshul khrims rnam dag 'dul ba ma lus las// sngags pa'i mangs kra/
181a6: 'a tshag spang // rnag ma rnams de rnams su tha bar bya// de ltar sdug pa'i chos las rnamagrol nas// bde ba gshegs pas lags par gsungs pa'i chos// dag cing grol ba dang ni ldan 'gyur ba'o// bas pas ston ma thug par ga/ kha
181a7: zhing ben pas yi phyogs sun/ / 'jim pa' ma ni bye ma las byas pa'i// bdag shags mchod tan tan 'brel snying po can// sdig pa sbyang ba'i phyir ni rtag tug pa// ring bsrel can gyi sku gzugs mchod rten la// bstod cing phreng badred pang ci
181a8: 'bral/ gags dmyal mtshan pa da ro modang/ mchog dad pa yis ni mchod par bya// nam yang 'thor log cig pa'i shig ni/ dang ldan dang par du'i gro ltang/ de bzhin bslab pa yin thogs mad na// lus pa dad sa tha
181b1: ma 'gyur ro/ / den po ldan pazugs paca gsang // gas na btsun ni chos la gzhol ba dang/ skyongs patshand dpa' 'dang po la// nan pang b+ba'i sbyi pa ga can// gras gom go yongs da ba dang / tham/
181b2: da ni rtagazhan mchod mi byed// sbyin zhing bzol byas pa thob dang // dkon mchog gsum la dang ba grogs po yin// de lta'i yon tanam lus ldan padag// btsad pa'i dus dashin du gan pas na// yon tan byed dang bzhi cha 'aman ngam/
181b3: ma/ de la ba dag sngags pa'i grogs por bsten// 'phags pa dpung bzang gis zhus pa'i le'u sna dang po'o// // rang sangs rgyas dang bde gshegs nyid skyes dang // rgyal ba sngon chad gdan bzhugs bzhugs pa'i// gnas
181b4: gang bsod nams ldan gang yid dga' ba/ / lha dang lha min sogs pas phyag 'tshal mchod// goso sbyong sdom pa dag dang ldan pa yis// bdag nyid dag par bya phyir bsnyen par bya// de lta bu dag med gzhan yang ni// chu bo chu gung 'bab chu mod
181b5: pa dang / pad ma ud pa las ni brgyan pa'i mtsho// skye bo rnams kyang shin tu mi rgyu ga// nga zhi na mtha'i chun mang ba dang // mi bzad gdon rnams kyang na mi gnas pa// me tog 'bras bu gcad ma yod pa dang // sman ljongs ljon shing sna tshogs da la
181b6: ba dang / sa stangs gnas mal shin tu gtsang ba dang // gang na stag gzig seng gi med pa dang // yid 'ong mnyam zhing tsher ma med pa dag/ mi yi dngos grub gnas su bsgrags pa yin// grog po grog mkhar thal ba skra shad dang // nyal nyil sol/
181b7: batsha sgo'amachog can srang // der nis bkos sbyangs nas gnas brtsegs pa// drol brtan zhing 'jim pas nalanal bya// shar ram byang ngam nub du sgo gtod cing // lho phyogs su ni nam yang sgom gtod// dri gtsang bang ba de yi phyogs cig tu// rgyal
181b8: ba lam mchog rnam la ston pa yi/ / ras kyi sku gzugs las phyir bstan par gdags// yang na shing gzugs legs pa mchod phyir bzhag/ tha ga pas btags 'jam la snyoms pa dang // thags bzang de bzhin sra shad med pa dang // 'o lag/
182a1: che zhing mnyams 'tshar bcas// ras kyi gzugs dmil dngos grub gter// gtsang ma spos chus btab pa de la ni// mtshon rtsi sbyin med sdod gsar blugs pa yis// zhus byas gtsang ma gso sbyong gzung ba'i mi// mkhas pas pa
182a2: glang spu yis bri bar bya/ / phreng ba bdug spos mar me lha bshos dang // byug pa dag gis sgra gzugs cher mchod de// nub phyogs zhal bstan mi g.yo brtan par gdags// de yi spyan sngar dngos grub brtsam par bya// gtsug phud gzhag ste skra'i
182a3: bregs nas su/ / 'byung khar tshon gyis gos kyi kha dog bsgyur// gos dkar dag gam shing lo 'am gso ma'am// zar ma 'am shing shun rnams kyi gos bgo'o// slu ba 'am lcags sam 'jim pa las byas pa'i dbyibs ni legs shing mi rtsub
182a4: 'jam pa dang / / ma chag zlum zhing mi gis rma med pa// yid du 'ong ba'i lhung bzed bcang bar bya// ha cang mi nye ha cang mi ring la// bza' btung mod cing changs rigs mang ba dang // 'gron la mchod byed legs par gnas pa'i grong // bram ze phyi rol skye
182a5: bo med par brten/ / nga rgyal gyis ni non pa'i bram ze rnams// rigs kyis rlom zhing snying rje mi ldan pa// de dag bde bar gshegs pa'i mchod rten la// mchod pa mthong nas bgegs kyang byed par 'gyur// bram ze sangs rgyas pa la ci ltar dman//
182a6: smra ba las bram ze dag la rmangs rigs rnams// bsnyen bkur dang ni mchod pa 'byung bas na// rmangs rigs kyis kyang gsang sngags ci ltar bzlas// lha dang 'gron mchod pa dang las drug dang // rgyal po dang ni me lha bsten pa dang // bu yi don du 'gro/
182a7: bar bya ba dag/ bram ze rnams kyi nges par grub pa yin// rgyal rigs rje'u rigs rnams kyang rang gi las// grub pas 'di la the tshom ma byed ces// brdzun du smra ba sna tshogs skyon dag gis// bdag dang gzhan gyi sems ni bsreg par byed// yan
182a8: lag brgyad lam gnas pas rtag tu ni/ / nyi ma phyed 'tshams tshun chad bslang bar bya// bram ze'i dus ni phye dro yin pas na// de phyir bram ze'i khyim du 'gro mi bya// dge dang mi dge shes pa bzung na ni// bram ze rmongs rigs dag la khyad par med// 'on
182b1: kyang 'gro ba'i thos ni bram ze dang / / 'di ni mangs rigs yin zhes brtags par zad// bden pa'i lami dmigs dge ba'i rjes 'brangs na// mangs rigs dag kyang skye shi med par 'gro// log pa'i lam zhugs nyes par spyod ldan na// bram ze gang
182b2: mid mi bzad dmyal bar lhurang/ / lus can shin tu drim ldan pa dag/ 'di na gzhan gyis dag par mi 'gyur te// de ni sdig pa rnam par bsal ba dang // bsod nams ma lus yongs su bzung bas 'dag/ dper na ma ni gso dang bsal ba'i phyir//
182b3: nad padag la sman pa sbyin pa ltar// de bzhin 'dir yang bsgres pa'i sdug bsngal dag/ bsal phyir rgyal bas kha zas bza' bar gsungs// la la lam gyis dub cing 'gro ba'i tshe// bkres bsgom gdungs pas rang gi bu yi sha/ za ba bzhin du/
182b4: rnal 'byor sems dman bzhin// tshe dang rgyags phyir bza' bar mi bya'o// mang du blugs na rtsol med ma tho ba dang // de bzhin nyu dus srang ni dma'agyur la// ran pas skad cig mnyam par 'gro ba ltar// lus can kha zas de ltar bza' bar bya/
182b5: dper na khang rnying mi zhig bya ba'i phyir// mi yis ka ba brtan po btsugs pa ltar// de bzhin lus kyi 'khrul 'khor gnas pa dang // shing rta'i mig bsku bzhin du kha zas bza'// 'dod pa'i khams ni kha zas kyis gnas shes// rgyal bas
182b6: chos gcig tu ni bka' stsal pas/ / lus ni chu shing bzhin du rig byas te// sems ni bza' gtung tshogs la chags mi bya// dbang po drug po yul la 'phro ba dag/ bde gshegs gsungs pa'i shes pas bsrung bar bya// lhung bzed de dag
182b7: las ni gcig thogs nas/ / gnya' shing gang du lta zhing bsod snyoms spyad// 'dzum zhing 'gro la smra zhing zur mig can// yan lag thams cad yid 'phrog byed pa'i gzugs// bud med gzugs ni mtshon cha 'jebs 'dra bas// skyes pa'i sems ni
182b8: mngon du 'phrog par byed/ / lcags kyi thod lcags rab tu 'bar ba yis// mig ni rnam par bkab pa ches sla yi// nyes na dran pa nyams byed bud med kyi// dkyus ring mig can bzhin ni ma mthong sla// gang du dga' bar 'gro zhing 'dzin med la// sems
183a1: kyis sems ni rnam par 'dul bzhin du/ / rab dang 'bring la sogs pa spangs nas su// mi smra bA ni gzhan gyi khyim du 'gro// gang na pa gzhon ze 'phrug chung ba dang // gang na skyes bu chang ni 'thung ba dang // gar na bu mo gzhon bsten pa
183a2: pa dang / de bzhin gang na gzhon nu rtse ba dang // gang na khyi za dga' ston byed pa dang // gang na skye bo mang po 'dus pa dang / de bzhin gang na rol mo byed pa rnams// der ni skyes bu nam yang 'gro mi bya// bsod snyoms ci snyed khyer te 'ongs nas kyang // dang por
183a3: ci ltar bde bar bgo bar bya/ / rkang bkrus blo bur ba la byin nas su// lus bsrung phyir ni bzas bza' bar bya// dus su zos nas dus gsum khrus byas te// phreng ba mar me bdug pa stod dang dri// sha chang med pa'i lha bshos phul nas su// ku
183a4: sha'i khres la 'dug nas bzlas brjod bya/ / bdug pa byug spos la sogs ma rnyed na// dri zhim me tog sna tshogs dbul bar bya// pra ba arka bil ba 'bri ha te// ku sha dri ngan yid du mi 'ong spang // 'greng ngas 'dug gam ma log nyal ba dang // 'gra
183a5: 'phros za klog bzlas brjod byed pa na/ / rjes su dran drugaso so'i yon tan dag/ rig par bcas te rjes su dran par bya// 'phags pa dpung bzang gis zhus pa'i le'u gnyis pa'o// / 'dod chags la sogs non mongs chogs ldan pa'i/
183a6: sems ni 'khor ba yin par kun du brjod// nyon mongs rnam grol shel dang zla 'dra ba'i// srid pa'i rgya mtsho'i mthar ni yongs su bsgrags// dper na dri med chu ni rdul tshogs kyis// skad cig du yang rnyog par byed pa ltar// de bzhin rnam dag drim
183a7: med pa'i sems/ / 'dod chags la sogs skyon gyis brnyogs par 'gyur// bo de tse dang dung shel ru rag sha/ lung tang pad ma'i snying po zhi nye zangs// khar ba'i bgrang phreng brgya ni rdza brgyad pa// de dag las ni bgrang phreng gcig blangs te// da ni
183a8: lag pa g.yas pas bzung ba'am/ / lag pa g.yon pas bsgrims te mi 'khrul bzung // tshar re phyin cing nor bu re re nas// sngags pa yis ni rim bzhin dran par bya// 'dug nas dbang po yang dag bsdam pa dang // lus kyang drang zhing
183b1: brtan par bzhag nas su/ / byis nim mchu shin du mdzes par yang // bsgral zhing gsang sngags ci dgar bzlas brjod bya// sems ni glog dang sprin dang drung dang mtshungs// rgya mtsho chen po yi ni brlabs dang 'dra// smra can 'dod dgur yul ba mon
183b2: dga' ba/ / g.yo zhing 'phyan pa nges par 'dul bar bya// gang tshe zlos pa'i sems ni zhib la// bsten pas gnyid kyis dran pa rmongs gyur na// langs nas bcag cing phyogs su blta ba dang // tshwa yis gdong yang yongs su bkru bar bya// las kyi
183b3: dbang gyur bdag po med pa dang / / mgon ma skyabs med tsha bas gcig nas gcig/ lus kyi la brgyad rjes su rab 'gro ba// de yi rjes su dge dang mi dge 'brang // tshol dang mnga' ba shes dang ni rnam par bral// mi sdug pa dang phrad cing 'dod pas
183b4: gdungs/ / ngan pa skye rgan 'chi sdug bsngal can// yul rnams kun du song na'ang med pa min// sha sbrang tsha grang bkres dang ngaral la sogs// gang du song yang sdug bsngal nyid yin pas// yul la mngon dga'i sems ni 'byung bas na// nam rtog
183b5: de dag rnams kyis bzlog par bya/ / 'dod chags shas che mi gtsang sha tshil dang // pags pa geng rus lta bas rnam par bzlog/ byams dang snying rje'i chus gad bzhe sdang la// gti mug la ni rten 'brel lam gyis so// re shig gcig na dgra yang mdza
183b6: bor 'gyur/ / mdza' bo dag kyang dgrar ni 'gyur ba nyid// de bzhin kha cig kyang ni bar mar 'gyur// bar ma de nyid kyang ni dgra bor 'gyur// de ltar mdza' bshes 'gyur bar rig bya ste// blo gros ldan pas nam yang chags mi bya// gnyen la dga' ba'i
183b7: sems kyi rtog pa dag/ bzlog nas dge la ci bder gzhag par bya// dang po bzlas nas bzlas brjod zin par du// bram ze rgyal rigs rje'u rigs zhing pa dang // bud med ma ni dakhye'u bu mo dang // sngags 'chang nam yang smra bar mi bya'o// ci ste dgos pa
183b8: yod na sngags g.yog dang / / bzlas brjod zin nas cung zad smra bar bya// smras nas lung pa bshad ci bor nas kyang // chu yi nang du zhugs nas khrus kyang bya// me tog dri snod par me phul ba dang // tshul khrims brtson 'grus dka' thub byas pa yi//
184a1: dge ba de ni blan med pa yi// sangs rgyas byang chub bra med mchog tu bsngo// dper na chu klung rgya mtshor byin pa na// lan tshwa'i rod na gcig tu gyur pa bzhin// de ltar tha med byang chub ba sngos pa 'i// bsod nams rgyal pa'i
184a2: gcig tu 'gyur/ dper na skyes bral la 'bras bu'i byir// sa lu bskyed kyis sog ma'i phyir min yang // sa mu da nas bsgrim pa med par ni// sog ma'i phung po zhar la 'byung ba bzhin/ de bzhin byang chub 'bras bu 'a'od pa'i phyig/
184a3: bsod nams bsgrub kyi longs spyod phyir min yang // sog ma'i phung po dag dang mtshungs par ni// ma bsgrims bzhin du mi yi longs spyod 'grub// tshe ring ba 'di legs par thob pa dang // chos bzhin sgrub pa'i yul dag rnyed pa 'am// skyob med
184a4: par 'gyur zhing 'gro ba yi/ / bsam pa rnams ni rtag tu rdzogs par bya// grags dang ma grags rnyed dang ma rnyed dang // bde dang sdug bsngal de bzhin bstod smad dag/ sems kyis 'jig rten chos rnams rab bcom ste// sdig pa'i gnas su
184a5: gyur pa spang bar bya/ / dper na rgya mtsho skad gcig tsam yang ni// mi yi ro dang lhan cig mi gnas ltar// de bzhin rnam rtog sems kyis sdig byas pa// sngags pas skad cig tsam yang gnas mi bya// dper na rlung mad khang pa'i nang du ni// mar me
184a6: btsugs pa mi g.yo 'bar bltar/ / rtse gcig sems kyis zlos la mngon dga' ba'i// lus la chos kyang de bzhin 'bar bar gyur// stangs dang mchod pa dang ni gar byed dang // glu len rnga brdung skye bos dbyas gyur dang // lhag pa'i nga rgyal 'dri da
184a7: 'dod chen dang / / brgyan po dang ni 'dus la lta 'dod dang // dus min gnyid dang mi 'grub smrab dang // bstan bcos ngan dang snyan dag klog 'don dang // chags dang 'tshig dang dregs dang rgyags pa dang // zhel dri dang le lo ga yo rgyu spang // sha cang
184a8: ke'u dang tsong dang sgog rdog dang / / 'bru mar til dang la phug sur na// 'byung po'i zas dang lha ba shos gtor ma dang // gu lang mchod byas gtor ma mi bza'a'o// ngas ni sngags pa kha zas dkar gsum dang // rtsab sdong bu 'bras bu tshod
184b1: ma dang / zhodang nas dang 'o ma mang dag dang // 'bru mar tshigram dang ba 'ol kon dang // thug pa rnams ni bza' btung yin par gsungs// sha za srin po dag dang gnon po dang // ro langs dang ni 'jigs pa sgrub pa dang // lha min bu mo'i 'khrul 'khor/
184b2: 'joms pa'i tshe// 'bru mar tshigs ma'i bza' ba mchog tu bsngags// de ltar bzlas brjod byed pa'i bsgrub pa pos// nyin gcig bzhin du byas nas bzlas pa ni// phul nas cho ga bzhin du gshegs su gsol// nub mo ku sha bting nas
184b3: nyal bar bya/ / byams pa snying rje dga' dang btang snyoms ldan pa dang // bde gshegs chos dang dge 'dun bcas pa dran byas te// sha ri'i bu dang ngal thal sbyar btud nas nyal// de ltar bsngags pa sdig pa mtha' dag zad par bya// 'phags pa dpung
184b4: bzang gis zhus pa'i le'u gsum pa'o/ / bsgrub pa po yis nges par bcang ba yi// rdo rje de dag gang yin bshad par bya// sor bcu bcu gnyis bcu drug bcwa brgyad dang // mchog gi tshadang ni sor yang nyi shu pa'o// gser gyi rdo rje rig 'dzin
184b5: nyid dang ni/ / sa rnams thob par bya phyir rab tu shis// rgyal po'i don du dngul gyi mchog yin te// zangs kyi rin chen 'byung ba'i klu bsgrub la// lha min dbang po'i 'khrul 'khor gzhig pa dang // 'ug du 'gro la rdo yi rdo rje'o// don kun bsgrub pa/
184b6: la ni lcags gsum gyi// gsang ba'i sdegazhom pa la lcags kyi'o// don gzhan la ni seng ldeng dpal dang tshe// nad med nor rdzas li ni bil ba'o// gnod sbyin mo bsgrub pa la mdu'i shing // chos kyi don du a shwa las byas shis// gsal shing
184b7: rtse mo 'digra rnams gzhig pa la/ / mi rnams bas dpal ni mi rus kyi// shes las byas pa mig 'phrul chen po la// dbyi phyir nim pa las byas rab tu shis// gsad cing bskam pa la ni ba ru'i shing // sha za ba sgrub pas yang nga tu shig / lha dang gnod
184b8: byin dri bslab pa la/ / blon gang mas ni byas pa'i dzijo'o// Nig klu ni dbang byed 'dan/ cikra shing rtsa ba las byas pa'o// gzugs bsdur ba las las byas pa ste// ngo sangs bsgrub pa la ni gtam pa'i// bran dag dang nga ma dang /
185a1: ma thang shi shi ni rjen gyi byed// zlab sam gri bar nab li// mardul sogs pa las byas padag/ mi rnams g.yul la sa rgyal bar bya phyir ro// yid myong ba'i 'dod pa pob bya'i phyir/ tsan dan dkar po dang ni dam po b+he/
185a2: legs 'jam zhing ma nyams rma med pa'i// rdo rje rje lnga sra ba bcang bar bya// dang po zlos tshad ni thogs nas su// bzlas brjod zin nas myur ba kho nar yang // dad pa'i sems kyis phyag byas dri sogs kyis// mchod nas rdo rje rgyal ba'i zhabs
185a3: drung gzhag/ nga yis rigs kyis gsang sngags sgrub pa pos// rdo rje med na grub par mi 'gyur ro// de las gcig kyang rnyed par ma gyur na// khu tshur bcangs nas rtse gcig sems kyis bzlas// ldong ngos 'gi'u wang ral gri a dz+han//
185a4: spangs ma babal zhags pa li kri btsag/ mar dang shu dag 'khor lo rdo rje mdung // lpags pa go tsa mdung ni rtse gsum pa// rdza ba ni bcu bdun bsgrags pa de rnams kyis// grub pa rnam pa gsum rnams thob par byed// rang sngags chog lhag
185a5: par bshad par gang / der yang grub pa rnam pa gsum du mthong // bgegs dang log 'dren grub par mi dga' ba// rig pa'i tshogs rnams kyis ni mdun nas rgyu// rigs 'dzin brtson pa'i bdag nyid can dag la// rnam pa sna tshogs glag
185a6: skabs tshol zhing rgyu/ / bgegs kyi rigs ni rnam pa bzhi yod de// sa stengs 'di na 'khod pa'i gegs rnams ni// rnam par 'jig dang wa dang ne'u le dang // de bzhin so gcig pa dang rigs rnam bzhi// de dang de las 'phros pa mtha' yas so//
185a7: sa stangs 'jig rten skyong bzhi gang yin pa// de dag g.yog 'khor mya ngan med pa yin// de yi g.yog 'khor bye ba phrag bdun rnams// de dag gsang sngags sgrub la bgegs byed do// wami rigs ni bye ba bcwo brgyad dag/ nga brug/
185a8: chen po'i 'khor te de rnams kyi// sde dpon glang chen gdong ste stobs po che// sa steng mtha' dag kun tu bgegs kyang byed// sogacig rig kyi sde po na gtsug 'phyang ste// bye ba drug/ cu'i bgegs la dbang sgyur zhing // tshangs dbang khyab 'jug nyim zla ba/
185b1: drug de rnams kyis bkang sngags la bgegs byed do// ne'u le'i rigs gang yin pa rgya che te// khri phrag bye ba ther 'bum phrag stong dang / de dag rnams ni sdeng po na gtsug nas phyung // yi rigs dang sngags la bgegs byed do// dga' byed padas
185b2: 'dra bar dkyus ring mig/ lngas rtsen sngags rgyud la ni bgegs kyang byed// nor spyod bu ni gang yin gang ba pa// rang gi gsang sngags rgyud la bgegs kyang byed// sgrub pa po ni 'byor bar mi dga' ba// brtse med rang rang rigs la bgegs kyang byed/
185b3: rang gi gsang sngags gzugs su rnam sprul nas// phreng ba dang ni gtor ma mngon du len// lha yis log 'dren gyis byas de mthong nas// bros shing 'khrugs nas phyir yang phyogs par 'gyur// sngon chad sems ni 'jungs dang rmongs pa yis/
185b4: lha yis log 'dren bgegs kyi lugs 'di btong // lugs 'di lta dang klu dang grub pa dang // sum cu rtsa gsum lhas kyang bzlog mi nus// bgegs kyis 'jigs su rung ba byas pa dag/ sngar bshad pas ni de dag bzlog par byed// bzlas brjod
185b5: ben nas legs par bsrung ba dang / dkyil 'khor mang byas bsgrub la 'jug par bya// gzhan du mchod pa'i chog med pa dang // bzlas brjod sbyin pa sreg chog bral ba'am// gang zhig rtag tu sems ni 'di ltar sems// rig pa gang zhig bdag
185b6: gis bzlas par bya/ / yul dang rgyal sogs gtam la chags pa de'i// lus la thogs pa med par rab tu 'jug// 'di ltar phan tshun du ni 'gro ba na// rig pa 'don pa'i sems ni g.yem par byed// dper na chun grib ma snang ba ltar// de bzhin
185b7: mi yi lus la 'jug par 'gyur/ / 'bru tshe gzhan la zlos pa na yang gzhan// nyal na gzhan min me tog bdug pa dang / mar mi 'bral ba'i tshe na gzhan yin pa// sbyin sreg byed pa na yang gegs gzhan 'bru// dper na ni zer ma shes ba
185b8: ba yi/ rkyen gyis ma bsgribs man 'byung ba ltar // de bzhin gegs kyang lungs la drags gyur na// 'dod chags ma chen kun du bskyed par byed// g.yo zhing 'gul ba zhes ni bya ba'i bgegs// chun skyes bu khru ba'i tshen la 'dzin//
186a1: bkres shing lus la snyems pa'i gnyid kyang che// de bzhin lus lci mchog du khro bar 'gyur// de bzhin dri za zhes ni bya ba'i bgegs// de ni dri 'bul ba na lus la 'jug/ yul dang rgyal po gnyen dang nor la sems// snyom zhing
186a2: bud med la ni chags par 'gyur/ / nag po lus canas ni brtol nas su// bdug pa rab tu 'bul ba'i tshe na 'jug// 'jungs dang g.yo skya byed cing mi sun la// 'dod chen che la rab tu khu chu 'dzag/ mar me gtsug phud gcig pa bgegs
186a3: byad/ / steng ka cha zhing gzer thabs sems nyams byed// 'greng ba'i tshen gtsug 'phyang 'jug 'gyur te// rims dang la khru sug drag pos 'debs par byed// me tog 'bul tshe me tog tsher bkod pa// rang gi gnas skabs rnyed nas lus
186a4: la 'jug/ rims dang cham pa lus tshigs na ba dang // grogs po dag dang rnam par bral bar byed// bgegs kyis brlams pa phyogs na lam min lam du mi thong // spyod pa sna tshogs byed cing 'dod chags rnams kyis gdungs// blo bur smra
186a5: zhing glog la don med kun du 'phyan/ / don du sgrub pa rnams la sems kyang yid gnyis byed// sems ni log par lta bas non pas na// gsang sngags med cing tho ris lha yang med// bsod nams med cing sdig pa cung zad med// thar pa med
186a6: 'ching ba'i rgyu yang med/ / skye ba don med nyon mongs bka' thub ches// sna tshogs 'khyal ba'i tshi/ 'di ga tu smra// sen mos rgya gtsod por rdo 'jig pa dang // mtshan mo so yang krig krig 'tsha' ba dang // bu mo bdag 'dod chung ma gzhan mi rnyed//
186a7: dgos pa 'don ni mi 'grub mi dgas 'grub// gang yang 'gro 'dod gnyid med mi yang brlam// de bzhin stag gzigaseng ge khyi dang pag/ khong bu rnga mo byi sha za la// bya rgod 'ug pa skye mo mri thung rdul// gcer bu thal ris can dang mnag go//
186a8: khron skams thod pa rus gong phung po dang // lcags dang rdo khud mi gtsang khang rul dang // kha bzhin 'gyur cing ral gri mdung thogs pa// mi las 'di rnams rmis pa'i mi yang ba rlams// bgegs dang log 'dren rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir/ bdu rtse
186b1: thabs sbyor drag shul thabs las sbyar/ / sngags pa de yi gsang sngags lam zhugs pa// bgegs dang log 'dren rnams kyis yongs mi tshugs// phyugs lhas shing gcig lha yi khang po 'am// lam gyi bzhi mdo khang stong nags tshal du//
186b2: dkyil 'khor grwa bzhi lham pa khru bzhi'i tshad// mtshon rtse rnam pa sna tshogs rnams kyis bri// phyogs kyi lha rnams gnas ni yongs su gzung // sgo bzhi pa la ku sha N+Da yang bkram// bza' dang sha chang la phrag la sogs bcas// 'bras chan 'bras pa
186b3: mang po'i gtor ma sbyin/ / bum pa pad mdamar po'i mdog 'dra ba// nag po ri med cing rin chen bcas// sman dang 'bru dang spos chus bkang ba bzhi// ldum bus kha brgyan ras kyis mgul ba bkri// lus dmar po dang kI li kI la dang // 'gro lding ga
186b4: lo sogs pas brgya bzlas te/ / dkyil 'khor khor yug du ni bzhag par bya// de nas byug spos bdug spos la sogs 'bul// bgegs kyis rlams pa shar phyogs kha bstan te// dkyil 'khor gyi dbus bde ba'i bstan la bzhag/ bzlas
186b5: brjod byed cing bu mor nges bkru/ / 'on kyang log 'dren rnams las thar bar 'gyur// sgrub pa pos pa mi ni 'ba' shig la// bgegs rnams gzhig phyir phan par ma zad kyi// rgyal po'i 'khor dang bud med bud med dang // bu mo dag dang rol mom/
186b6: rnams dang // bud med pal dang chen pa rnams kyang ru// zhing pa rnams dang dbul zhing phongs pa dang // gdon gyis zin cing rims kyis btab pa dang // bus pa'i gdon dang me tog 'bras bu 'phrog/ rmi lam smyo dang sems ni g.yengs pa dang // dug
186b7: kyang sel te khrus 'dis dag par byed/ / 'phags pa dpung bzang gis zhus pa'i le'u bzhi pa'o// / bgegs kyis sod nams ma lus zad par byed// debs me yis gsang sngags 'grub mi 'gyur// ji ltar zla ba sprin las rnam grol ltar//
186b8: de bzhin bgegs las grol ba rnam par gas la// dper nas chu ngus dang namathal ba'i// sgod gnas 'bras bu ma tog mu gu dang // de dang ma bral mu gul ma dang // sdong budag dang me tog 'bras bu rtse// choganyams shing yi ge gug skyed med//
187a1: mchod pa med cing mi gtsang bzlas brjod byas// gug skyed yi ge lhag par gyur pa yi// gsang sngags dngos grub rgya chen mi steng ro// dper na dbyar gyi dus na char sprin dag/ skye bo'i bskal bzhin char pa legs pa 'bebs// de bzhin
187a2: mi yi skal pa gzigs nas ni/ / 'dod pa bzhin du gsang sngags dngos grub stso la// yul dang dus dang cho ga las rnams dang // sdig pa sbyang zhing bsod nams bsag pa dang // gus dang bzlas brjod kun la gzigs nas ni// de dag gsang sngags 'thas
187a3: bu rnam par stsol/ / ji tsam sdig pa mang pos rab gang zhing // ji tsam las dkar bsod nams ma bsags dang // ji srid cho ga med par bzlas byas pa// de srid sngags pas dngos grub mi thob bo// cho ga nyams sam par bcad sngags gzhan bzlas//
187a4: bzlas pa btang ngam gzhan la btang gyur na// dus gsum mchod pa la ni rtson byas nas// slar yang 'bum zlas bsgrub la 'jug par bya// stong phrag bcu 'am brgyad dam bdun nam bzhi// bzlas mthar de la mar gyi sbyin bsreg bya// yang nam grugs
187a5: nas sam til nag gam/ / yud pa dkar mar dang bcas pa'i sbyin bsreg bya// 'dzam bu ma ru klag sha pa la sha/ u dum seng ldeng a shwad a pa mar// arga a sho ka dang ra rdza ka/ n+ya gro bil ba a s+pha sha mi yi// yam shing gzhon nu sor ni bcu gnyis
187a6: pa/ / btsal nas zho mar sbrang rtsi la btags nas// rtag tu me la sbyin bsreg bya bar bya// de ltar byas na dngos grub myur du thob// gzhan gyi gsang sngags kyis ni gsang sngags gang // gcad dam bcings sam mnan par gyur kyang rung // de yi gzugs
187a7: brnyan sa la byas nas su/ / nga yi zhabs drung mngon phyogs bzhag ste// sngags pas kI li kI li la sogs snying po rnams// mang dang 'o mas de yi gzugs brnyan bkru// de ltar zhag bdun byas pas gsang sngags dag/ bcings pa dang ni mnan
187a8: las grol bar 'gyur/ / mchod pa la sogs cho gar ldan yang ni// ci ste gsang sngags 'bras bu mi ster na// de gzugs drug dang ske tshes byugs nas su// kI lI kI li 'gro lding la sogs pas// sngags kyis de la yungs mar tsha sbyar bas// zhag
187b1: bdun dus gsum sbyin sreg las byas na/ / gsang sngags 'ongs nas rmi la ma dag du ni// ci ste cho ga nyams dang yi ge lhag chad ston// sngon gyi sngags lugs 'chang bas bstan mod kyi// ji ltar rgya mtsho'i dus las mi 'da' bzhin// sngags kyis
187b2: gzhan gyi gsang sngags mi bsnan cing / / bcing dang bcad pa rnam yang mi bya'o// dper na byams pa'i mi yis mi gzhan la// che ge mo yi khyim 'dir phyin cad khyod// blta ba'i phyir yang 'gro bar mi bya zhes// rigs pa'i tshig gis rnam par bstan
187b3: pa dang / / des kyang de yi tshig de mnyan nas su// khyim du smra dang blta phyir mi 'gro ba// de bzhin sngags pas gang yang rung ba'i sngags// bzlas nas gzhan gyi gsang sngags bsnan mi bya// gsang sngags bcad dang bcing ba mi bya zhing // yi ge
187b4: lhag chad gsang sngags mi sbyin no/ / las rnams spyad pa gzhan du bsgyur mi bya// gnas rnams gzir bar nam yang mi bya'o// dbab dang bcing dang brdeg dang rmongs bya dang // yan lag migazhig rigs kyang mi brlag cing // sngags pas klu
187b5: dang gdon la sogs pa rnams/ / gzhan du bskrad par nam yang mi bya'o// dgar dang bskrad pa dang ni gsad pa dang // byis pa gdon zin nam yang mi gso zhing // rgya mo sa mda' gnyi dang 'dzol bu yis// sems can gnod pa nam yang mi bya'o//
187b6: dngos grub byer ni rnam pa bcur gsungs te// sngags pa dang ni rang sngags g.yog dang rdzas// btson 'grus phyogs dang sa gni dus dang ni// yan lag rdzogs pa'i lha dang sems stobs so// gzhan dag kha gcig rigs 'dzin grogs
187b7: shes zer/ / gzhan dag phyogs dang brtson 'grus dus rnams nyid// gzhan ni rdzas dang lha dang sngags yin zer// kha cig sems stobs yin zhes rnam par smra// 'grub phyir de ltar bcu dang brgyad dang lnga// de bzhin bzhi dang gsum dang ga zhi
187b8: nyid ces/ / sngags rig rang rang blo yis rnam par 'chad// sangs rgyas rgyud la cho ga gnyis kyis 'grub// sgrub pa gang zhig rang gi yon tan rdzogs// brtson 'grus mchog dang yang dag ldan pa dang // gzhan gyi rnyed pa dag la phrag dog med//
188a1: 'dod la ma chags lus kyi nyon mongs bzod// gug skyed kla skor cheg tshad zur phyin la// gsang sngags dag cing shin tu cho gar bcas// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' bstan pa yi// gnas su bzlas na yid 'ong dngos grub thob//
188a2: ltar ri dgas rgyal po bkres pa dag/ mthu stobs chen pos glang chen gsod pa dang // de bzhin spyad ki phag dang ri dgas dang // wa rnams kyang ni myur du gsod pa ltar// de bzhin sngags pase seng ge'i tshul gyis su// rang dang 'bring dang tha ma'i las
188a3: rnams la/ / brtson 'grus chen po dang ni ldan pa dang // 'bad pa mchog rnams kyis kyang bsten par bya// rdza rnga'i sgra dang dung dang rnga sgra dang // shin tu 'jigs byed skye bo'i sgra dag dang // gang rgyangs bshugs glung gdang glu gar dang // gling bu pi ba rda
188a4: rnga chen po'i sgra/ / bya bran sna tshogs sgra dang chu sgra dang // bud med tshogs kyi sil 'grol sgra rnams dang // sha sbrang tshe grang rlung gi gnod pa yis// mi yi sems ni g.yer zhing g.yo bar byed// bzlas brjod byed tshe mi myur mingal zhing // sgra cher mi dbyung
188a5: ha cang chud pa'ang min/ / smra bzhin ma yin gzhan du g.yengs bzhin min// gug skyed glad skor tshig rnams nyams par min// ci ltar chu klung nyin mtshan rtag tu ni// rgyun mi 'chad par 'bab par 'gyur ba ltar// de bzhin phyag bcas bzlas
188a6: dang brtul zhugs kyis/ / bsod nams lus can la ni 'phel bar 'gyur// le lo 'dod chags mi dgar ldan pa'i sems// gang dag gang du g.yo zhing rgyu ba dag/ de dang de nas myur du bzlog nas ni// gsang sngags yi ge mchog la legs par
188a7: sbyar/ / sna rtser blta zhing rnam par rtog pa spong // nam zhig bskyod kyang rnam par mi g.yo ba// de tshe dmigs la gnas pa thob pa ste// sems ni las su rung bar 'gyur bar des// rtsa gcig sems dang ldan pa'i mi la ni// yid las byung ba'i
188a8: dga' ba rab tu skyed/ / dga' bas lus ni shin tu spangs pa 'thob// lus skangs pas ni bde ba'i skal ldan 'gyur// lus bde rtse gcig sems dang ting 'dzin gyis// de tshe bzlas brjod thogs pa med par 'gyur// tshe rabs gzhan du gang dang
188b1: gad byas pa'i/ / sdig pa ma lus bzlas brjod byas pas 'byed// bzlas pas sdig pa ma lus byang gyur nas// dang ba'i yid kyis dngos grub thob par 'gyur// de phyir bcom ldan rgyal ba'i dbang po yis// chos 'di kun gyi rtsa ba sems zhes
188b2: gsungs/ / sems ni dang bas lha ma'i bde ba dang // mtho ris dang ni byang grol thob par 'gyur// sems kyi skyon gyis dur 'gror skye ba dang // sems dmyal gnas shing mi sdug dbul blo 'gyur// sems ni rab tu dang bar gyur pa'i mis// sa chu
188b3: me rlung skye rgan 'chi sogs/ / bar dang tha ma gnod pa kun bral ba// rnam grol ba de zhing zhi ba thob par 'gyur// gsang sngags dngos grub kun dang thun mong ba// bde ba chung zhing sdug bsngal ba de dang 'brel// nyon mongs drug bcas rnam par
188b4: 'jig 'gyur ba/ / dang ba'i sems kyi thob par gyur pa yin// 'dod rgyal las la sems byung dus las min// rang bzhin dbang phyug las kyang byung ba min// rgyu med can min skyes bus ma byas kyang // las dang nyon mongs pa las sems
188b5: can byung / / gzugs ni 'byung ba chen po bzhi dang ldan// de ni bdag min bdag kyang gzugs ma yin// gzugs la bdag med bdag la gzugs med de// gzugs ni stong pa'o phung bzhi'ang rig par gyis// gzugs ni lbu bdag dang 'dra ba/
188b6: ste/ tshor ba chu bur bzhin du rtag pa med// de ltar mthong ba lta ba bzang po yin// gang zhig gzhan du gyur pa de ni lta ngan gsungs// de ltar zlos pa'i gsang sngags nye gyur na// mtshan mo nyal ni rmi lam 'di dag mthong // khang bzangs ljon shing
188b7: rgyal mtshan seng ge rta/ / ri bo shing rtasgra ldan sprin dang klu// stag dang seng ge glang chen khyu mchog la// rmi lam na ni dga' bas zhon pa dang // me tog phreng ba gos dang dri rnams dang // sha chang nya dang 'bras bu glegs ba ma dang // lha yi gzugs
188b8: dang u dpal dmar po dang / / shing rta gang ba'am ba gzhon be'u phrug can// gdugs dkar rnga yab lham dang ral gri dang // bsil yab gser g.yu can dang phreng ba dang // nor bu mu tig nye phyis dung dang dngul// bud med gzugs bzang yid
189a1: 'od bu mo dang / rin chen sna tshogs rnams kyis smras pa'i brgyan// mal bstan dgar po bting brnyed pa dang / tho ngas lan myo chu krung dang // 'bab chu'am rgya mcho dang ni rdzing bu dang // lum lani 'thu ngam rgyal mi dang / ban/
189a2: khrag gis lus ni khrus byed dang // lha khang mchod rten gdug dang rgyal ba'i gzugs// byang chub sems dpa' mchog dang rang sangs rgyas// zag med dge 'dun dge slong dge slong ma// dge bsnyen rnams dngas bdag lha rnams dang // mchod
189a3: gnas bram ze yid 'od skyes bu dang / / mi dang mi mchog phrug cing 'byor pa'i bu// pam mdza' bshes gnyen dang gnod sbyin dang // grub pa'i lha dang na chung tshogs dag dang // ci ste nyi ma zla bza ba dang // sa'i nad 'gros bon 'thung pa dang / ma
189a4: la rdzi zhing sha ni za ba dang / / lus kyi nang du me ni zhugs pa mthong // rmi lam bzang po 'di dag mthong ba dang // de dag ring por mi thogs 'grub par 'gyur// zla ba gcig dang zla byed nyin zhag dang // skad cig gis kyang phyir phyir nye bar 'gyur//
189a5: 'phags pa dpung bzang gis nus pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// // dngos grub nyen zlos la dga' ba dang // sems ni sdig la nam yang dga' mi 'gyur// dkres skom cha grang rlung dang ngal ba yi// sdug bsngal drag pos gdungs kyang gso//
189a6: mi 'gyur// sbrang bu sha sbrang srin bu grog sbur dang // sdig sprul rkang brgya pa dang sbrul dang dred// sha za srul po rnams kyang de dag gi/ lus dang gribam la yang mi 'god do// tshig ni bzung bar 'os shing yid gzhungs la// snyan dgas dang ni bri ba
189a7: rnams la mkhas/ / chos la mngon dga' gter rnams mthong ba dang // lus kyi nang dang dri ma med par 'grur/ skyes bus mthong ngam thos par gyur kyang rung // myur du mngon dga' yid du 'ong bar 'gyur// bud med 'dod lha'i mad sa phog
189a8: pa rnams kyis/ / lus la longs spyod phyir ni 'bod par 'gyur// gang tshe mkhas pas lha dang gnod sbyin dang // dri za lha yi bu mo'i lus dang sgra// mis ni dga' ba'i yid kyis mthong thos na// de tshe shin du nye bar gyur pa yin// lus ni dri
189b1: med dag par rig pa dang / / gso sbyong sdom pa dang ni ldan pa yis// nyin zhag gcig gam gnyis sam gsum du ni// kha zas spangs shing smyung bar gnas pa yis// nyin zhag de dag 'das par byas nas su// rang gi 'byor phyir bsgrub la
189b2: 'jug par bya/ / gsung de dpung bzang gis thos slar gsol ba// zas kyis mi 'dag ces ni sngar gsungs na// mchod 'os khyod kyis lus dag bgyi phyir yang // ci slad sbyang ba ci bzang bgyi bar gsungs// srid par mthar phyin bde bar gshes
189b3: pa yis/ / shing rta'i mig su bza' ba'ang ci phyir gsung sa// rdo rje can gyis dpung zang tshig gas na nas// 'brug smra zab 'dra'i gsung gis bka' stsal pa// bu gcig pus dag bya phyir sbyang bya bar// bde gshegs 'di na nam yang mi gsung ste/
189b4: lus 'di mi gtsang lpags pa sha khrag rkang// glang rgya rgyum mtsher mchin mkhal ma zhag/ ma bris pa pad kan khu chu byis dang // gcin bsnabs baspu skra dang rus pa dang // mig dang na ba sna dang 'a dang ni// bshed sgo mtshan dang bu ga dgu po yi// man
189b5: dri ma sna tshogs mi gtsang ba/ / 'dzag pa'i rgyun ni rtag tu 'byung ba yi// de ltar yan lag thams cad 'dus pa dang // sa chu me rlung nam mkha' rnams dang ldan// ci bzhin las kyi rjes 'brang mi yi lus// thams cad ldan pa'i gzugs la gnas
189b6: pa yi/ / bshang gci snabs dang mchil ma pad kan dang // 'di dag zad par bya phyir smyung bar gsungs// dri ma zad nas mi yi lus dag na// rang gi 'byor phyir bsgrub la bde bar 'jug/ 'dod chags kyis ni gdungs par gyur na yang // lus kyi yan lag
189b7: 'di dag thams cad la/ / dran pa rtse gcig mngon du byas nas ni// ye shes mig gis so sor rnam par rtag/ de ltar rang gis nges par brtags pa na// lus dang srog la rjes su chags pa yi// 'dod chags rtsa nas yod ye zhes 'gyur te//
189b8: nyi mas mun nag gtan nas gsal ba bzhin// phan yon de yis gsang sngags nye bsnyen nas// rang gi lus la nye bar rig pa dang // yar gyi tshes brgyad dam ni bcu bzhi la// yang na bcwa lnga la ni bzlas brjod bya// lha yi gnas kyis dag
190a1: bstar ba'i phyir/ sa dang lci bar sres la sogs pas byug/ dpas bde gshegs kun la phreng ba dang / lha ba gos pa tog nga ma mes mchod// nas rje dzin padangs mdzad// nas gas sngags sgras 'phrul ba bya// Ad
190a2: 'amasangs rgyas rnams pa bstad nasas/ / kyed de byang chub sems kyang dran byas te// sems can sbyin na pas gzar bal// ci ltar rigs par snying rjel gyisgom par // dus chen mdas padag pa 'am ba u0f89u0fa4gis kyi// tshigs sras '
190a3: amachos kyi 'khor lo mcho/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gas pa' ma sgron ma che// gang yang rung ba gcig ne ma bzhin bklag// de nas bla'og phyogs rnams bcings nas su// lus lag cha bgo bar byas nas ni// gang du slos pa'i dkyil latsha
190a4: dernams las/ / gcig cig tshon rtsi rnams kyis bri bar bya// rdo rje mchu rlung dang mdung thung dag/ rim bzhin dkyil 'khor 'dir ni bri bar bya// rabar bris pas lha dang lha min dang // sdang ba'i bdag nyid sems ni myos par 'gyur// seng ge'i gdan
190a5: gyis mngon par sngags pa'i bstan/ / de ni dkyil 'khor dbus su bzhag par bya// bdag nyid bsrung ba byas te der 'dug nas// rdzas blangs myur du bzlas brjod byas nas ni// bdug pa'i sbyin bsreg stong yang sbyin bsreg bya// de nas de ni dri chus bkrus
190a6: nas su/ / bgegs med rnams kyang rab tu bsal byas nas// byang chub shing lo gsum gyi steng du gzhag/ bzhi yis bkab nas ci srid grub pa ni// rnam gsum mthong gi bar du gsang sngags bzlas// dro dang dud 'phrul me bzhin 'bar ba'am// dem
190a7: bzhin bzloganas 'byung na 'ang 'grub par gsungs/ / dro bas 'gro ba thams cad dbang 'gyur te// du ba 'thus pas lus ni mi snang 'gyur// 'bar bas mkha' la shing du 'gro 'gyur te// mi yi lus ni lha ltar gsal bar 'gyur// ci ltar lus
190a8: la grang ba 'jug pa dang / ci ltar mngal du dri za 'jug pa dang // nyi zer me shel zhugs nas me 'byung ltar// de bzhin dngos grub lus la 'jug par 'gyur// mar me mched cing shin tu 'bar ba dag/ snum zhing dkyus ring gser gyi mdog ltar dngas//
190b1: 'brum kyang 'bar bar gyur nani// de tse sngags pa dang sa thu thob 'gyur // de dag rdzas la 'byung ba'i dngas grub ba/ sa na ma'i sku gzugs 'gul ba'am/ brang ba sman pa mig nga tha ba pam// gal rgyan rnams g.yo bar byur ba/
190b2: mama'al teg ca ma rjenar bag/ sani myur drugs par byung ba ma la na ga ma pa tshig na/ ga cig dam pa ci 'ad grangs gigs// sa gyul la kyi bsam pa/ rgyun ci chen 'dra
190b3: ste mkha' 'a lha dang lha min da/ / gsang sngags gzugs ni mngon du mthong na 'grub// mnyams me tog dbyig dang chung bsres shing // bstod dang bcas par mchod yon tan sbrengs nas// rje gtsig sems kyis mgo bad+had byug byas te// da pang /
190b4: ba'i rjes 'thun mchog slang ngo // mchog thob nas ni dga' bas phyag byas te// dad pas bstod cing mchod yon phul nas su// gsang sngags brjod cing slar yang gshegs su gsol// gsang sngags kun la tshul ni 'di yin no// gang zhig serba
190b5: stobs pachog dang ldan pa des/ / 'dir ni 'jigs dang bcas pa'i las kyang bya// sems stobs chung ba'i mi la sha za yis// glags mthong nas ni phul bar byed par 'gyur// dpa' bos go gos mtshon cha'i thabs mkhas pas// chas pa'i rmang
190b6: chen mcho gzhon gzhu thogs te/ / mda' 'phen mthu dang ldan pa gcig pus kyang // dgra po'i tshogs kun las ni rgyal bar nus// de bzhin sems stobs chen po'i tshul khrims kyi// go bgos legs bsrungs glang chen zhon nas su// gsang sngags
190b7: gzhu thogs bzlas brjod mdara' 'phen pas/ / 'byung ba la sogs mtshan mo rgyu las rgyal// sgur po yan la galhag chang thung ngud// de bzhin ring po yang na sbom po'am// smad pa'i mngal nas skyes pa'am ma ning ngam// rnam pa de 'dra'i ro dag lda
190b8: bya/ / mthu ba dang rimis dag cad pa dang / 'bru sdug zengs dang chung nga gsal shi dang // rtswal gyis pas dam dug gis shiba'am/ bdag na su la sogs mthod dmigs pas pa la// man la ga tshang zhing ba bzhin ma snad ba// lus la ma ma kyir
191a1: pa'i ro mthong na/ / ral gri be con lag na thogs pa yis// nyin par thog thag du ni bsrung bar bya// dur khrod khang stong dang ni shing gcig dang // bzhi mdo' bab chu dag gam chu klung ngam// mtshe'am rgya mtsho'am ni ri bo la// skad gcig gis
191a2: kyang ro langs 'grub par bya/ / gang yang rung ba'i gnas cig brtags nas ni// sa dang lci ba la sogs byug par bya// gtsang ma der ni dkar nag dmar po 'am// tshon rtsi sna tshogs rnams me dang / bri// gong du smos pa'i dkyil 'khor de rnams las//
191a3: bsams nas 'dod pa gang yang rung ba gcig/ dad pa chen pos rigs kyi yum gyi mchog/ zlos shing rab tu bsgrims te bri bar bya// 'jigs pa med pa'i g.yog gis de blangs nas// khyer nas 'ongs te ku sha'i steng bzhag ste// skra dang kha spu bregs/
191a4: kyang bregs nas su// de yi mod la 'bru mar dag gis bsku// de nas bum pa zhabs mi gnag pa bzhi// gtsang ma'i chus bkang khrus rtsis sbyar te bkru// de nas gos dkar phrugs cig bskon nas su// de nas dkyil 'khor dbus su rtsa bstan dang /
191a5: mnyams me tog steng du ro bzhag cing // ro yi mgo bo shar ram byang du bstan// dri yis byug cing bdug pas bdug par bya// phreng bas gdags shing me tog sil mas gtor// sha dang nya sha mar khu til bsres pa'i// khu ra ba la sogs ce snyed bungs skyed/
191a6: de// 'byung po klu dang ka za gnod sbyin dang // 'brel zla 'og phyogs su sbyin par bya// grogs po mchog ldan bdag nyid bsrung bya ste// rtse gcig sems kyis gsang sngags bzlas brjod bya// ro ni ldeng du nye ba'i tshe na ni// 'jigs pa'i gzugs can
191a7: bgegs ni sna tshogs 'byung / / gtsug tor rgyal ba'i sngags kyis thal ba'am// ma grugs yungs dkar sogs la sngags nas su// gtor me phyogs bzhi dag nas 'ong ba'i bgegs// gsang sngags mthu yis de dag 'byer bar 'gyur// de dag
191a8: zhi bar ba phyir khro bo ni/ / bdud rtsi thabs sbyor drag shul las can sbar// bgegs rnams bcom pas de nas ro de yang // gsang sngags mthu yis myur du ldang bar 'gyur// gang zhig gsang sngags cho ga zhib mo las// mthong ba de ni thogs med des//
191b1: par 'gyur// gal te ro de langs par gyur pa las// de yi gsang sngags cho ga mi shes na'ang // gsang sngags gzhan du bstan pa'i tshe g.yas// langs pa de la rang gis dngos grub blang // gter gyi phyogs su phug du 'gro ba dang // ral gri an dza
191b2: bzhon pa mngag gzhug dang / / 'byung khung gser 'gyur rtsi dang bcud kyis len// mkha' la 'gro ba'i dngos grub rab tu ster// bsrung ba'i stobs me sngags kyi stobs med dang // dka' thub stobs med sems stobs med pa yi// blo zhan gang zhig
191b3: ro langs dngos grub tshol/ / de ni mtshan mo rgyu ba rnams kyis bsad// / 'phags pa dpung bzang gis zhus pa'i le'u drug pa'o// / mi gang mi yi sha ni 'tshong 'dod des// mar gyi rol dur khrod song nas su// shing rdo mtshon dang
191b4: dug dang dbyug to sman/ / bgegs la sogs pas shi bar gyur pa yi// byin pa brla dang ske dang mgo ba dang // 'jigs pa med pas mtshan mo blangs nas su// btubs te skong bu 'am gyo dum gsar pa dang // gtsang ma der ni mi nyung bzhag byas la//
191b5: lus la khrag gi lag rjes bris nas su// rnams mgo dang mgrin pa dkri bar bya// lus la mi lpags sar pa bgos nas kyang // lag g.yon shas bkang gyi mo thogs nas su// khrag gis bskus pa'i ral gri lag g.yas kyi// rab tu bsgra
191b6: nas de ni thogs nas kyang / / sgra cher bod cing tshig tu sha 'di dag/ khyed cag su zhig nyo bar byed 'dod ces// shar dang nub dang lho dang byang phyogs su// myur du bskor cing shin tu brjod par bya// ci ste lus ni sdang ngam mi snang bar// tshig gis khyod ni
191b7: nor ram rig pa 'am/ / bcud kyis len pa 'am grong ngam rgyal srid dam// phug du 'gro ba'am ci 'dod ces zer na// sngar ni gang zhig sems kyi bsam pa'i don// de nyid sgra yi gzhan ni smra mi bya// rig pa mang po bstan pa'i dur khror 'dig/
191b8: don 'di'i phyir ni sdug bsngal drag po yis// bdag kyang gdungs bzhin 'ongs kyis 'di nyid na// yod na sha 'di khyer la bdag la byin// tsista srang la gzhal tem gang na// rang gi sha yis de ni dgang bar bya// gal te dur khrid 'di ni stong pa ste/
192a1: nor med pa khyod gzhan du song shig ces// mtshan mo rgyu bas de skad sgon ni// de la bdag ni gang du 'gro zhes dri// lan thob de nyid rang gis brtags nas su// shad por nas de nas 'gro bar bya// sha ye cho ga gang zhig ngas gsungs pa/
192a2: gsang sngags ma bzlas pa yis bsten mi bya// rigs mchog gtsug gtor stobs chen la sogs pas// dur khrod du ni bsrung bar ngas gsungs so// gsang sngags drag po gang zhig sha za ba// de la dur khrod mi sha'i sbyin bsreg bya// ral gri sor
192a3: gnyis sor gsum tsam dag tu/ / gtubs nas me la sbyin bsreg stong du bya// me tog mnyams 'bras yos sha khrag ta// chang ngam sbrang rtsi brar mchad dang til// badrug pa phreng ba zug pa mar mechen// lha ba shos gtor ma dur khrod gtor bar
192a4: bya/ / dpab cing bskrad dang gnyid kyis myos bya dang // dmag gzhom thong khyer phreng bar bya ba dang // sha za ma mo drag mo srin mo'i tshogs// gnod sbyin rnams la mi sha'i sbyin bsreg bya// mi yi sha ni rnyed par ma gyur na// bagla sha yi sbyin sreg de bzhin
192a5: shis/ / ma he'i sha 'am khyi sha mar bsres la// tshes grangs dag la smyung byas smin bsreg bya// gnod sbyin mo yi cho ga zhib mor ni// gsang sngags mnyes byas grub pa 'di rnams ster// mdang sgyug mo sru mo grogs mo dang // bu mo chung ma mna'
192a6: mar grub par 'gyur/ / ma dang skyug mo sring mo gang yin de// yid bzhin rin chen bzhin du grub pa mchog/ yid 'ong grogs mo bu ma thubabapa 'bring // chu ma mna' ma grub pa tha mar bsgrags// dus gsum du ni me tog phreng ba dri// mar ma 'bru mar mar
192a7: mtshan dan dang / / a kar dri zhim bdug pas mchod pa dang // gtor ma sna tshogs rtag tu mtshan mo sbyin// gnod sbyin mo ni dga' nas mngon phyogs nas// rnyed pa rnyed cings pon 'byung bar byed// 'dod chags zil gyis non pa'i thad med dag/
192a8: gnod pa byed pa nges par gnas par 'gyur// bud med gnod pa byed pa 'go mi bya// rnyed pa mang nyung la yang 'dod mi skyed// sngags pas mtshan mo khu bdagag byas nas// brtson 'grus rab tu bskyed de bsgrub par bya// sems rmongs gang gi
192b1: gzhan du brtsams byas na/ / gnod sbyin mos ni myur du phreng bar byed// bsams na phung bar yang ni 'gyur ba nyid// sha za'i gnod sbyin ma la 'di dide nyid de// de las cho ga lhag pa 'di rnams bya// shachang la phrag tshod ma chung ba dang // nas chen mag chan
192b2: dang 'bras chan nya/ / gtor ma de dag kun tu bdug par 'bul// gnas ni khang stong dag gam dur khrod shis// me tog shir sha kun du arka dang bil ba 'bri ha ku sha ra rdza ka/ a gas ud pa la a ta ru sha ka/ se'u can mya ngan tshang sogs
192b3: me tog dbul/ / klul bu ram 'o ma mar sbyar ba'i// bdug pa dre zhim a kar tsan dan dri// phreng ba me tog dri zhim sna tshogs dang // 'bras chan zho dang 'bras yos 'bras bu 'bul// bdan sngon po bum pa sngon po dang // gos kyang sngon po lha ba shos
192b4: gtor ma dri/ / phreng ba me tog byug pa sngon po dag/ ci snyed brang gis 'gro ba rnams la 'bul// mthe bong me long ral gri chu dang shel// mar me sa gzhi lcags dang nam mkha' dang // lhung bzed nor bu dag dang me 'bar ba// 'di la gsal bar ston

192b6: chatshad dam yi ge lhag pa'am/ / bzlas brjod ma byas dang pa med pa dang // mchod pa med cings gzhi mi gtsang dang // sprin gyi tshogs kyis nyi zer bsgribs pa dang // byis pa yan lag nyams shing lhag ma dang // de lta bul me yi gas la ston pa// 2
192b7: par mi 'gyur dgos pa yongs mi ston/ / gsal ston dbab phyir sngon du cho ga bzhin// bzlas shing tshes grangs bzang la sngags pa yang // sprang byas gos dkar sa dang lci ba yis// ba ko tsam gyis sa gzhi legs par byug/ byug spos dang ni
192b8: me tog bdug spos dang / / lha ba shos mar me dag kyang phul nas su// byis pa gzhon nu sta gon gnas par bya// de nas nad par cho ga 'di kun bya// khrus byas lus la gos dkar gtsang dgos te// shar phyogs kha bstan ku sha'i stan steng
193a1: du/ 'dug nas gsang sngags rjes su dran par bya// me long thal ba gtsang mas lan bdun nam// brgyad dang ma yang na bcur ni phyis nas su// rtse gcig sems kyis gsang sngags zlos bzhin du// bus pa gzhon nu nub du kha bstan na/
193a2: lha yi mig gis bltas na 'das pa dang // da ltar dang ni ma 'ongs mthong bar gyur// ma long zhes bya'i cho ga mtha' dag ni// ral gri gsal bar ston la sbyar bar bya// mthe bo rgya skegs khu bas bkrus nas su// 'bru mar dri zhim dag gis bsku bar
193a3: bya/ buM pag nga ma chus bkang mi g.yor gzhag/ sa ba tsags lhung bzed nor bu chu yis gdab// sku gzugs la ni byug bos me tog dbul// de nas bus pa gzhon nus blta bar bya// gsal bar ston dang rmi lam la sogs pas// dngos grub
193a4: brtags te de nas bzlas brjod bya/ / gal te yid ches par ni ma gyur na// de nas rig sngags mi bdug bzlas brjod bya// nga yi gsang sngags dag pa gang yang rung // gso sbyong byas nas nan tan bzung nas su// rgyal ba'i ring bsrel mchod rten
193a5: drung du bzlas/ / yang na sku gzugs ma nyams drung du bzlas// lus dang ngag yid lag pa mig dang ni// smin mtshams yan lag rnam par g.yo bdag/ rab tu bsdams nas de la yid gzhol zhing // byams la gnas shing ku sha'i khres la 'dug/
193a6: ji srid du ni rtse gcig gnas 'gyur ba// de srid bar du 'buma'am nyis 'bum bzlas// nga yi gsang sngags hUM zhes bya ba 'dis// shing la'ang 'bab na mi la smos ci dgos// de nas dbab pa'i snod rnams brtag par bya// bu mo gzhon nu lo bcu
193a7: 'am bcu gnyis pa/ / bcu'am brgyad dam bcu bdun nam bzhi 'am gsum// yang na bye'u'ang rung ste gnyis sam lta// tshigs rus rtsa mi mngon zhing gzugs bzang ba// yan lag rdzogs shing mig dkyus ring la dkar// ba bzhin zla 'dra mche
193a8: ba mnyam la no/ / sor mo thags bzang mdzes la long bu nub// lte ba zab cing mdzes la nu mjed legs// ba s+phu re re skra yang gnag la stug/ lto ba mi rloganyer ma gsum dang ldan// mdog kyang bzang zhing mnga' byad dang yang ldan// gang la
193b1: yid dga' lta ba brtan par 'gyur/ / lta bas kyang ni ngoms par mi 'gyur dang // lha gzhan dag la mi phyogs dbab pa'i gnod// tshes grangs bzang la nyin zhag cig tu ni// smyung ba byas pas gdug spos phreng ba dang // tsan dan me tog mar me
193b2: rnams kyis mchod/ / bza' dang 'bras chan la sogs gtor ma mang // lha dang lha min gnod sbyin rnams la sbyin// dbab pa'i snod rnams khrus byas gos dkar bskon// shang phyogs kha bstan rgyan ni rnam par spangs// byug spos me tog 'os
193b3: de la sbyin/ / bdug pas bdug cing gsang sngags las brjod bya// hUM gis gsang sngags thog mar bzlas nas su// g+hi na a be sha zhes brjod par bya// mig ni gdangs shing btsums par mi byed na// rdzogs par gyur par shes par byas nas su//
193b4: 'jigs pa med par de tshe dri bya ba// mchod yon dang ni bdug pa phul nas su// rig pa mchog gi gsang sngags dran byas nas// phyag 'tshal nas ni lho phyogs gang yin dri// dus gsum dag ni bdag gi dgos pa gang // de ni legs par
193b5: dgongs la bka' stsol cig/ bde dang sdug bsngal dngos grub thob mi thob// shes nas de yang de bzhin bzung nas su// de ma thag tu slar yang btang bar bya// mi bdug sngags bzlas cho ga 'di rnams kyis// dbab pa'i snod la mi yis phabs
193b6: gyur gyi/ / gang zhig blun pas gzhan du brtsams na ni// de ni mi rnams kun gyis dpyas par 'gyur// zhe zhing bzhungs la rgya che kyus kyang ring // brtan zhing gzi chen mdangs ldan dmar bar snang // 'dzums zhing 'byed med lha'i mig dang 'dra//
193b7: dbab pa'i snong la lta babs de ltar 'gyur// mig ni rab tu dam ning zlum por 'drag/ bskrad cing rab tu mi sdug 'jigs 'jigs lta// 'dzums pa med cing 'jigs med blta ba ni// srin po lho 'phya gnod sbyin babs pa'i mig/ gal te
193b8: babs pa'i snod ni mi gtong na/ / shin tu bkra shis tshig bcad brjod pa'am// stobs po che'am dgong ma 'am lcags kyu bzlas// yang na rab tu 'dus pa'i mdo sde bklag/ seng ge gdan gyi arka 'am ba la sha'i// yam shing mar gyis
194a1: bskus pa brgya yang bsreg/ mgra ga til ni sbrang rtsi'am mar gyis bskus// gtum pos sbyin sreg nyi shu rtsa gcig bya// snga ma bzhin du gsang sngags cho ga dag/ dam tshig ci bzhin ma lus sbyar na ni// bdag gi yid dang mthun pa'i/
194a2: dngos grub thong // sngags pa yun ring nyon mongs mi 'gyur ro// 'phags pa dpung bzang gis zhus pa'i le'u bdun pa'o// // sangs rgyas kyis gsungs yan lag brgyad lam 'di// yang dag / mtsho dang las mtha' ting 'dzin dag/
194a3: rtsol dang rtog dang dran dang lta ba rnams// so so so sor yang dag bsten par bya// lam 'di rnams kyis gsang sngags dngos grub cing // de bzhin 'dis ni thar pa myur du thob// rgyal sras sngon gyi rgyal ba 'das pa dag/ 'di nas gshegs shing
194a4: de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur/ / ngoms med sems kyis lus dang ngag yid kyis// gus par dge ba'i bsod nams gang bsags pa'ang // bde gshegs gsungs pa'i bde ba'i lam dmigs na// dge ba'i lam de yang dag bskyed pa yin
