302b4: las 'das pa'i sku gdung gi mchod rten dang / gzhal med khang dang / drigatsang khang dang / chos nyid gang lags pa de dang / chos nyid gang lags pa dang chos nyid gang lags ba des rabargyal bde dag rab tu 'byed pa'i chos nyid de dang / de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
302b5: pa yongs su bsgoms pa'i sku gdung gang lags pa de dgal bdag gi bsam pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pas sems thams cad dang lus thams cad btud nas phyag 'tshal lo// gang dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs pa'i
302b6: 'phags pa rgyun du zhugs pa rnams dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang / phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang / dgra bcom pa rnams dang / de dag la 'jug pa gang lags pa dang / de dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i sku gdung gi mchod rten dang / gzhal
302b7: ming ba dadang / drig tsa khang dang / chos nyid gang lags pa des 'phags brgyun du zhugs pa rnams dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang / phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang / dgra bcom pa rnams dang / de dag la 'jug pa gang lags pa de dag gi rab tu 'byed pa'i
302b8: chos nyad gang lags pa dang / de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su bsgoms pa ri sku gdung gang lags pa de dag la bdag gi pas ma pa dang lhag pa'i bsam pas sems thams cad dang lus thams cad btud nas phyag 'tshal lo// gang dag
303a1: 'das pa'i 'phags pa nyan thos rnams dang / de dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i sku'i mchod rten dang / gzhal med par dang / dri gtsang khang dang / chos nyid gang lags pa de dang / chos nyid gang lags pa des 'phags pa nyan thos de dag rab tu/
303a2: 'byed pa'i chos nyid de dang/ de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sgoms pa'i sku gdung gang lags pa de dag la bdag gi bsam pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam bas sams thams cad dang / lus thams cad btud nas phyag 'tshal lo// gang dag ma 'ongs
303a3: ba'i 'phags pa nyan thos rnams dang / de dag mya ngan las 'das pa'i sku'i mchod rten dang / gzhal med par dang / ri gtsang khang dang / chos nyid gang lags pa de dang / chos nyid gang lags pa des 'phags pa nyan thos de dag rab tu 'byed pa'i chos nyid de dang /
303a4: de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su bsgoms pa'i sku gdung gang lags pa de dag la bdag gi bsam pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pas sems thams cad dang / lus thams cad btud nas phyag 'tshal lo// gar dag khams gsum 'di'i gling
303a5: bzhi dag na 'phags pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mdor na 'jig rten gyi khams 'di 'am/ 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag na mngon par 'dus byas pa dang / mngon
303a6: bar 'du byed pa dang / mngon par 'du byed par 'gyur ba dang / mchod pa byas pa dang / mchod pa byed pa dang / mchod pa byed par 'gyur ba dang / 'phags pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang /
303a7: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung gi mchod rten dang / gzhal med khang dang / dri gtsang khang dang / chos nyid gang lags pa de dang / chos nyid gang lags pa de dag rab tu 'byed pa'i chos nyid de dang / de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu/
303a8: phyin pa yongs su bsgoms pa'i sku gdung gang lags pa de dag la bdag gi bsam pa dang / lhag pa'i bsamapas sems thams cad dang / lus thams cad bzur nas phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
303b1: dpa' thams pa la phyag ma mo/ / da pa macan pa// dun d+ha/ gapas bas ma thAg+sa sa d+ha/ na oMn mang/ sa// sa pa dang / ma'as pa dang / lta gA 'i sangs mamam ldan la sa dang/
303b2: byang chub sems dpa' de rnams kyis rgya chen po dang zab mos pa rol tu byin pa drug las nges par 'byung ba sna tshogs chad med pa'i mchod pa dang / mngon par 'du mdzad pa bsgrubs pa dang / sgrub pa dang / sgrub par 'gyur ba de dag las bdag gi nas par
303b3: 'gyur ba gang lags pa de dag thams cad kyang bdag gi lags so par bzung nas bdag gi bsam pa dang / lhag pa'i bsamapas sems thams cad dang / lus thams cad btud nas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul phra mo snyed kyi nyan thos dang /
303b4: rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang bcas pa de rnams la dbul bar bgyi'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba des sems can thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / sa thams cad dang / ting nge 'dzin
303b5: thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad mngon du gyur cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa rda sgra'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// tad ya thA/ Ta ke/ Ta ke/ Ta ke/ Ta ke swA hA// bam po gnyis
303b6: pa/ gang dag srid pa gsum po 'di na lha dang mi'i dri dang / bdug spos kyi rnam pa dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / ro bro ba dang / lo tog gi rnam pa dang / gser dang / dngul dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai dUr+ya dang / rdo'i snying po la sogs
303b7: pa bdag gi ba med cing yongs su bzung ba med pa gang lags pa de dag bdag dang / sems can thams cad thun mong du bgyis nas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul phra mo snyed kyi 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i/
303b8: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos dang / rang rgyal ba dang bcas pa de rnams la dbul bar bgyi'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba des sems can thams cad la rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i
304a1: stong pa nyid mded du byar cag/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tho sangs zab mo spogs pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// tad ya u0f89u0fa4/ bi bul sA re/ bi bul yon go/ an la sa/ an las/ sa b+ha ba/
304a2: analas/ gting ga ta swAH// bdag nyin mo nyi dang // mgasog nyid log pa dang / sad pa dang / 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba dang / 'dug pa dang / langs pa nas dbang po 'gag par 'gyur ba'i bar du yang lu bstan pa dang / lung
304a3: ma bstan pa dang / lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyis byi dang nang gi legs par spyad pa gang lags pa dang skye babrog ma dang tham ma mchis pa'i 'khor bar bzhugs pa gang lags pa dang / byang chub kyi snying po la mchis kyi bar ma / dge ba'i
304a4: rtsab gang lags pa de dag thams cad sems can thams cad dang thun mong du bgyis nas gnyis su med pa'i tshul gyis bla ne med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bgyid/ / ji ltar 'das pa dang / dro ba dang /
304a5: da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' de rnams kyi yongs su bsngos pa de bzhin du bdag gis kyang yongs su bsngo bar bgyi'o// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bdun po rnams la
304a6: phyag 'tshalalo/ / rnam par gzigs kyi gzi brjid dang / shAHsa go'i brtson 'grus kyis/ 'dod chags zhe sang gti mug da// nam yang gso bang bgyur ci// tad ya y+Ya/ dza san te/ bi dza man ti/ a bar dziH/ mA ri se n+ya bral d+ha ni ma AH/
304a7: dge ba'i rtsa ba des sems can 'gro ba drug la brten pa gang lags pa de dag thams cad sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la dgad par bgyi'o// de bzhin du tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes ras
304a8: dang / thabs dang / smon la ma dang / stobs dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la dgod par bgyi'o// de bzhin du sa rab tu dga' ba dang / de bzhin du dri ma med pa dang / 'od byed pa dang / 'od 'gro ba can dang / shin du kyang dga' ba dang / bdon/
304b1: du gyur pa dang / ring du song ba dag mi g.yo ba dang / legs pa'i blo gros dang / sa chos kyi srin la dgod par bgyi'o// de bzhin du rdo rdza lnga bu'i ting nge 'dzin dang / de bzhin du bstan par gnas pa'i thabs la mngon par brtson pa mngon
304b2: chu 'gro yongs su bsags pa'i ting nga 'dzin dang / nges par 'byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun tu gsal ba'iting nge 'dzin dag/ kun tu snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ri na rtog gi ting nge 'dzin dpa rin canan pa'i ting dzi
304b3: dang / rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i tog gi ting nge 'dzin dang / snying rje bsags pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu bya ba bstan pa shes pa la mkhas pa'i ting nge 'dzin la dgod par bgyi'o// de bzhin du rgya ma tsho'i phyag rgya mi zad/
304b4: par sgrub pa'i gzung dang / de bzhin du sems can gyi spyod pa la 'jug pa'i gzungs dang / nyi ma'i tog sdang ba mtha' yas pa'i gzung sa dang / zla ba dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid mngon par 'phags pa'i gzungs dag kun nas dkyis
304b5: thams cad rnam par sol ba dang / rdo rje'i snying po bstan pas nyon mongs pa mtha' yas pa rnam par mthor ba dang / brjod du med pa'i don ston pa don dam par yang dag par 'dra ba dang / ldes po'i tshig du smra ba'i sgra 'jug pa dang / na
304b6: mapa'i dkyil ltar dri ma med pa sgrub pa dang / zad mi shes pa'i phyag rgyas btab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi sku mtha' yas pa yongs su 'grub pa sgrub pa'i gzangs la dgod par bgyi'o// de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa bcu po de dag das
304b7: gzungs kyi sgo bcu'i bar dag la bkod nas de rnams dang lhan cig 'di nas 'gum pa'i 'og tu 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'thung zhing / gang na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med dang / bcom ldan 'das
304b8: 'jig rten dbang phrug dang / bcom ldan 'das mthu chen thob pa de dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / 'khor de rnams mnyes par byed par gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das 'bor dang bcas pa de dag mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig
305a1: de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag mad la phyag 'tshal lo/ / da ya thA/ bdam// pad ma ni/ pad ma lo can/ pad mas b+ha ba swA hA/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dag sang la phyag 'tshal lo// da yaSh+Ta a ma? ta tra /
305a2: b+ha be/ a mri ta sa b+ha be/ a mri ta bi krAn te ka ga gan krI ra ti ka re/ sarba karma kle shak+Sha ye ka ra swA hA/ dge ba'i rtsa ba des 'phags pa byams pa mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas ma thag du bdag mngon du lung ston phra lung ston cing
305a3: mngon sum du lung ston pa dang / yang dag pa'i lung ston pa dang // lkog ma yin par lung ston pa dang / de bzhin nyid tu lung ston pa dang / yang dag pa'i mthar lung ston pa dang / chos kyi dbyings su lung ston pa nas/ de kho na nyid mthong ba'i bar gyi
305a4: lung ston pas lung ston par gyur cig/ lung stan nas bcom ldan 'das de dang byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyes par byed par 'gyur cig/ na bza' dang // zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / bsnyung ba'i/
305a5: gsos sman gyi rkyen gyi yo byad rnams dang / de las gzhan pa de bzhin gshegs bdag gi zag pa med pa'i mchod pa rnams kyis mchod nas nga'i drung du bus pa'i rab tu 'byung ba 'thob cing // gzhona'i rab tu 'byung ba dang / lkog ma yin
305a6: kha rab tu 'byung ba dang / de bzhin nyid tu rab tu 'byung ba dang / yang dag pa'i mthar rab tu 'byung ba nas de kho na nyid mthong ba'i ba tu rab tu byung ba thob par gyur cig/ de la 'dzin nga gi nams 'das pa'i khyad par du 'phags gaskyon med
305a7: ba/ / ma dres pa/ rnyog pa med pa/ lha dang midag mngon par dga' ba/ sangs rgya nga byang chub sems dpas bsngags pa/ sems can la sman pa'i skad du bdag rab tu 'byung bar gyur cig/ de nas skal ba bzang po'i yang dag par/
305a8: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos kyi dge 'dun thams cad la byis pa nas/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / bsnyung pa'i gsos sman gyi rkyen ci byed rnams kyis mnyas par gyis na
305b1: dadagagi drung du bus pa'i rab tu 'byung ba zab cing / gzhan nu'i rab tu 'byung ba dang / mngon sum rab tu 'thung ba dang / lkog ma yin par rab tu 'byung ba dang / de bzhin nyid tu rab tu 'byung ba dang / yang dag pa'i mthang rab tu 'byung ba nas
305b2: de bzhin nyid mthong ba'i bar du rab tu 'byung ba thob par gyur cig/ de yang 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i khyad par du 'phags pa/ skyon med pa/ ma 'dres pa/ rnyog pa med pa/ lha dang mi dag mngon pa dag pa dang// sangs rgyas dang //
305b3: byang chub sems dpas bsngags pa// sems can la sman pa'i slad du bdag rab tu 'byung bar gyur cig/ de nas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos
305b4: kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa gang lags pa de dag gis mnyes par bgyid par gyur cig/ de dag gi drung du skad cig ma gcig la ming dang sangs rgyas kyi zhing lung bstan pa thob cing dbus pa'i rab tu 'byung ba dang / gzho nu'i rab tu 'byung ba dang / mngon
305b5: sa mdur du 'byung ba dang / lkog ma yin par rab tu 'byung ba dang / de bzhin nyid tu rab tu 'byung ba dang / yang dag pa'i mthar rab tu 'byung ba nas de kho na nyid yod pa'i bar du rab tu 'byung ba thob par gyur ci// de yang 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i
305b6: kyang 'ashes pa/ skyon med pa/ ma 'dres pa rnyog pa med pa lha dang / ming ga mngon par dga' gsangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'as bsngags pa/ sems can la sman pa'i slad du bdag rab tu 'byung bar gyur cig/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
305b7: dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa byams pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ / tad ya thA/ me tI/ mai tri/ mai ti sa ma tsing te swA hA/ de nas pha rol tu phyin pa drug la mngon par brtson par gyur cig/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa dang /
305b8: stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la gnas pa dang / namakha' mdzod dang / lag na rin po che dang mngon pa dashe ba ldang da dbang thob pa dang / so so yang dag lnga rig pa thob pa dang nams kyang dbang pozhin cing dbang po dang bral ba mi gyung ba dang / ba dang ltung bar mi
306a1: 6/ blar pa dang / rnams kyang yul 'khor na ngan pa dang / skye bongan pa'i nang du skye bar mthur cig/ rnams kyang mkham par skye bar mgyur cig/ rnams kyang sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun mthong ba dang / zas pa
306a2: dang / mchod pa dang / rim gro bgyid pa dang bral bar ma gyur cig/ rnams kyang tshul khrims 'tshal bar mi 'gyur ba nas rmi lam du yang nyan thos dang / rang byang chub 'dad pa'i phyir rnams kyang byang chub kyi sems dang bral
306a3: bar ma gyur cig/ nams kyang sems can yong su smin par bgyid pa dang bral bar mgur cig/ nams kyang dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral bar ma gyur cig/ nams kyang skad cig tu yang thabs dang shes rab dang bral
306a4: bar ma gyur cig/ rnams kyang rigs dman pa dang / brtson 'grus zhan pa dang / le lo can du ma gyur cig/ bdag tshe rabs tshe rabs su sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la brtson 'grus sbyangs pa skye bar gyur cig/ sems can
306a5: la sman pa'i slad du bdag rdzus te skye bar gyur cig/ ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag 'khrungs pa de ltar bdag sangs rgyas kyi rigs su skye bar gyur cig/ de nas bstan
306a6: chos thams cad dang / bzo thams cad dang / ting 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad mngon du gyur cig/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
306a7: 'phags pa dri mi med par grags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ / tad ya thA/ kI ra ti ta sarba tri no b+hi/ a hi kA tas di ni ge rdzas dz+ras b+hA ba be/ badz+ra ba da ka re swA hA// sa dang / chu dang / me dang / rlung dang / namakha' nyeb tshob ltar
306a8: dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'di dag gis yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i phung po lnga po gang dgas pa de dag thams cad dang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du bgyis nas sangs rgyas dang / chos dang dge 'dun yongasu spyod pa dag/
306b1: la dbul bar bgyi'o// nam gram nas kyang bya rgod dang / sbyang gi dang / khyi dang / la dang / gcan zan dang / bya rnams kyis pags pa dang / sha dang / gus pa dang / rus pa dang / rkang dang / khrag rnams yongasu zla bar gyur
306b2: cig/ de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa su chu sa par gyur cig/ de nas khams gsum na rdul phra mo ji snyed pa'i sems can de snyed sems kyi skad cig sems kyi skad cig ma rnaM pa tha par bgyid
306b3: par gyur cig/ rnam par thar par bgyis nas phyir mi ldog pa'i sa dag la rab tu 'god par gyur cig/ de nas mthong bas kyang sems can rnams yong su smin par bgyid par gyur cig/ thos pa dang / dran pas/
306b4: kyang sems can rnams yongasu smin par bgyid par gyur cig/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na mkha'i snying po la phyag 'tshalo// tad ya thA/ gci ga r+b+he/ gar+b+ha bi sho d+ha ni swA hA/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig
306b5: rten gyi khams na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yong su mya ngan las 'da' bar bzhed pa gang lags pa de dag la bdag gi bsam pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa ngus pa'i khong nas dga' ba dang / 1
306b6: gi khong nas dga' ba sems can thams cad dang / lus thams cad btud nas sems can la sman pa'i slad du sems can gyi khams dang / las kyi khams dang / nyon mongs pa'i khams dang / na mkha'i khams ji tsam pa
306b7: de tsam du mya ngan las 'da' zhing bzhugs par gsol bar 'tsha lo/ / de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan 'byung gnas la phyag 'tshalo// tad ya thA/ ga ga na a ka re/ ga ga na sau b+ha be/ ga ga na kIr ti ka re swA hA/ phyogs/
306b8: bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' tshogs shin du bsags pa gang lag pa rnams dang / tshogs chung ngu gang lags pa rnams dang / byang chub sems bskyed pa gang lag pa rnams
307a1: dang / byang chub sems ma bskyed pa gang lags pa de rnams la bdag skul ma 'debra te// de rnams la bdag gi lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyis legs par spyod pa de dbul bar bgyi'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba des
307a2: tshogs rnams shin tu bsags shing dge ba'i rtse ba rnams legs par bsags nas myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngan par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu skor bar gyur
307a3: cig/ bdud bzhi tshar gcod par gyur cig/ sems can yongasu smin par bgyid par gyur cig/ sems can la sman pa'i slad du sems can gyi khams dang las kyi khams dang / nyon mongs pa'i khams dang / rnam pa'i
307a4: khams ji tsam pa de tsam du bzhugs par gsol bar 'cha lo/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa blo gros mi zad pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ tad yaH/ ak+Sha ye/ ak+Sha ya/ ak+Sha bi sho d+ha ne swA hA// phyogs bcu'i
307a5: 'jig rten gyi khams na rdul phra ma snyed kyi 'das pa dang / ma 'das pa dang / daltar byung ba'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' de rnams kyi sprin la mtshan pa bcupo khri phrag grangs zed
307a6: pa gang lags pa de dag mdzad pa rnams la ldan gyis grub par 'jug pa de bzhin du da mchos la su 'jug par gyur cig/ de nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag par 'gyur ba de ni ji ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
307a7: gshegs pa 'ad pag med de'i 'jig rten gyi khams bder can dang / ji ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa de'i 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba dang / ji ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
307a8: pad ma'i spyan de'i 'jig rten gyi khams pad ma can dang / ji ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu bzang po de'i 'jig rten gyi khams mig mi 'dzums dang / ji ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs bden
307b1: po che'i tog de'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen ldan pa dang / ji ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa spos brtsegs de'i 'jig rten gyi khams dri bsung zhim pa dang / ji ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
307b2: pa rin po che bkod pa de'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen bkod pa dang / ji ltar ma 'ongs pa'i bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bden pa'i blo gros tog gi rgyal po de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang / ji ltar bcom ldan 'das de
307b3: bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi me tog de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang / ji ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen sbyin pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang / ji ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
307b4: ba can gyi 'od de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang / ji ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par byang chub sems dpa' rnams
307b5: kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing legs par bstan pa dang / ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul la 'jug pa ye shes snang ba rgyan gyis gleng gzhir sangs rgyas kyi zhing rin po che chen po'i pad ma'i
307b6: snying po byung ba mngon par bsgrubs pa de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der byang chub sems dpa' de rnams kyi mthu rab tu 'byung zhing / der de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
307b7: sas rgyas par gyur cig/ ji ltar 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang byang chub sems dpa' de rnams kyis smon lam chen por shin du yongasu dag pas bsgrubs pa na//
307b8: rang gi bsod nams las nges par skyes pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par sangs rgyas kyi zhing bstan pa de dag yongasu gzung ba dang / yongasu 'dzin pa dang / yong su 'dzin par 'gyur ba de lta bu bdag gi sangs rgyas
308a1: nang gcag tu 'gyur nang du'ang bag tumad pa dang / yan tan gyi rgyan pag tu ma pa'i mang dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhing khyad par du 'phags pa mngan par mtha ba' rkyen bkang pangamathong ba dang /
308a2: rig pa dang thos pa dang / dran pas lhan cig mngan par rdzogs par byang chub bar gyur cig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de sems can gang dag sangs rgyas thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis yongasu btang ba/
308a3: sar mi 'dzin pa/ par mi 'dzin pa/ dge sbyong du mi 'dzin pa/ bram zer mi 'dzin pa/ rigs kyi gan rabs kyi rjes mi snyegs pa/ dang tshul ngan pa/ sdig pa'i bas yang dag par spyod pa/ dru dang grags pa/ khasam
308a4: bsregs pa/ sa bon bsregs pa/ dge ba'i rtsa bachang / ngan song la mngon par phyogs pa/ mtshams med pa lnga dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa' gtam po dam pa'i chos spyod de rnams sangs rgyas kyi zhing deng 'dus
308a5: dang por 'byung bar 'drar zhing / bdag gis de dag thams cad zhi ba'i lamathan med pa'i sangs rgyas nyid la 'god par gyur cig/ de nas ji tsam du khams gsum du skyes pa'i sems can de rnams ning der 'ju
308a6: gnyis pa las 'byung bar 'gyur zhing bdag gis de dag thams cad pag chags dang mtshams sbyor ba'i nyan mangs pa thams cad spangs pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes pa 'god par gyur cig/ dbazhin gshas
308a7: 'jung gi 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal la/ / tad ya thA/ shad la shA She/ shang khapa ma re thAr+tha/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig tan gyi kham su 'dus pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub
308a8: dpar rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mdzad pa gang lags pa de dag thams cad bdag gcig pu gnyi su ma mchis pas rim gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la 'phel bar
308b1: bkye bar spros/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' nga dag stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa'i chos nyid mngon sum du mdzad cing /
308b2: de las gzhan pa byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyang mngon sum du mdzad nas bde bar bzhugs pa tshogs chung ngus bzhugasu gsol// de bzhin gshegs pa lhun po'i rtse mo'i 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo//
308b3: tad ya thA/ shi khe/ shi khe ban b+he swA hA/ de'i 'og tu bdag tshogs shin tu bsags/ gnag pa yong su rdzogs/ bsam pa yong su rdzogs/ sangs rgyas kyi bya ba yongasu rdzogs nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
308b4: pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur cig/ mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar bgyi ba de bzhin nyid kyi 'khor lo dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'i 'khor
308b5: lo dang / ji lta ba bzhin gyi 'khor lo dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa'i 'khor lo dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i 'khor lo dang / nges par 'byung ba'i 'khor lo dang / nges par 'byed pa'i
308b6: 'khor lo dang / / phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched mi dmigs pa'i 'khor lo dang / na mkha'i lta bu'i 'khor lo dang / chos kyi dbyings dbyer med pa'i 'khor lo dang / bag chags dang mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa'i
308b7: thams cad spang ba'i 'khor lo dang / nga dang / bdag dang / rtag pa dang / 'chang ba dang / bdag dang / bdag gir 'dzin pa nas nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
308b8: su mngon par zhen pa'i bar mi dmigs pa'i 'khor lo dang / mdor na gang na 'khor lo dang med pa/ bskor ba med pa de lta bu'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar gyur cig/ rab tu skor nas sems can rnams yongs su
309a1: smin par bgyid par gyur cig/ yongasu smin par bgyis nas sems can la sman pa'i slad du sems can gyi khams dang / las kyi khams dang / nyon mongs pa'i khams dang / na mkha'i khams ci tsam pa de tsam bu
309a2: gnas par gyur cig/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo// tad ya grA/ ma n+ye/ sarba ma n+ye bra ha ne swA hA/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan yongasu spyod pa dang / de bzhin du
309a3: sems can yongs smin par bgyis pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / rab tu 'byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang / rim 'gro dang / bsnyen bkur bgyis pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / pha ma dang / bla ma dang /
309a4: yon gnas dang / mkhan po dang / slob dpon dang / dman pa dang / bkren pa dang / sdug phongs pa de las bsgrubs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / dam pa'i chos rnam par 'byed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / rjes su yid rang ba dang / 'thol ba dang /
309a5: bshags pa dang ldan pa dang / phyag 'tshal pa dang mchod pa dang ldan pa dang / byis pa nas gzung nas da ltar ram/ skye ba thog ma dang / tha ma ma mchis pa'i 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i skye ba gzhan dag tu bsags pa nas phung po
309a6: lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i mtha'i bar gang lags pa de dag sems can thams cad dang thun mongs du bgyis nas mchog dang gtso bo dang / gya nom pa dang / rab dang phul dang / bla na ma mchis pa dang / gong nam
309a7: mchis pa dang / gong ma'i yang gong ma dang / mnyam pa ma mchis pa dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa dang / ni/ mamang mi gan la go mi 'ad na ma mchis pa dang / spros pa ma mchis pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa dang /
309a8: nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang / chags pa ma mchis pa dang / na mkha' ltar mnyam pa dang / lus dang / sems grol ba dang / rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang / ldan pa'i stong pa nyid kyi yongasu bsngo bas yong su bsngo bar
309b1: bgyi'o/ / ji ltar 'das pa dang / ma 'das pa dang / dkar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' de rnams kyis gnyisu med pa'i chos nyid mengon du mdzad nas yongs bsngos pa dang / yongasu
309b2: be tho ba dang / yongasu bsngo bar 'gyur ba de ltar bdag gis kyang yongasu batho bar bgyi'o// ji ltar chos nyid de dang / ji skar de bzhin nyid de dang / ji slar yang dag pa'i mtha' de dang // ji ltar chos kyi dbyings de dang /
309b3: ji ltar stong pa nyid de dang // ji ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de nas ji ltar de kho na nyid mthong ba'i bar gang la gnyis gnyis med cing gnyis ma yin pa med pa de ltar yongs su sngo bar bgyi'o// sangs rgyas
309b4: dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// tad ya thA/ bud d+he bud d+he/ sarba bud d+he bi sha ya bi sho d+ha ne swA hA// 'phags pa yong su bsngo ba'i rgyal po sngags dang bcas pa ji snyed pa rdzog s+ho//
309b5: pa Na Ti ta bid+yA ka ra pra b+ha dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ye shes snying po dang / dpal brtsegs kyis bsgyur cing bus te gtan la phab pa// / dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// sems can
309b6: khams ni mtha' yas pa'i/ / sdug bsngal nye bar zhi ba dang // ngan 'gro rnams las bsgral ba dang // nyon mongs rnams las sgrol ba'i phyir// sred pa mi bde dog pa na// sdug bsngal sna tshogs ci mchis pa// de ltas
309b7: yongasu sgrub pa'i phyir/ / bdag gis byang chub sems skyed do// sems can phongs pa thams cad kyi// skyab su bdag nyid rtag tu shog/ bdag ni mgon med rnams kyi mgon// rten med rnams kyi rten du
309b8: bdag/ skabs med rnams kyi skyabs 'gyur zhing // sdug bsngal bde bar byed pa dang // bdag ni sems can thams cad kyi// nyon mongs zhi bar byed par shog/ dge ba'i las rnams gang dang gang// 'di dang gzhan
310a1: dra bsams pa rnams/ / bsad nams la shes byab// chags na rnam pa ga su shag/ par sa byin pa drug smyanas/ bdag gas can 'grus gang brtsams pa/ da yang sems can ma lus pa/ khams
310a2: bdalan pa pa sheg ma batha'ags byed pa dang / / gang yang cung zad byed 'gyur ba// ma nga namams can thams cad kyi// nyon mangs thams ca ni dang / grol bar bya ba'i b+hi ba nga // byang chub /
310a3: brten na/ nas rtags pa'i byang chub sems// tshig bzhin du kun du bskyed// sems can can dang snying rjedang// byams panye bar gnas par bya// sems ni lags par snang ba'i phyir/ tshogs thabs kyis rjes
310a4: can cu/ / nad gi bdag pang ni pa yis/ sam pa gcig tu bzlas pa da/ sman gyi rgyal ba'i mas rnams kyis// smon la ma ji ltar mdzad pa bzhin// dag kyang dge pa'i sems kyis su// de bzhin du ni sngon
310a5: 'dab pa/ / chos kyi longs spyod sna tshogs la// mnyam par gzhag nas yi ngango // sems can thams cad bang ba dang // ni 'a na kyang med par shog/ bdag ni bya ba kun nas shing / yon tan dang yan pa na//
310a6: nor ldan gtad pod shes rab can// zed ldan dgel dang pa dang // sems can cho gas thams ca dang // skye bdun zhing bcar ldan to// dpal legs par grub par byed pa yi// rgyud chen po las 'byung ba'i smon la
310a7: rdzogs / / / phags pa sgyu pa gzigs nga b+hag pa bzhin gyin nga rtag napapa byung ga/ bzhin gshegs pa ga rnam pa pa dang/ rdzogs pas su rgyas
310a8: med la phyag 'tshal/ / dgen mchag gsum la phyag 'tshal// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dang byug la phyag tsha// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' man po thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa mar+g+ha
310b1: chen thob la phyag 'tshal/ / btsun pa spyan ngas gzigs dbang phyuH/ thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa dgong su gsol// raphags pa zugs rje'i dbang phyug gis rje su dran pa dang / mtshan nas brjod pas bdag dang sems
310b2: can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal mi bzod pa thams cad zhi zhing rgyun chad par gyur cig/ btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshalo// 'phags pa thugs rje'i dbang phyug
310b3: bdag gis rjesu dran pa dang / mtshan nas brjod pas/ bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa dang / phyir rgol ba thams cad rgyun chad par gyur cig/ btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
310b4: brug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshalo/ / 'phags pa thugs rje'i dbang phyug bdag gis rje su dran pa dang mtshan nas brjod pas/ bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi lam dang nyon mongs pa tham
310b5: cad dang / mi dge ba'i chos dang / bdud kyi las skyes pa thamasas cad byang zhing grol bar gyur cig/ btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshalo// 'phags pa thugs
310b6: rje'i dbang phyug bdag gis rje su dran pa dang mtshan nas brjod pas/ bdag dang sems can thams cad kyis btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug zhal rtag tu mthong zhing smon lam ji skad bstan pa thams
310b7: cad kyang myur du thob par gyur cig/ btsun pa spyan ras gzi shas dbang phyug zugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshalo// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs thugs rje'i dbang phyug bdag gis rje su dran pa
310b8: dpa mtshan nas brjod pas/ bdag dang sems can thams cad 'phags pa gang dag zhal mngon sum du lta zhing dam pa mchog gsol ba thams cad kyang de bzhin du grub par gyur cig/ btsun pa spyan ras
311a1: gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la phyag 'tsha lo/ / 'phags pa thugs rje'i dbang phyug bdag gis rje su dran pa dang mtshan nas brjod pas/ bdag dang sems can gyi 'jig rten
311a2: dgan phongs shing nyams theg pa thams cad la phan pa dang / bde bar bgyid pa la mthu chen po thob par gyur cig/ btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thug rje chen po dang ldan pa la phyag 'tsha'o// 'bam
311a3: bzugs rje'i dbang phyug bdag gis rje su dran pa dang mtshan nas brjod pas/ 'jig rten dag na mu ge'i mgon po chen po dang / me dang chu dang / rlung la sogs pa'i gnod pa gang byung bas skye bo mang po nyams thag
311a4: bde dag zhi ba dang / ma mchis par bgyid par gyur cig/ btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshalo// 'phags pa thugs rje'i dbang phyug bdag gis rjes su dran pa
311a5: dang / mtshan nas brjod pas/ bdag dang sems can gang dag 'jig rten 'di nas pha rol tu 'chi'i pho ba'i 'jig rten chen po nye bar gnas pa na yang / 'phags pa thugs rje'i dbang phyug khyod zhal mngon sum du
311a6: mthong zhing dbugs 'byin pa chen po mdzad par gyur cig/ bdag dang sems can gzhan 'chi 'pho ba dag gis kyang nyon mongs pa dag gis ma spros pa chos bdag med pa dran pa dang ldan pa byang chub kyi sems tshad med par
311a7: brtan pa sems mazhum pa/ spobs pa thogs pa med pa dang ldan zhing / sdug bsngal gyi tshong ba thams cad nye bar zhi zhing / dran pa nye bar gzhag bzhin du mchi 'pho bar gyur cig/ tshe rabs thams cad du yang 'phags
311a8: bzu ngapa gzigs dang phyug gi zhabs drung du skyen charab sa rje su me dang byed chu kyi mas bran su mchags pa dang ldan pas/ 'phags pakrugs rje'i bang phyug la sogs pas nyes par bgyid byi byi
311b1: bstan pa bzhin du grub pa'i mthu dang ldan par gyur cig/ ji ltar thugs rje dbang phyug ngas thugs rje chen po'i rnam par thar pa'i ste ljon gyis grub pa dang / sangs rgya sa thams cad kyi thugs rje dang ro gcig par gyur cig/
311b2: ji ltar thugs rje'i dbang phyug gis sems can yongasu smin par mdzad pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yong su dag pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi sa chos thams cad yong su rdzogs par 'gyur ba de bzhin du bdag dang sems can
311b3: thams cad kyis kyang sems can thams cad yong su smin par bgyid pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongasu dag pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi chos thams cad yong su rdzogs par bgyid par gyur cig/ ji ltar dus sum gyi
311b4: sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi thugs rje'i bdag nyid 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rjesu dran pa dang / mtshan nas brjod pas/ dus gsum gyi rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa thams cad kyi
311b5: mtshan nas brjod cing / bstan bkur bgyis par gyur cig/ ji ldar dus gsum gyi rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa thams cad kyis thugs rje'i rang bzhin 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug de rjesu dran pa dang mtshan nas
311b6: brjod cing mchod pa bgyis pas/ thugs rje chen po'i yul du gyur pa sems can thams cad la yang snying rje chen po'i thabs kyi sbyar ba rgyun mi 'chang bar 'byung bar 'gyur cig/ ji srid bdag ni 'khar ba'i tshe/ de snyed
311b7: bdag ni lus skyes par/ de srid mgon po mchod bgyid cing / de snod lus sbyor tshogs bgyid shog/ ji srid bdag ni 'khor ba'i tshe// ji skad bdag gis ngag skyes par// de srid mgon po mtshan brjod cing / ngag gi sbyor ba
311b8: tshogs kyi da shog/ ji srid bdag ni 'khor ba na/ de snyed bang gi yid 'byung ba/ de snyed mgon po rjes dran zhing / yid sbyor tshogs par bgyid gyur cig/ de ltar lus dang ngag yid kyis// thugs rje'i dbang phyug rten//
312a1: bgyis pas// lus dang ngag yid skyon bral zhing // yon tan phun sum tshogs gyur cig/ de ltar lus ngag yid kyis su// thugs rje'i dbang phyug sku gsung thugs rtag tu sbyor bar bgyis pas na/
312a2: thugs rje'i dbang phyug spyan ras gzigs// srid gsum re ba'i gnas gcig po// de 'drar bdag kyang grub gyur te// srid gsum re rdzogs bgyid gyur cig/ na mr-i rang na tra yA ya/ nam Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa R+Sha ya/
312a3: bad+hi sa twA ye/ ma hA sa twA ya/ ma hA ka ru ni ka ya/ oM tsakra ba ti/ tsin da ma Ni ma hA ba du me ru ru tiSh+Tha/ dz+wa la a ka ra Sha ya hUM phaT swA hA// rtsa ba'i sngags rdzog ste/ oM pa du ma cin da ma Ni dz+wa la hU~M/ snying po'o// oM thar
312a4: dab du ma~M hUM/ nye ba'i snying po'o// oM ma ni badz+ran hUM/ gsang ba'i snying po'o// sngags snying bzhin du 'byung // smon lam dang tshig su bcad pa dang sngag su bcas brdzog s+ho// // dkon mchog gsum la phyag
312a5: 'tshalo/ / 'jig rten 'di 'am yang dag 'das pa dang / mtho ris dag na rin chen mchog yod pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa lha yi lhar gyur pa// me yi mchog dang 'dir ni mtshungs pa med// da bas 'dir ni rin chen
312a6: mchog tu gsungs/ / bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog/ zad pa chags bral bdud rtsi 'dus ma byas// shes pas shAkya thub des rab tu bye// bdud rtsi zhib 'dus byas ma yin pa// chos de dang ni mtshungs
312a7: pa gang yang med/ / de bas 'dis ni rin chen mchog tu gsungs// bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog/ mchog tu gang 'dod tshul bzhin rab bstan pa/ ston pa'i rnal 'byor bla med rtag sgrub pa// rdo rje la
312a8: bu'i mig gnyis la mthong ba/ / ting 'dzin de dang mnyam pa yod ma yin// de bas 'di ni rin chen mchog tu gsungs// bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog/ gang zag chen po brgyad po rab sngags shing // gang /
312b1: zag zung bzhir brjod pa de dag ni// drang srong chen po gang zag mtshungs med pa/ bde bar gshegs pas sbyin pa'i gnas shes gsungs/ de la byin na 'bras bu cher 'gyur te/ zhing rab gshin la sa bon btab pa
312b2: bzhin/ 'di ni dge 'dun rin chen mchog tu gsungs// bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog/ gang dge bstan pa'i yid kyis rab brtson zhing // gau ta ma'i bstan la 'jug byed pa// de dag thob nas bdud rtsi 'jug
312b3: thob ste/ / mun pa bsal nas mya ngan 'das thob pa// de bas dge 'dun rin chen mchog tu gsungs// bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog/ lta ba 'di la sbyar ma thag tu ni// 'jig tshogs lta
312b4: dang tshul khram brtul zhugs dang / / the tsom dang ni nyon mongs gsum po dag/ gcig char sbyangs te 'phags pa'i bden mthong ba// des na dge 'dun rin chen mchog tu gsungs/
312b5: bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog/ lus sam ngag gam 'on te yid kyis kyang // sdig pa rnams gsum nam yang mi byed cing // glo bur byas na'ang 'chab par mi byed pa// de ltar de
312b6: dag lta bas 'dzin mi byed/ / de bas dge 'dun rin chen mchog tu gsungs// bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog/ ci ltar dbang po'i sdong po sar btsugs pa// phyogs bzhi'i rlung rnams kyis ni migs
312b7: lta 'phags pa'i lam gyi dam pa mthong ba yi/ gang zag 'phags pa'i dge 'dun de bzhino// des na dag 'dun rini chen mchog tu gsungs// bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog/ shes rab zab mos shin tu bstan pa yi//
312b8: 'phags pa'i bden bsud dag nam skom zhing / lus kyang sbyin par yid la byas pa ni// de dag 'jigs pa brgyad dang phrad mi 'gyur// desan dge 'dun rin chen mchog tu gsungs// bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog/
313a1: ci ltar me ni rlung gis rab gtor ba// lag tu blangs te 'grang du med pa nyid// de ltar kun du sbyor ba rab btang ba// sangs rgyas sras rnams bstan du med par 'gro// des na dge 'dun rin chen mchog tu gsungs//
313a2: bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog/ sems can gang dag 'gro dang mi 'gro ba// de dag thams cad 'dir ni bder gyur cig/ ston mchog lha dang mis ni mchod 'os pa/ sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal deng 'dir dge bar shog/ sems can gang
313a3: dag 'gro dang mi 'gro ba/ / de dag thams cad 'dir ni bder gyur cig/ zhi ba chags bral lha mis mchod 'os pa// chos la phyag 'tshal deng 'dir dge bar shog/ sems can gang dag 'gro dang mi 'gro ba// de dag thams cad 'dir ni bder
313a4: gyur cig/ tshogs kyi dam pa lha mis mchod 'os pa// dge 'dun phyag 'tshal deng 'dir dge bar shog/ 'byung po gang dag 'dir ni lcags gyur te// sa 'am 'on te bar snang 'khod pa dag/ skye dgu rnams la rtag tu byams byed shog/ nyin dang mtshan du
313a5: chos kyang spyod par shog/ 'di ni rgyal ba dgra rgyal bden gang gis// shin tu bden pa gsung zhing brdzun med pa// bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog/ de kun 'jigs pa che las thar gyur cig/ sangs rgyas kun gyi gzi brjid dang // rang
313a6: rgyal dag gi gzi brjid dang / / dgra bcom dag gi mthu dag dang // gsang sngags 'dzin pa thams cad dang // shA ri'i bu yi shes rab dang // maud gal bu yi rdzu 'phrul dang // ma 'gags pa yi mig dang ni// 'od srung sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang // kau N+Di
313a7: snga thos dang / kun dga' bo yi thos pa dang // tshangs pa yi ni byams pa dang // brgya byin gyis ni dbang rnams dang // 'jig rten skyong ba'i yul rnams dang // dbang byug chen po'i stobs dag dang / sde pon rnams kyi mthu ga dang // phrogs
313a8: brjid rdzu 'phrul dang / / de dag rnams kyi mthu dang gzis// bdag gi dug ni dug med shog/ stong chen mo rab tu 'joms pa las gsungs pa'i smon lam rdzogs s+ho// / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la phyag 'tsha'o// rgyal ba nam ngag zi
313b1: mya ngan 'tshang la gnas/ / rgyal ba gtsug tor pad ma dkar po'i drung // thams cad skyob pas la'i drung na gnas// bram ze 'khor ba 'jig ne shing sha'i drung // sangs rgyas gas zul u dum pa ri'i drung // 'od srung n+ya gro d+ha'i drung na gnas// shAkya thub mchog
313b2: khyad par gnas drung du/ phyin nas byang chubazo bgyur go tam/ sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul chen po de dag la// mngon par da pa'i lha gad 'azod pa dag/ lha rnams de dag yid dga' mgur gyur nas/ ga tu dag zhing shib 'gyur ba byos/ ngas rgyas rnam rgya
313b3: 'cha'o/ / dang gnyis byed rnams bde legs shog/ gang bzhi khyed cag bde legs go// lam du zhugs nams pa de legs shog/ phyir 'od dag kyang bde legs shog/ mtshan mo bde legs nyin pa de lags/ nyi ma'i bung la bde legs shing / khyed pagakun du bde
313b4: legs shog/ de dag sdig par ma gyur cig/ nyi ma thams cad dge ba yin// rgyu skar thams cad bzang po yin// sangs rgyas thams cad rdzu 'phrul che// dgra bcom thams cad zag pa med// bden pa'i tshig gis kun du bde legs su gyur cig/ ngi/
313b5: sngags kyi rgyal mo ma bya chen mo las gsungs pa'i smon lam dang bden tshig rdzogs s+ho// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// zas goms bzang po ro zhem zhing mdog drug la dri bsung dang ldan zhing dang ldang ba// yon tan za
313b6: sum tshogs pas brgyan pa/ / dpag bsam gyi shing ljon pa'i nags tshal dkon zhing dri ma med la/ rgyan gyis grubs pa/ yal ga'i thor to'i ljid kyis gsur thal mgo lcogs ma tog kha phye zhing 'dab mas legs par brgya nate/ bud pa
313b7: lang long khrus lding zhing 'phungs pa rnams kyis bzhi pa cing non pa'i shugs kyis bag tsam 'dir ldem ldem la/ / rin chen yal ga dang ma rgang sdug 'phran gyi bla re 'jol ba dag mngon par sgrub par byed pa/ 'gro ba dag tu mtshor bar
313b8: 'gro ba'i g.yang sa chen po yang ba dag tu mar me snang gsal dag cing dri ma med pa lta bu byin pa gang las bsod nams dang / bsod nams kyi rgyu 'thun pa dang / dge ba dang dge ba'i rgyu dang 'thun pa bde dgu'i
314a1: gzhir gyur pa des na sbyin bdag chen po bdag nyid che ge mo zhig gi lus dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyis bsgrubs pa la tshe dang / kha dog dang / stobs dang / gzi byin dang / longs spyod dang / dbang phyug dang / shes rab dang / spobs
314a2: pa phun sum tshogs par gyur cig/ sbyin bdag gi bsod nams ma skyes pa rnams ni skye ba gyur cig/ sbyin bdag gi longs spyod kyis zin pa rnams ni 'phel zhing rgyas par gyur cig/ de bzhin du sbyin bdag gi pha ma mchog tu dka' ba byed
314a3: byed pa/ gsogaso// gnam gnam/ bskyed bskyed/ bsrid bsrid la 'dzam bu'i gling bkra yer yer mig gis mthong bar byed pas kyang bsod nams kyi phud kyi skal shas thob par gyur cig/ de bzhin du sbyin bdag gi chung ma rnams dang / bu rnams dang /
314a4: bu mo rnams dang / sbyin bdag gi gnyen mnga' mdza' bshes rgyas pa'i tshan ris gang dag 'khod cing 'tshol gnas pa de dag kyang tshe ring zhing longs spyod che la g.yog 'khor mang bar gyur cig/ gang dag 'das shing tshe 'phos pa de dag kyang 'gro ba
314a5: dang / / skye ba'i gnas dang gnas tha dad pa'i khyad par thob par gyur te/ lha'i gnas su skyes par gyur nas 'phags pa byams pa'i zhal snga nas mnyes par byed par gyur cig/ de bzhin du rgyal po'i mchog rgyal po chen po mnga' bdag dam pa dpal lha
314a6: btsan pos ma phebs pa rnams ni phebs par gyur cig/ phebs zin pa rnams ni chen du phebs par gyur cig/ stobs kyis 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid kyang brnyes par gyur cig/ de bzhin du nye 'khor gyi grong na gnas pa'i rigs bzhi ste/
314a7: bramaze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'i rigs dang / dmangs rigs la sogs pa yul gyi mi rnams la nad med cing gnod pa med par gyur cig/ de bzhin du mi 'dzod kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / lha'i dbang po ba rgya byin dang / 'jig rten skyong ba ban
314a8: dang gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shurtsa brgyad dang / ku'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / bsnyen dga' bo dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon bde ba'i ri bo dang / gangs can dang / lnga rtsen dang / lnga len la sogs pa dang / nor bu bzang dang / rdzogs bzang gnyis dang / 'phrogs
314b1: bulnga brgya'i 'khor dang bcas pa dang / gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la mngon par dga' ba'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / dri za dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / sbyin bdag gi khyim 'din
314b2: gnas pa'i lha rnams dang / sbyin bdag gis bstan pa'i lha'i khyad par gyis de dag gzi byin dang / stobs dang / gzhal med khang rnams rgyas par gyur cig/ de dag gzi byin dang ldan par gyur/ stobapa dang ldan par gyur/ gzhan gyis mi tshugs par gyur//
314b3: che bar grags par gyur nas/ sbyin bdag bdag nyid chen po 'di nyid kyi mdzod dang / bang pa dang / kha lang gi khyu dang / phyugs gdags sna tshogs kyi khru dang // zhing gi rmo bko dang / lam gyi sgo rnams dang / bla 'og gi bya ba thams cad la chos bzhin du bsrung
314b4: ba dang bskyab pa dang / sba ba byed par gyur cig/ gnod pa rnams ni zlog par gyur cig/ don du bsgrubs pa rnams ni snang bar gyur cig/ de bzhin du sbyin bdag gi dad pa dang sbyar te/ dmyal bar skyes pa rnams kyi gnod pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad zhi bar gyur cig
314b5: dung 'gro rnams gcig la gcig za ba rnams zlogs par gyur cig/ yi dgas kyi bkres shing skom pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad zhi bar gyur cig/ mi rnams tshol khros g.yen spyo ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad zhi bar gyur cig/ lha rnams kyi 'chi po
314b6: su nga dang grong dag ji jug bsngal thams cad zhi bar gyur cig/ mdor na khams gsum du skyes pa'i sems can thams cad dang / srog chags thams cad kyis kyang mya ngan ba da skyes ma byung ba/ ma byas ma bcas pa/
314b7: 'a' gro bdag mi gnas pa/ dmigs sa med pa/ bde ba zhis sunom pa/ bde legs can/ gnas dang / gling dang / slob pa dang / sgrubs dang / dpung gnyen dang / mi g.yo ba gang yin pa'i myangan las 'das pa'i chos kyi ma ngog de ga
314b8: thob par gyur cig/ gnod sbyi gang dag bzhon pa mi zad dpung can lha rdzas gos gyoni phreng ba thogs// gang dag 'jig rten gsum mchog mkhas pa rnams kyis brjod pa'i sangs rgyas skyabs song ba lngas rtsen lag na rdo rje nor sbyin dpal
315a1: tsan nor bu bzang sras lasogs pa/ de dag thams cad lhan cig rtag tu byed kyi khyis du mas bzhin srung bar shog/ sngas can dang ni 'phrogs bu sdug 'bor ba cas nor bu bzang sras dpung dang bcas rnams dang /
315a2: gnod sbyin dbang po lag na rdo rje rang gi sde tshan bcas dang rang gi sder bcas dang // gnan pa gnod sbyin pang pogang dag sde chen gas stan na dag pa dga' ba rnams// thams cad 'thun par khyod kyi pha tshan dang ni gnyen sdug bcas la rtag tu skyong gyur cig/
315a3: mtshan mo dang ni nyi ma 'char kha nyi ma'i gung rnams dang // nyi ma nub kar rtag tu khyod la bkra shis ldan par shog/ dpal chen lag na rdo rje nor bu bzang dang 'phags skyes sogs// khyod dang gnyen 'dun rnams dang bcas la yongs su
315a4: skyospyo gyur cig/ gtong la dpa' ba rnams kyang khyim 'khor stobs dang 'byor pa sgrub cing mi nad med par shog/ yon gnas rnams kyang yon tan tshogs pas 'phel bar 'gyur zhing 'bru rnams rab tu rgyas par shog/ mchod rten rnams
315a5: kyang mchod par 'gyur zhing bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa yun ring 'bar bar shog/ rgyal po chos bzhin byed pas skyong gyur sems can mtha' dag rab zhi bde ba myong gyur cig/ sbyin pa'i rabs las 'byung ba'i smon lam rdzogs s+ho//
315a6: dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// gang la ser sna rnams chags pa// rnam bcom dri ma med mdzad cing // thugs zhiganod pa mi mnga' de// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// 'dren pa gang zhig 'gro ba rnams// thar pa'i lam du
315a7: mdzung mdzad cing / / chos rnams thams cad ston pa de// khyed la ba de legs mdzad par 'gyur// ston pa 'gro ba rnams kyi rten// sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir// gang gis bde ba mnga' mdzad de// khyed la ba de legs mdzad par 'gyur// stso
315a8: pa gang zhig byams pa yi/ / thugs kyi 'gro ba 'di dag kun// bu gcig bzhin du rtag bskyangs te// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// gang zhig 'khor bar 'khor ba yis// sems can kun gyi rten gyur cing / gling dang dpung gnyen gyur pa de// khyed
315b1: bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ / gang zhig chos kun mngon sum gyur// gtsang zhing slu ba mi mnga' la// gsung gtsang gtsang mar mdzad pa de// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// dpa' chen po gang skyes pas// phun sum tshegs don 'byor gyur cing //
315b2: don grub tshogs kyang grub pa de// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// gang zhig skyes pas sa rnams ni// nags tshal bcas par rab g.yos shing // sems can thams cad rab dga' do// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// byang chub
315b3: snying por gang zhig gis/ / sa dag rnam drug g.yos gyur cing // bdud yid mi bder gyur pa de// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba na// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnam gsung ba// thub pa'i snyan pa gang byung de// khyed la bde/
315b4: legs mdzad par 'gyur// yid 'phrog gang gis mu stegs byed// thams cad chos kyis pha ma mdzad cing // tshogs kun dbang du mdzad pa de// khyed la bde la gra mdzad par 'gyur// sangs rgyas khyed la bde legs mdzad// brgya byin bcas lha ba de legs dang //
315b5: 'byung po kun gyi bde legs ni// khyed la rtag tu sbyin gyur cig/ sangs rgyas bsod nams mthu dag dang // lha rnams kyis ni bsams pa yi// khyed kyi don 'dod gang yin pa// don de de ring 'grub gyur cig/ rkang gnyis khyed cag bde legs shog/ rkang /
315b6: bzhi khyed cag bde legs gyur// khyed cag lam 'gro ba de legs shog/ phyir ldog dag kyang bde gyur cig/ nyin mo bde legs mtshan bde legs// nyi ma'i gung la'ang bde legs shing // khyed cag kun du bde legs shog/ khyed cag sdig par ma gyur cig/
315b7: sangs rgyas lha rnams stong dag gis// yongs su bskor te gshegs mdzad kyi// sngang sems ldan pa rnams byed cig/ snying rje'i bdag nyid can rnams 'khod// sangs rgyas rang sangs rgyas rnams dang // dgra bcom slob pa'i bden tshig gis// 'jig rten
315b8: mi pan byed pa rnams/ / grong khyer 'dir ni gtor gyur cig/ sems can kun dang srog chags kun// 'byung po kun dang khyed cag kun// bde ba 'ba' zhig ldan gyur cig/ thams cad nad rnams med par shog/ kun gyis bzang rnams mthong gyur cig/
316a1: gang yang sdig par mthur cig/ byung po gang dag 'dir ni lhags kyu rtsig/ sa dang par snang dag la gnas pa rnams// skye dku rnams la rtag tu byams byed gog/ nyin dang mtshan chos kyang stod gyur ga/ 'phags pa yangs pani/
316a2: gro byer du 'jug pa'i mdo las/ 'brang ba'i bde legs kyi tshigs su bcad pa rdzogs s+ho// / rgya gar skad du/ swa sti gA tA/ bod skad du/ bde legs kyi tshogs su bcad pa// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// lha cig nye bar song nas
316a3: su/ lhas mchod pa la zhus byas te/ sangs rgyas chen po thub pa che// ci zhig smras na bde legs 'gyur// des ni tshig rnams gsan gyur nas// 'jig rten rtsa lag bka' stsal pa// gang zhig rtag tu brjod byed pa// nga yi bde legs 'gyur
316a4: te nyon/ / 'jig rten 'di dang gzhan dang mtho ris na// rin chen rgya chen mchog ni gang yod pa// des ni rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen la// cis kyang grangs dang bskrad dang char mi phod// ngo mtshar shin du rmad byung dpag med de// rdzogs pa'i sangs
316a5: rgyas rin chen 'jig rten mchog/ ji ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na// bden pa 'dis ni shin tu bde legs shog/ zhi 'gog bdud rtsi shin du gya nom gang // shAkya thub pas mnyam bzhag thugs chud pa// chos de dang ni mtshungs pa yod min
316a6: te/ de sngon byas na phyin chad mya ngan med// ngo mtshar shin du rmad byung dpag med de// dam tshe kyi rin chen 'jig rten mchog/ ji ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na// bden pa 'dis ni shin du bde legs shog/ rgyal ba gang dag gang zag brgyad gsungs
316a7: pa/ de dag rnams ni skyes bu zung bzhi ste// sbyin gnas de dgas steng shin du dkon// de dag rnams la byin na dpag med 'gyur// ngo mtshar shin du rmad byung dpag med de// dge 'dun rin chen gang zhig 'jig rten mchog/ ji ltar nga'i
316a8: 'di bzhin bden mchog na/ / den pa 'dis ni shin du bde logs shog/ dam pa gtso bo mchog sbyin ma nom pa// 'od mchog dpa' bo dam pa mchog gi gnas// shes rab dam pa mchog gi dam pa mchog/ mchog chen
316b1: mchog mkhyen 'di ni bcom ldan gcig/ ngo mtshar shin du chad zung dpag med de// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'jig rten mchog/ ji ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na// bden pa 'dis ni shin du bde legs shog/ ting 'dzin dam pa
316b2: bar cad med pa gang / / tha' las tho na de bzhin gshegs gsungs pa// 'dzin pa tan rdo rje dper byas pa// ting 'dzin dang mtshus pa'i citing 'dzin med// do mtsha shin du chad byung da pag mang de// ting nge 'dzin gyi na rten
316b3: 'jig rten mchog/ ji ltar nga'i 'di bzhin pa na mchog na// bden pa 'dis ni shin du bde legs shog/ ji ltar sgrogatan dam zhing rab dam ste// stobs chen rlung bzhi dag gis mi bskyod pa// de ltar mkhas pa bden
316b4: bzhi mthong gnas pa/ / 'jig rten smrab rnams kyis 'dir mig yo// ngo mtshar shin du rmad byung dpag med de// dge 'dun rin chen gang zhig 'jig rten mchog// ji lta ngaba'i 'di de bzhin bdin mchog na/ den pa 'dis shi
316b5: bde legs shog/ / thams cad zil gnon kun mkhyen thams cad gzigs// thams cad mkhyen pa stobs rnams kun dang ldan// kun gyi dam pa 'dzin pa kun dang bral// bsam pa kun mkhyen 'di ni bcom ldan gcig/ ngom
316b6: shin du chang byung dpag med de/ / gro sangs rgyas ni chen 'jig rtenam chag/ ji lta nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na// bden pa 'dis ni shin du bde legs shog/ srid pa 'gog cing mig yo 'gyur ba med// skyon
316b7: med 'jigs pa kun las rnam par grol/ / shin tu 'gog cing gya no ma nges par 'byung // shin tu dri med zhi ba blos mi 'phrogs// ngo mtshar shin du rmad byung dpag med de// dam pa'i chos kyi rin chen 'jig rten
316b8: mchog/ ji lta nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na// bden pa 'dis ni shin du bde legs shog/ shin du sdug bsngal ston cing ba sbyin pa'i/ bden rnams mthong ste gang dag pag yod pa/ bden pa rin can namal
317a1: dgas thab/ / da m+b+ha ba brgyad pa byas // byung ga nga// ga na nag zhaga'adag tan / 9 ga na gan/
317a2: bden pa 'dis ni shin tu ba de lags shig/ dam pa rnams kyis dam pa na ma mkhyen// n-i ga dang pa gsanam khyed na ma tsun// gzha gyis ma gas dpa parnags na rtags/
317a3: sdug bsngal rnams kyi bang mnyen mchag/ dmar shin tu rma byung dpag med de/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ngan can 'jig rten ma/ dza sa dang 'i 'di bzhin pa na mjug na/ bdun pa 'dis ni shinaH/
317a4: bde legs shog/ 'dun pa skyed nas rnal 'byor ldan gyur cing // go tam bstan la rtag brtson dpa grol zhi gzhan gyis mi bkyi bdag zhi dang dag/ 'di la de reg grangs phyin mi 'gyur// de mchar shin tu rmad
317a5: byung dpag med de/ / dge 'dun rin chen gang zhig 'jig rten mchog/ ji ltar da'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na// bden pa 'dis ni shin tu bde legs shog/ bden pa mthong bas brjed pas brgyad nga man/
317a6: gil te sdig pa 'ga' zhig byas gyur kyang // de ni de 'chab pa yi 'os min te// chos nyid 'di ni migaso gnas phyir ro// do mchang shin du ma dbyung dpag med de// dge 'dun rin chen gang zhig 'jig rten
317a7: ji ga bzhin bden ma chags/ / bden pa 'dis ni gi kyang stegs shog/ rtswa dang bcas pa'i 'jig na thams cadan/ sangs rgyas dang na rtag pa'am mtshungs pa med// lha
317a8: mayis napa bla na med/ spen pa dadang ben sman pa rnams kyi mchog/ ngo mtshar shin tu yang bung dpag med de// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'jig rten mchog/ ji lta dnga'i 'di bzhin bden
317b1: mchog na/ / bden pa 'dis ni shin du bde legs sheg/ sa sa ka'i zla ba dang bar thub pa yas// nags khrod chos kyi dam pa rab brnyes pa// chas dang ni lhag pa'am mtshungs pa med// 'di la de reg grangs su
317b2: phyin ma 'gyur/ / ngo mtshar shin du rmang byung dpag med de// dam pa'i chos kyi rin chen 'jig rten mchog/ ji ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na// bden pa 'dis ni shin tu bde legs shog/ sdug pa rnyeng zad gapang du
317b3: byas med la/ / rims nad med pas 'jigs med mya ngan bral// srid pa 'gags pas rtsa ba mi bskyed pa// bstan pa mar me bzhin du 'bar bar 'gyur// ngo mtshar shin tu rmad byung dpag med de// dge 'dun rin chen gang
317b4: zhig 'jig rten mchog/ ji ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na bden pa 'dis ni shin tu bde legs shog/ bde legs kyi tshigs su bcad pa rdzogs s+ho// // rgya gar skad du/
317b5: swa s+yA ya na gA thA/ bod skad du/ bde leg su 'gyur ba'i tshogs su bcad pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tsha lo// 'jig rten 'dren pa'i drung du ni// lha zhig nye bar song nas su// gang gis rtag tu bde legs
317b6: pa/ / bdag gis zhu yis bcom ldan gsungs// dam pas de dag gsan pa dang / 'jig rten 'dren pas lung bstan pas// gang gis kun du bde legs su// 'gyur ba lta khyod legs par nyon// gang zhig de
317b7: bzhin gshegs pa la/ / dad pa me g.yo legs rab bstan// gang zhig dge batshul khrims cad// de dag kun du bde legs 'gyur// gang zhig pa dang ma dag dang // bu dang bram bran dgal// rtag tu legs par/
317b8: bsnyen bkung ba// de dag kun du bde legs 'gyur// gang zhig dgra bcom grags pa la// legs par rab dang yon 'bral dang / sgra yi bka' bzhin byed pa dang // de dag kun du bde legs 'gyur// gang gis
318a1: lus dang ga/ dad ni// yid la zhes byas med pa dang // gang nag rnam gsum rab bsdams pa// de dag kun du bde lags 'gyur// gang zhig 'byung po thams cad la// tshad mad kun du ma 'khrugs pa/
318a2: byams pa'i sems ni skes byed pa// de dag kun du bde legs 'gyur// gang zhig sdug bsngal kun spang phyir// 'phags pa'i lam gyi yan lag brgyad// bde ba 'dren pa legs bsgob pa// de dag kun du
318a3: bde legs 'gyur/ / gang gis 'dus byas thams cad kyi// stong nyid rtag tu legs mthong zhing // de ni sems la gnas gyur pa// de dag kun du bde lags 'gyur// gang gis lus kyis dri med chos// ma
318a4: sum byas nas rgyu ba dang / / dgra bcom rnam grol sems ldan pa// de dag kun du bde legs 'gyur// gang gis 'dod chags zhe sdang dang // gti mug rnams dang chags bral zhing // ye shes 'khrug med skyes
318a5: gyur pa/ / de dag kun du bde legs 'gyur// gang zhig lhar bcas 'jig rten gyi// mgon po yang srid spangs pa yi// sangs rgyas khong du chud gyur pa// de dag kun du bde legs 'gyur// bde leg su 'gyur
318a6: ba'i tshig su bcad pa rdzogs s+ho/ / 6// rgya gar skad du// deb pa ri prits+tsha ma ga la gA k+Sha/ khod skad du/ lhas zhus pa'i bkra shis kyi tshig su bcad pa// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo//
318a7: gzhan gyis mi thub rdzogs sangs rgyas// mgon po phyogs gcig bzhugs pa na/ lha gcig dpa' bo chen po la// phyag 'tshal 'di skad cig gsol to// dge ba don du gnyer ba na// lha dang mi rnams ses
318a8: nas bkra shis dag ni brjod bgyis na/ / bkra shis dam pa gang zhig lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dge ba don du gnyer ba na// lha dang mi rnams so so nas// bkra shis rnams ni rjod
318b1: byed pa/ / de dag bkra shis brjod par bya// yul bzang gnas dang grogs mchog dang // sngon chad bsod nams byas pa dang // sems ni legs par gtang byas pa// de ni bkra shis dam pa yin// sprin spyad shin tu
318b2: sman sma dang / / yang dag don la rnam nges dang // khrims ldan rnams dang mtshungs sbyor ba// de ni bkra shis dam pa yin// byis pa rnams la mi bsten dang // mkhas pa rnams la bsten pa dang // mchod 'i
318b3: rnams la mchod byed pa/ / de na bkra shis dam pa yin// pha ma bsnyen bkur byed pa dang // zhi dang tshangs par spyod pa dang // 'byung po kun la snying brtse ba// de ni bkra shis dam pa yin// sdig pa'i las las ldog pa
318b4: dang / / dge ba'i las la bstan pa dang // bag yod pa dang rtag mkhas pa// de ni bkra shis dam pa yin// nga rgyal med dang sa med dang / chog shes 'thun pas 'tsha ba dang // rtag tu byas pa bzo byed pa// de ni la/
318b5: shes dam pa yin// kyi spyod de bzhin bzod pa dang // 'phags pa rnams dang 'thun sbyor dang // drAs rnams su ni chos nyan pa// de ni bikra shis dam pa yin// le la med dang mang thos dang // rasal
318b6: legs par rnam nges dang / / de bzhin sems la rnyog med pa// de ni bkra shis dam pa yi ni// gang zhig sems can thams cad la// byams pa'i sems nas bsgom zhing // dpag tu med de mi 'khrugs
318b7: pa/ / de ni bkra shis dam pa yin// gang zhig 'phags pa'i bden rnams la// shes rab mig ni rnams sbyangs dang // tshul khrims nongs par ma gyur pa// de ni bkra shis dam pa yin// 'phags
318b8: pa'i bden pa mthong ba dang / / tshangs par spyad pa sgom pa dang // mya ngan 'das pa 'thob 'gyur ba// de ni bkra shis dam pa yin// gang shig 'dod chags zhe sdang dang // ma rig pa yang rnam spangs
319a1: dang / shes pa mi 'khrugs skye 'gyur ba// de ni bkra shis dam pa yin// 'jig rten chos rnams kyis bskyod kyang // gang gi sems ni mig gal dang // dri med ni dang mya ngan med// de ni bkra shis dam/
319a2: yin// de dang 'dren ci rigs par// 'di la bkri gas de dag ni// mkhas pa gang zhig bstod byed pa// de la rtag tu bkrab shis 'gyur// rdzam thus pa'i bas shis kyi gas pa bcad pa/ rdzogs s+ho//
319a3: dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// dpal rnal 'byor gyi rgyud kyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha de bzhin gshegs pa rigs lnga 'khor dang bcas pa lha sum bcu rtsa bdun gyi bkra shes kyi tshigs su bcad pa// dpal
319a4: rdo rje sems dpra la phyag 'tshalo/ / bcom ldan rnam par snang mdzad rgyal ba mi bskyod pa// rin chen 'byung ldan 'od dpag med dang don yod grub// rigs lnga bde gshegs rnams kyi bkra shis gang yod pa// bkra shis
319a5: dam pa des kyang ding 'dir bkra shis shog/ rdo rje sems pa dang ni rin chen sems ma dang // chos kyi sems ma dang ni las kyi sems mar bcas// bcom ldan yum mchog rnams kyi bkra shis gang yod pa// bkra shis dam
319a6: pangs kyang ding 'dir bkra gis shog/ rdo rje sems dpa' dang ni rdo rje rgyal po dang // rdo rje chags pa dang ni rdo rje legs par bcas// bcom ldan mi bskyod 'khor gyi bkra shis gang yod pa// bkra shis dam pa des kyang
319a7: ding 'di bkra shis shog/ rdo rje rin chen dang ni rdo rje gzi brjid mchog/ rdo rje rgyal mtshan dang ni rdo rje rgyal po dang // bcom ldan rin 'byung 'khor gyi bkra shis gang yod pa// bkra shis dam pa des kyang ring 'dir/
319a8: ba shes shi/ rdo rje chos rab dang ni rdo rjenan po dang // rdo rje 'khor lo dang ni rdo rngo sla bar bcas// bcom ta ma'i 'khor gyi batha shis gang yad pa// bkra gis dam pa des kyang ring 'dir bkra shes pa/
319b1: na na ga sa
319b2: mtham da / sem sa / dgas pas lta ga gas gang 'dag gas shA nga ga ni/ gas
319b3: ma ma b+ha da/ ga
319b4: bamam ldan na lus rnams sa pa / gis dam pa sa cad 'di bdasags/ la na sa sto ci rgyud ci dag
319b5: sram su bdun rtsibs gis bcad pa/ rdzogs s+ho// / dkon mchog ga sums phyag 'tshal// bcom ldan rnam par gzigs ni rgyal rigs gas brjid can// ri bob rgyad khri'i dus
319b6: thong byer mdzes ldan du/ / shi ri sha yi shing drung mngon par sangs rgyas pa// ding 'dir bde gshegs pakra gis bran sum rdzogs kyur cig/ bde gshegs gtsug tor mda' ba rgyal rigs rdzu 'phrul ban// sa bdun thaM
319b7: dus na su ka'i grong khyer du/ / shing mchog sun d+ha'i shing drung mngon par sangs rgyas pa// ring 'dir bde gshegs bkra shis phun sum tshogs gyur cig/ rgyal ba thams cad skyob ba rgyal rigs blo gros can// tshe lo drug
319b8: khri'i dus na grong khyer mnyam med du/ / shing mchogs la'i drung du mngon par sangs rgyas pa// ding 'dir bde gshegs bkra shis phun sum tshogs gyur cig/ thub pa 'khor ba 'jig ni bcom ldan bram ze'i rigs/ tshe la
320a1: bzhi ci'i dus na grong khyer mdzes ldan du/ / shi re sha yi shing drung mngon par sangs rgyas pa// deng 'dir bde gshegs bkra shis phun sum tshogs gyur cig/ 'dun pa gser thub bslab pa mchog ldan tham ze'i rigs// tshe logasum
320a2: khri'i dus na grong khyer bde ldan du/ / u dum pa ra'i shing drung mngon par sangs rgyas pa// deng 'dir bde gshegs bkra shis phun sum tshogs gyur cig/ skyob pa 'od srung rgyal rigs bla med yon tan can// cholo nyi l+r-i dus na bA rA Na sI ru// n+ya grod+ha'i shing drung
320a3: mngon par sangs rgyas pa/ / deng 'dir bde gshegs bkra shis phun sum tshogs kyur cig/ 'gro mgon shAkya thub pa rgyal rigs brtson 'grus can// tshe le brgya pa'i dus na ser skya 'grong khyer du// a shwad+tha yi shing drung mngon par sangs rgyas pa// depe 'dir bde
320a4: gshegs bkra shis phun sum tshogs gyur cig/ sangs rgyas rabs bdun bkra shis phun sum tshogs pa gang / phyogs dus kun gyi bde gshegs byin parlabs rmad byung ga/ chos dbyings rnam dag rten 'brel stobs ldan mi 'gyur // deng 'dir bde gshegs bkra shis phun sum
320a5: tshogs kyur cig/ sangs rgyas rabs bdun gyi bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa/ rdzogs s+ho// / rgya gar skad du/ bany+tsa ta thAg ta mig la gA thA/ bod skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i bkra shis tshigs su bcad pa// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo//
320a6: rnam par snang mdzad ye shes dam pa mtsho chen ldan// zla ba ta dra'i sku mnga' srid pa'i mthar byin pa// gongs pamatha' dag rdzogs pa'i bkra shis gang yin pa// bkra shis des ni skyed bu rnams la ni byed shog/ mi 'khrugs rgyal po srid pa'i gti mug rnam sbyang ba// mgon pa
320a7: yon dan thams cad rdzogs pas bkra shis pa/ / ge mnyam bsamasams ldan pa'i bkra shis gang yin pa// bkra shis des ni skye dku rnams la zhe byed shog// sangs rgyas yon tan kun gyi rgyan gyis brgyan mdzad cing / yang dag bden pa'i byor pa sbyin mdzad mi skug/
320a8: rin chen 'byung ldan zhes phyi bkra shis dang yin pa/ tha gis des ni skyed bu rnams pa'i pyid shog/ bas mgatan 'dzi ye shes dam pa pa la phyin pa'i gnas/ legs dma'i cung thugs dpa med tshe ldan ning / cho grangs med par byi gyi rlo pa'i tha shis gang yin pa// bas
320b1: nga/ dag/ ma zha da pa ma
320b2: yin pa/ / bkra shis des ni skye dgra rnams la zhi byed shig/ de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i bkra shis tshig su bcad pa/ rdzogs s+ho//
320b3: dkon mchog gsus la phyag 'tshal lo// rigs gsum gyi bkra shis/ bcom ldan gser mdog ri'i rgyal po 'dra// 'jig rten gsum mgon 'angam dpal bzhon nu'i sku// bdeg shes
320b4: sku yi bkra shis gang yod pa/ / bkra shis des ni ding 'dir bde legs shog/ bcom ldan dung mdog ri yi rgyal po 'dra// 'jig rten gsum mgon spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang // bde gshegs
320b5: gsung gi bkra shis gang yin pa/ / bkra shis des ni ding 'dir bde legs shog/ bcom ldan ljang ser ri yi rgyal po 'dra// 'jig rten gsum mgon phyag na rdo rje ste// bde gshegs thugs kyi
320b6: bkra shis gang yin pa/ / bkra shis des kyang ding 'dir bde legs shog/ dpal rigs gsum gyi bkra shis// rdzogs s+ho// / rgya gar skad du/ ra ta na tra
320b7: maM ga la gAthA/ bod skad du/ dkon mchog gsum gyi bkra shis kyi tshigasu bcad pa// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// rgya mtsho lta bur rgal dka' 'khor ba'i 'dam las rgal/ bsod
320b8: nams ye shes tshogs gnyis bsag dka' ma lus rdzogs/ / 'gro ba kun gyi gnyen gcig gyur pa de bzhin gshegs// bkra shis dam pa des kyang ding 'dir bde legs shog/ rang don spangs
321a1: shing gzhan don rtag tu lhur len cing / / 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la lta brgyad bsrings te// dad dang brtson 'grus lhur len grags mchog byang chub sems// bkra shis
321a2: dam pa des kyang dang 'dir bde legs shog/ skye 'gag med cing rtog pa'i 'ching byed mtha' dag spangs// ma rig mun pa 'joms byed stong nyid sgron ma'i mchog/ dmigs pa sna tshogs
321a3: spangs pa lam gyi bde sgrub chos/ / bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog/ dkon mchog gsum gyi bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa rdzogs s+ho//
321a4: rigs gsum gyi bkra shis// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// yon tan rgyas pa'i rtags su sku mdog zla ba'i gser 'dra ba// shes rab rtag su ral gri po ti phyag na bsnams/
321a5: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nu'i bkra shis gang yin pa// bkra shis dam pa des kyang ding 'dir bde legs shog/ thugs rje'i rtags su sku mdog zla ba'i 'od chags pa// skyon gyi sa ma gos
321a6: phyag mtshan phyag na pad ma bsnams/ / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi bkra shis gang yin pa// bkra shis dam pa des kyang ding 'dir bde legs shog/ chos nyid mi 'gyur rtags su
321a7: su mdog mthing nag sngo/ / thabs dang shes rab gnyis med phyag na rdo rje bsnams// 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje'i bkra shis gang yin pa// bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde
321a8: legs shog/ rigs gsum gyi bkra shis rdzogs s+ho// / rgya gar skad / ma~Mg la gAn+d+ha/ bod skad du/ @kra
321b1: shes kyi tshigs su bcad pa/ / dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// phun sum tshogs pa mnga' ba gser gyi ro ba 'dra// 'jig tan gsum gyi mgon pa dri ma gsum spangs pa// sangs rgyas
321b2: pad ma rgyas pa'i 'dab 'dra'i spyan mnga' ba/ / bkra shis des ni ste dgunas tsog// de yis nye bar bstan pa'i mchog rab mi g.yo ba// 'jig rten gsum na grags shing lnga dang bas mchod
321b3: pa/ / chos kyi dam lce sku rnams la zhi byed pa// de ni 'jig rten dge ba'i bkra shis gnyis pa'o// dge 'dun dam pa'i chos ldan thos pa'i bkra shis phyug/ mi dang lha dang lha ma yin gyis mchod pa'i
321b4: gnas/ tshogs kyi mchog rab ngo tshe shes dang dpal gyi bzhi// de ni 'jig rten dge ba'i bkra shis gsum pa'o// sems can kun la phan phyir byang chub mnga' ba bo// don rnams thams cad 'grub par btul ba
321b5: yongs ldan pa/ / tshogs kyi lam dgyes thub pa'i bkra shis gang byung ba// bkra shis des ni skye dgun ma la zhi byed shog/ 'gro la phan phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ldan lha'i// gzhal med khang gi stong
321b6: nas ni 'di gshegs te/ / dbang bcas lha yis bsgyur ba'i bkra shis gang byung ba// bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog/ lo ma me tog 'od 'bar nyams dga' lum pa'i tshal
321b7: lnga mang dag gis bsten par mgon po bltam pa na/ / srid pa'i mthar phyin pa yi bkra shis gang byung ba// bkra shis des ni skye dag rnams pa ni byed shog/ grong khyer ser skye'i gnas nas rgyal po
321b8: lo brang du/ / lhung nas bltam pa ston pa bde gshegs zas btsang sras// mur ba skrun bdud rtsi'i chus gtor ba yi bkra shes dang // bkra shis des ni skye dgun mal zho byed shog/ grong khyer
322a1: dam pa ser skya'i gnas zhes bya bar ni/ / smad du grags pa che ba'i lha yis mngon bstod pa// bsam yas dge bsgrubs bsod nams phung po'i bkra shis gang /
322a2: bkra shis des ni skye bya rna mas la ni byed shog/ dgyes shing nam phyed zong khyer mchog nas mngon byung ste// dka' thub tshal du mngan par gshegs shing tshangs la sogs// lha yi tshogs kyis
322a3: yongs su bskor ba'i bkra shis gang / / bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog/ rab tu 'od 'bar gser dang 'dra ba'i sku mnga' zhing // bai dUr+ya ltar sngo ba'i rtsa gting steng
322a4: bzhugs te/ / dkyil mo dkrung bcas mi g.yo mchog gi bkra shis gang// bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog/ chu bo'i 'gram na tsa sha'i phreng gis yongs sgo
322a5: ba/ / shin tu mad du byung ba'i srid pa sel mdzad pa// klu'i rgyal pos phyag byas pa yi bkra shis gang // bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed/ shog/
322a6: shing rgyal dung gsheg byams pa'i stobs kyis bdud kyi phyogs// mang po bkral tes steng dang ni nam mkha' la// bcom ldan bkra shis rnam pa sna
322a7: tshogs kar byung ba/ / bkra shis des ni skye dgu narnams la ni byed sho// sdug bsngal mtha' dag zhig b+hir rdo rje'i gdan bzhugs te// nam gyi tho rangs bdud bzhi po dashanam
322a8: btul ba/ / ston pa bde bar gshegs pa'i bkra shis gang yin pa// bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog/ grong dakhyer bA rA Na sIr drang srong mchog bzhugs nas/
322b1: sa gas ka/ ma ad byug na y-i nams canaHdak+Sha/ banags ga kA
322b2: dam pa dag byed pa/ / bsod nams bya byed 'phags pa'i skyibs ma ngan bskrad pa// bcom ldan shAkya thub pa'i seng gas gang gsungs pa// bkra shis des ni ste dgra rnams la nizhi byed shig/
322b3: mra tigs byed pa kun gyi rgyal gzhom pa dang // 'grel bde ba bskyed phyir mo 'phrul dam pa dag/ nye bar stan brgyal ba'i bkra shis gang yin pa// bkra shis des ni skye dbyen mas la ni
322b4: shog/ 'grol phan phyir mtho ris nas ni 'dir gshegs te// tshangs pa la sogs lha tshogs la ga na rnga yab gdugs// sna tshogs thogs pas yongs su bskor ba'i bkra shis
322b5: gang / / bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba mchog tu nyer gshegs pa// mnad ra ba'i me tog mang pos mngon mchod pa//
322b6: lha mchog rnams kyis mngon par bstod pa'i bkra shis gang / bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog/ lha dbang klu dang mi'i dbang pos phyag byas pa// mkha' lding
322b7: gnod sbyin dri za'i dbang pos mchod gyur pa/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ldan pa'i bkra shis gang // bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog/ dkon mchog
322b8: gsum dang mdzad pa bcu gnyis kyi bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa rdzogs s+ho/ / / rgya gar gyi mkhan po 'dzin mi tra dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus
323a1: te gtan la phab pa/ / / rgya gar skad du/ rad na tri sra sti gA thA/ bod skad du/ dkon mchog gsum gyi bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa/ dkon mchog gsum la
323a2: phyag 'tshal lo/ / che ba'i tshe mchog ston mchog bla na med// chos rje nyi ma rgyal ba'i byin brlabs kyi// bdud dang bgegs rigs gnod pa'i dgra zhi ste// rtag tu dpal gnas nyin mtshan bkra shis shog/
323a3: chos nyid bden pa'i chos mchog bla na med// dam chos bdud rtsi bden pa'i byin brlabs kyis// nyes pa'i skyon bral dge tshogs rnams 'phel ba// rtag du dpal gnas nyin mtshan bkra shis shog/ dge 'dun yon tan rin chen
323a4: dpal 'bar ba/ / rgyas sras phan mdzad bden pa'i byin brlabs kyis// nyon mongs sdug bsngal gdung ba'i dgra zhi ste// rtag tu dpal gnas nyin mtshan bkra shis shog/ tshangs dang lha dbang srungs ma'i byin rlab kyi//
323a5: phan mdzad lha'i bkra shis gnas gyur te// bde legs bsam pa yid bzhin grub pa dang // tshe ring nad med bde skyid ldan par shog/ dkon mchog gsum gyi bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
323a6: kyi pa pa lags parjo oM/ ga pa chen ba sa c-in kyi ba sgri sngam / sa tata da mu ma sa / ma
